tika-abh03t0:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desento bhagavā yasmiṃ samaye desesi,
tika-abh03t0:5_2: vibhaṅgānantaraṃ desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vā “aṭṭhārasahī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:5_6: maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṃ niratisayaṃ taṃ bhañjanaṃ upādāya bhagavā eva “mārabhañjano”ti thomito.
tika-abh03t0:6_1: abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vāti katvā tesaṃ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:6_2: Yadipi aññesu ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā,
tika-abh03t0:6_3: ettha pana tesaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu nayesu ekekasmiṃ kathitattā sātisayaṃ kathananti idameva evaṃnāmakaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:6_5: Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:6_6: dhātūnaṃ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṃ assa nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:6_7: Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṃ pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti.
tika-abh03t0:6_8: Tassatthanti tassā dhātukathāya atthaṃ. A- kāre ā-
tika-abh03t0:6_10: “Yaṃ dhātukatha”nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti
tika-abh03t0:6_11: tena yojanaṃ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṃ tassatthanti a-
tika-abh03t0:6_14: taṃ vā atthaṃ taṃdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:10_3: aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pakaraṇaparicchedo vutto evāti dassento āha “cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t0:10_5: khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā,
tika-abh03t0:10_8: Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattāti “mūlamātikā”ti vattabbānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ padānaṃ khandhādidhammavibhajanassa
tika-abh03t0:12_2: paṭiccasamuppādavacanena ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati,
tika-abh03t0:12_3: tadatthāni dvādasa padāni dassitānīti tesaṃ tathādassitānaṃ sarūpeneva dassitānaṃ phassādīnañca padānaṃ vasena āha “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:12_4: Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṃ idha vibhattānaṃ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇassa
tika-abh03t0:12_5: viya aniṭṭhattā tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā
tika-abh03t0:12_7: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ bhinditvā gahaṇaṃ karonto tesaṃ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:13_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā nāma,
tika-abh03t0:13_1: tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṃ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṃ pakāsento “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:13_5: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:13_6: Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:13_8: mātikā”ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:13_10: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:13_11: Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā vikiṇṇabhāvena pakiṇṇakatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:15_1: Nayānaṃ pavattidvārabhūtā saṅgahāsaṅgahaviyogīsahayogīdhammā nayamukhānīti tesaṃ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh03t0:15_2: Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṃ vomissakatāvasena pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti,
tika-abh03t0:15_3: te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṃ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:15_4: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi vutto,
tika-abh03t0:15_7: sopi “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre
tika-abh03t0:15_11: Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-abh03t0:16_3: Na hi rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:16_5: catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ rūpanibbānehi vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:16_9: sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena missakena ca hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:18_5: catūhi vippayogo”ti etenapi visuṃ yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh03t0:18_6: Tena saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo,
tika-abh03t0:18_7: tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-abh03t0:18_8: Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca,
tika-abh03t0:20_2: mātikā”ti etena ṭhapanākārena bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:20_3: Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya
tika-abh03t0:20_4: imassa pakaraṇassa mātikābhāvena ṭhapitattā tathā pakāsitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:21_2: Saṅgahoti atthaṃ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā.
tika-abh03t0:21_3: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh03t0:21_4: Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṃ patto “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”tiādīsu “saṅgaho”ti vuttoti na koci doso.
tika-abh03t0:21_5: Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā,
tika-abh03t0:21_7: Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā “jātiyā saṅgaho”ti vutte “attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa
tika-abh03t0:21_8: avuttattāti jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t0:22_1: sampayogo vippayogo”ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā,
tika-abh03t0:22_3: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti hi “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahita”nti vattabbe ekassa asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:22_7: Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu chaṭṭhavajjesu.
tika-abh03t0:22_8: Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ katvā tattha
tika-abh03t0:22_13: Tattha hi sabhāvantarena sabhāvantarassa visesanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:22_15: Ekādasamādīsu pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t0:22_17: Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṃ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t0:23_3: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t0:23_5: Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vutto,
tika-abh03t0:23_7: Tattha sādhāraṇā pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā,
tika-abh03t0:23_9: asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṃ dassetuṃ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho.
tika-abh03t0:23_10: “Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā”ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṃ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:23_12: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho,
tika-abh03t0:23_13: tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti
tika-abh03t0:23_14: katvā vutto aññassa tādisassa abhāvāti ayamadhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:24_0: Jīvitindriyaṃ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:24_1: cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṃ
tika-abh03t0:24_2: aññaṃ byāpetabbaṃ nivattetabbañca natthīti anaññabyāpakanivattakasāmaññavisesadīpanato tasseva dhammassa
tika-abh03t0:24_4: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva,
tika-abh03t0:24_5: tasmā “cittekaggatā”ti ayaṃ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā
tika-abh03t0:24_7: itaro ca samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha uddesaṃ na arahati.
tika-abh03t0:24_8: Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṃ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_2: tesaṃ pana sabhāvato abhiññātānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariññeyyatādivisesadassanatthaṃ saccāni,
tika-abh03t0:29_3: adhipatiyādikiccavisesadassanatthaṃ indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso
tika-abh03t0:29_4: ca abhiññeyyanissito vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti “tīhi saṅgaho.
tika-abh03t0:29_6: Evañca katvā “catūhī”ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_7: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā “rūpakkhandho”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:29_8: tesaṃ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t0:29_9: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṃ gaṇanaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:29_14: Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh03t0:30_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṃ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:30_2: Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne
tika-abh03t0:30_3: viseso natthīti pacchimeheva yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko,
tika-abh03t0:30_5: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:30_6: Tesaṃ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ saṃkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:30_7: vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti pāḷiṃ na āropitanti.
tika-abh03t0:32_1: Yasmā ca dukatikesūti yadipi ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:32_2: ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṃ cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṃ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:32_5: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ tikena ca sadisaṃ vissajjananti dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṃ
tika-abh03t0:34_2: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā”ti likhitabbepi pamādavasena “avijjā ekena khandhenā”ti idaṃ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:34_3: Sarūpekasesaṃ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṃ dassitanti.
tika-abh03t0:34_4: Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:34_5: Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṃ dhātukathāyaṃ saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇādipadehi saṅgahitatā vippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese
tika-abh03t0:34_6: “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṃ vissajjanena dassitā,
tika-abh03t0:34_7: idha ca nāmarūpassa ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgahavacanena akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t0:35_3: tāni rūpassa nibbattipākabhedabhūtāni ruppanabhāvena gayhantīti rūpakkhandhadhammasabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_7: tathā duvidhānipi tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi sabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_8: tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti “jāti dvīhi khandhehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:38_1: Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṃ taṃ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh03t0:38_3: tadeva tāva dassento “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:38_4: Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṃ niccaṃ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā.
tika-abh03t0:38_5: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:38_6: teyeva dhammā “khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:38_7: tesaṃ pana evaṃvidhānaṃ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā uddesepi yaṃ yaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:38_8: taṃ taṃ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṃ niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṃ
tika-abh03t0:38_12: itaresu ca yaṃ yaṃ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṃ niddhāritaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:38_13: tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo araṇantā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:39_3: Ettha ca yena yena saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṃ aññaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:39_5: Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo añño dhammo natthi,
tika-abh03t0:39_7: na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako vā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:39_9: tañca na tasseva tena saṅgahitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:39_10: rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena vā gahitataṃ sandhāya vuttanti pakāsitoyamattho.
tika-abh03t0:40_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya,
tika-abh03t0:40_2: “vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:40_3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:40_5: tasmā yathā cittaṃ cittena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_6: evaṃ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_8: Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:40_15: yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca tesaṃ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti,
tika-abh03t0:40_16: tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca.
tika-abh03t0:40_17: Yathā dhammāyatanaṃ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca rūpakkhandhekadesassa khandhasaṅgahena,
tika-abh03t0:40_18: jīvitindriyaṃ rūpārūpajīvitasabhāgavisabhāgassa rūpakkhandhekadesassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassa ca jīvitavajjassa khandhasaṅgaheneva.
tika-abh03t0:40_21: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte saṅgāhakattameva etesaṃ natthi,
tika-abh03t0:40_22: yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:41_0: Yaṃ pana “dhammāyatanaṃ asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh03t0:41_1: “cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita”nti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:41_4: catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:41_6: Saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhānaṃ gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṃ taṃtaṃgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:41_7: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṃ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t0:41_8: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t0:42_1: na saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni.
tika-abh03t0:42_2: Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:42_4: Evaṃ saṅgāhakattābhāvato asaṅgāhakattābhāvato ubhayābhāvato ca yathāvuttasadisāni anuddharitvā saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattabhāvato
tika-abh03t0:42_6: Tattha “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā,
tika-abh03t0:43_3: Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti taṃ vissajjanaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:43_5: saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito,
tika-abh03t0:43_6: so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t0:43_12: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_14: na evaṃ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṃ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_16: rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t0:43_17: Siyā panetaṃ “so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū”ti,
tika-abh03t0:43_18: taṃ nivārento āha “so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:43_20: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṃ vā cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh03t0:43_21: ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:43_22: na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṃ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitatāya.
tika-abh03t0:43_26: Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso vā saṅgahitā siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:44_1: aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni
tika-abh03t0:44_2: aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti
tika-abh03t0:45_0: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti,
tika-abh03t0:45_3: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṃ samudayasaccādīsu yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:45_6: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe kāraṇanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:45_7: Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi,
tika-abh03t0:45_8: aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttoti.
tika-abh03t0:45_9: Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṃ saṅgahitānaṃ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t0:45_10: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko,
tika-abh03t0:46_0: Anidassanaṃ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena “sanidassanasappaṭigha”nti ettha vuttena
tika-abh03t0:46_2: Punadevāti etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṃ sanidassanapadaṃ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:46_3: “Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahita”nti idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:46_4: Na hi “cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṃ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita”nti ca “asaṅgahita”nti ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh03t0:46_5: Evaṃ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:46_6: Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:49_1: Asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesu vedanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:49_2: nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:49_4: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh03t0:49_6: asaṅgahitānipi tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t0:49_8: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā.
tika-abh03t0:49_9: Dukkhasaccādīhi ca pañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtehi khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitaṃ nibbānaṃ rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:49_10: viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ tehi na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:49_11: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṃ asaṅgāhakabhāvena aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:49_15: na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t0:50_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:50_2: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā,
tika-abh03t0:50_3: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṃ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti
tika-abh03t0:50_4: dassitoyaṃ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho. Yāni…pe…
tika-abh03t0:50_5: gahitānīti etena viññāṇasammissaṃ dhammāyatanekadesaṃ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:50_8: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṃ aññāyatanena asammissaṃ dīpentāni gahitānīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:53_1: Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṃ saṅgahānaṃ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇappavattivisesena “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:53_4: Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:53_6: tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha
tika-abh03t0:53_7: kenaci saṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo
tika-abh03t0:53_9: tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṃ dassento “samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandha…pe…
tika-abh03t0:53_13: Ettha ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_14: ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_15: ye ca ekena khandhasaṅgaheneva dhātusaṅgaheneva ca na saṅgāhakā vedanādikkhandhanirodhasaccajīvitindriyādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca,
tika-abh03t0:53_16: te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh03t0:53_19: Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti,
tika-abh03t0:53_20: yassa puna saṅgaho pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:54_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:54_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyyā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:54_2: taṃ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ ayojetvā taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthīti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:54_7: Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañca,
tika-abh03t0:54_12: Yampi cetaṃ vuttaṃ “tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:54_15: Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha pucchito vissajjito ca,
tika-abh03t0:54_17: tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti ayamevettha attho,
tika-abh03t0:54_19: Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t0:57_3: satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:57_4: abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato asaṅgāhakā eva na honti,
tika-abh03t0:58_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tādisena hi padena nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahamattaṃ na gaccheyyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:58_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṃ vasena samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṃ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṃ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh03t0:58_12: saddena na taṃ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve niyatataṃ aññassa ca aniyatataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:58_13: “Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita”nti ettha hi “niyamato”ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti.
tika-abh03t0:58_14: Atha vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṃpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvena
tika-abh03t0:58_17: Pucchāya uddhaṭañhi aññasahitaṃ asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:59_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṃ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:59_1: Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:59_3: Ettha ca paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:59_5: Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:60_1: Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṃ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ asaṅgāhakaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:60_2: Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:60_3: “Rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādinā yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ taṃ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:60_4: asaṅgahitena tena asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṃ sabbaṃ teva dhamme udāneti.
tika-abh03t0:60_6: Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:60_11: Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati,
tika-abh03t0:60_12: so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca nissayabhāvato “visayo”ti vutto,
tika-abh03t0:63_3: taṃ sabbaṃ pucchāya gahitanti idaṃ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:63_5: Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṃ dhammāyatanādipadaṃ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:63_12: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṃ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṃ nivārentena
tika-abh03t0:63_13: sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṃ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:63_14: Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṃ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṃ visabhāgatā ca,
tika-abh03t0:63_15: na ca rūpekadesassa nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:63_16: yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṃ nibbānena ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā.
tika-abh03t0:64_0: Sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t0:64_2: avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake dhamme dīpenti,
tika-abh03t0:64_3: evaṃ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:64_4: Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:64_7: Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_8: yāni ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṃ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_10: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:64_11: Na hi anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṃsampayuttatadubhayasamudāyānaṃ khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:65_0: Yadi evaṃ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:65_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:65_10: tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane kusalehi itaresaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:65_11: itarehi ca kusalānaṃ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti tesaṃ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:66_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṃ “soḷasā”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:66_3: ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t0:66_4: ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva
tika-abh03t0:66_5: gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi yathāyogaṃ sampayogaṃ vippayogañca labhanti.
tika-abh03t0:66_6: Atthi hi tesaṃ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā visabhāgatā cāti.
tika-abh03t0:66_7: Tena tattha tattha “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutta”nti ca,
tika-abh03t0:66_8: “ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:66_9: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t0:66_10: tasmā tesaṃ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa vibhāgaṃ karonti,
tika-abh03t0:66_13: “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā”ti ca evamādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:66_14: khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi pana viññāṇaṃ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe…
tika-abh03t0:66_16: evamevaṃ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ “sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu yathāyogaṃ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:67_1: Yathā taṃsampayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “samudayasaccaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:67_2: evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “tīhi khandhehi vippayutta”nti kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh03t0:67_4: Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṃ sukhadukkhadomanassindriyehi manoviññāṇadhātuto aññaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayuttanti
tika-abh03t0:67_8: Yañhi anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hoti saṅkhataṃ uddharitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:67_10: tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t0:67_14: vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti hoti.
tika-abh03t0:67_15: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:67_16: sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_1: “Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā,
tika-abh03t0:68_2: te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti adhippetāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:68_3: Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti te na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:68_4: Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ tehi vippayuttānañca soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto.
tika-abh03t0:68_5: Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti “ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā”ti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:68_6: So hi samudāyo vicāraṃ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_7: Na hi tadekadesassa vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_8: Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṃ iddhipādānaṃ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:68_10: Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_11: evamidhāpi vicārena asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:68_12: Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṃ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṃ viya sampayuttatā na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:68_13: Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_14: keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto,
tika-abh03t0:68_16: yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti “dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:68_18: Na panevaṃ yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā,
tika-abh03t0:68_19: taṃ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:68_21: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:71_1: Sampayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo tehi sampayuttābhāvato na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:71_3: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_4: Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi vippayuttānaṃ tato aññadhammānaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi.
tika-abh03t0:71_5: Nanu ca te eva cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh03t0:71_7: Na hi te eva dhammā cattāro khandhā,
tika-abh03t0:71_8: atha kho te ca tato aññe ca,
tika-abh03t0:71_10: Na ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṃ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_12: Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu adhippetesu tesaṃ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-abh03t0:72_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṃ na yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:72_4: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_6: Tattha aññena asammissanti asampayuttena asammissanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:72_8: Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva gahitānīti dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_10: “Atha phassasattakaṃ cittaṃ saha yuttapadehi sattā”ti purāṇapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:72_12: tike tayo satta mahantare cā”ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t0:73_1: Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṃ vippayuttānaṃ vasenāti idaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehi vippayuttā
tika-abh03t0:73_2: tena saddhiṃ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:73_4: vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti savitakkapadaṃ savicārapadañca dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:76_1: Vippayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādīhi vippayuttenasampayuttameva yathāniddhāritaṃ natthīti “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_2: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā”ti avatvā “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_5: Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṃ kenaci khandhādinā sampayogābhāvato yathāniddhāritaṃ vippayuttenasampayuttameva natthi,
tika-abh03t0:76_6: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:79_6: taṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā sampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:79_7: puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t0:79_8: Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā “sampayuttena sampayutta”nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t0:79_9: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:79_10: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi.
tika-abh03t0:79_12: Sabbārūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehīti vattamānānameva sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṃ anapanetvā
tika-abh03t0:82_3: dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṃ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t0:85_1: Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ “te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi viññāṇadhātūhī”ti etesaṃ
tika-abh03t0:85_3: “Kehicī”ti etassa panatthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇha”nti
tika-abh03t0:85_4: etena “te cā”ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme visesetvā tesaṃ eva visesitānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:85_5: attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi
tika-abh03t0:85_6: sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṃ sandhāyāha “sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāmā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:88_0: 417. Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha “teyeva uddhaṭā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:91_1: Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:91_2: te pāḷiyaṃ “rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādiuddānagāthāya dassitā bāvīsa dhammā “rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_3: Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti,
tika-abh03t0:91_4: te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā “arūpabhavena sadisā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_5: Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha vissajjanaṃ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh03t0:91_6: Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
tika-abh03t0:91_10: Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ asampayogehi vomissatāya sampayogo natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:92_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:92_1: na tesaṃ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:92_2: na vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṃ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:92_3: Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo idha na ruhantīti.
tika-abh03t0:92_4: Evaṃ panettha siyā “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh03t0:92_7: tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitānaṃ sampayogavippayogābhāvo aruhaṇe kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:95_2: Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṃ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t0:95_4: Dukkhasaccādidhammāva idha tehi vippayuttānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahasabbhāvā gahitāti.
tika-abh03t0:96_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṃ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:96_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṃ pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:96_3: tena ca saha osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:101_1: Dhammasaṅgahe tikadukavasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ dassetvā tathāsaṅgahitavibhattānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:101_2: dhātukathāya saṅgahāsaṅgahādippabhedaṃ vatvā yāya paññattiyā tesaṃ sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:101_3: taṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “cha paññattiyo”tiādinā puggalapaññatti āraddhā.
tika-abh03t0:101_4: Tattha ye dhamme pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāne asabhāvasamūhavasena upādāya “puggalo, itthī, puriso, devo,
tika-abh03t0:101_6: tesaṃ aññesañca bāhirarūpanibbānānaṃ sasabhāvasamūhasasabhāvabhedavasena paññāpanā sabhāvapaññattīti khandhapaññattiādikā pañcavidhā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:101_7: Tāya dhammasaṅgahādīsu vibhattā sabhāvapaññatti sabbāpi saṅgahitā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:101_9: Tāya ca samayavimuttādippabhedāya sattasantānagate pariññeyyādisabhāvadhamme upādāya pavattito padhānāya
tika-abh03t0:101_10: “vihāro mañco”tiādikā ca sabbā asabhāvapaññatti saṅgahitā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:102_0: Ettāvatā ca paññatti nāma vijjamānapaññatti avijjamānapaññatti ca.
tika-abh03t0:102_1: Tā eva hi vomissā itarā catassoti.
tika-abh03t0:102_2: Tasmā tāsaṃ dassanena imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sabbā paññattiyo dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:102_3: Khandhādipaññattīsu pana chasu aññattha adassitappabhedaṃ idheva ca dassitappabhedaṃ puggalapaññattiṃ
tika-abh03t0:102_4: upādāya imassa pakaraṇassa puggalapaññattīti nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:102_5: Ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmoti paññattiyā vatthubhāvena dassetukāmoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:102_6: Na hi etasmiṃ pakaraṇe paññāpanaṃ karoti,
tika-abh03t0:103_0: Khandhāti paññāpanāti idaṃ khandhāti rūpaṃ pathavītiādikā sabbāpi sāmaññappabhedapaññāpanā nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t0:103_2: Paññāpanāti etassa pana dassanā ṭhapanāti ete dve atthā,
tika-abh03t0:103_5: aññātāvindriyaṃ samayavimutto”tiādinā idamevaṃnāmakaṃ idamevaṃnāmakanti taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāsikakaraṇaṃ bodhanameva nikkhipanā,
tika-abh03t0:103_7: Yo panāyaṃ “nāmapaññatti hi dasseti ca ṭhapeti cā”ti kattuniddeso kato,
tika-abh03t0:103_8: so bhāvabhūtāya karaṇabhūtāya vā nāmapaññattiyā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ diṭṭhatāya ṭhapitatāya ca taṃnimittataṃ sandhāya katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:104_11: te apanetvā tehi vinivattassa itthiādisabhāvassa abhāvato asambhūtassāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:104_12: Yaṃ panetassa “tenākārena avijjamānassa aññenākārena vijjamānassā”ti atthaṃ keci vadanti,
tika-abh03t0:104_15: Avijjamānepi sabhāve lokaniruttiṃ anugantvā anabhinivesena cittena “itthī,
tika-abh03t0:104_17: Sābhinivesena pana cittena gayhamānaṃ pañcamasaccādikaṃ na sabhāvato,
tika-abh03t0:104_20: labbhantīti imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:105_0: Yathāvuttassa pana aṭṭhakathānayassa avirodhena ācariyavādā yojetabbā,
tika-abh03t0:105_1: tasmā paññapetabbaṭṭhena cesā paññattīti etassa sabhāvato avijjamānattā paññapetabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:105_2: Paññapetabbampi hi sasabhāvaṃ tajjaparamatthanāmalābhato na parato labhitabbaṃ paññattināmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh03t0:105_3: nisabhāvaṃ pana sabhāvābhāvato na attano sabhāvena nāmaṃ labhatīti.
tika-abh03t0:105_4: Sattotiādikena nāmena paññapitabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti nāmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh03t0:105_6: Na hi sasabhāvassa rūpādīhi ekattena aññattena vā anupalabbhasabhāvatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:106_2: Etasmiñca ācariyavāde anūnena lakkhaṇena bhavitabbanti sabbasamorodho kātabbo.
tika-abh03t0:106_3: Dutiyaṃ tatiyanti evaṃpakārā hi upanidhāpaññatti upanikkhittakapaññatti ca saṅkhātabbappadhānattā chapi paññattiyo bhajatīti yuttaṃ vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:106_4: itarā ca yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññattinti.
tika-abh03t0:106_5: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādi pana saṅkhā nāma kāci natthīti tāsaṃ upādāsantatipaññattīnaṃ avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:106_6: itarāsañca upanidhāpaññattīnaṃ yathānidassitānaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ maññamāno āha “sesā
tika-abh03t0:106_8: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādīnaṃ upanidhāupanikkhittakapaññattīnaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvameva maññati.
tika-abh03t0:106_9: Yañhi paṭhamādikaṃ apekkhitvā yassa cekādikassa upanikkhipitvā paññāpīyati,
tika-abh03t0:106_12: Na hi asīti āsītiko ca vijjamānoti.
tika-abh03t0:107_2: Kāmoti pana okāse gahite avijjamānenavijjamānapaññatti esā bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-abh03t0:107_4: Yathā pana vacanasaṅkhātāya vacanasamuṭṭhāpakacetanāsaṅkhātāya vā kiriyāya bhāṇakoti puggalassa paññatti
tika-abh03t0:107_6: evaṃ kiso thūloti rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānena puggalādīnaṃ paññāpanā vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t0:107_8: Rūpaṃ phassotiādikā pana vijjamānapaññatti ruppanādikiccavasena kiccapaññattiyaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:107_10: Vijjamānāvijjamānapaññattīsu ca vuttāsu tāsaṃ vomissatāvasena pavattā itarāpi vuttāyeva hontīti ayampi ācariyavādo sabbasaṅgāhakoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:108_5: evaṃ pāḷiyojanaṃ katvā saṅkhepappabhedavasena ayaṃ attho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:108_7: “khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti hi imassa attho “yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato pañcakkhandhāti vā”ti etena dassito,
tika-abh03t0:108_11: Tena avuttopi sabbo saṅgahito hotīti “tatrāpi rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:108_13: “yāvatā”ti idaṃ sabbehi padehi yojetvā yattakā pañcakkhandhā,
tika-abh03t0:108_15: Yattako pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ tappabhedānañca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ pabhedo,
tika-abh03t0:108_16: tattako khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattiyā pabhedoti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthubhedena khandhapaññattiyā pabhedaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:113_2: Yena hi saddhintiādinā paṭhamaṃ samaṅgibhāvatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh03t0:113_3: Phassenapi phuṭṭhāyeva nāmāti etena “apicesā”tiādinā vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ samphassena phusanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:113_7: Ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammāti ettha vedanāsomanassindriyāni saṅgahitānīti āha “cattāro khandhā hontī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:113_8: Evaṃ sati vedanāsomanassindriyehi sukhassa phusitabbattā tiṇṇañca tesaṃ anaññattā teneva tassa phusanā āpajjatīti?
tika-abh03t0:113_11: Atha vā ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgānīti aṅgānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:113_12: Tesu pana paccekampi yojanā kātabbā “vitakkaṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādinā.
tika-abh03t0:113_13: Tattha “sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti imissā yojanāya sesā tayo khandhā honti,
tika-abh03t0:113_15: Sabbayojanāsu ca tayo anto katvā “cattāro khandhā hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:114_1: Yo asamayavimokkhena ekaccehi āsavehi vimutto asamayavimokkhūpanissayalābhena ca sātisayena samayavimokkhena,
tika-abh03t0:114_3: So hi tena vimutto jhānalābhī sekkho rūpārūpabhavato apunarāvaṭṭako kāmarāgādīhi tathāvimuttova hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ laddhuṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t0:114_4: Puthujjano pana jhānalābhī punarāvaṭṭakadhammo puna kāmarāgādisamudācārabhāvato vimutto nāma na hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ nārahati,
tika-abh03t0:114_9: Tasmā tassa na aṭṭha vimokkhā samayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa asamayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa vā kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:115_1: Arūpakkhandhanibbānamattavācako arūpasaddo na hotīti dassanatthaṃ “rūpato añña”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:115_3: Abhiññādīnañhi dhammānaṃ pādakabhāvena samādhi mañjūsāsadiso hoti.
tika-abh03t0:115_6: “Sammajjitabba”nti cintetvā tattha ādarassa akatattā vattabhedoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:115_7: Evaṃ vattabhedamattena naṭṭhā pana samāpatti kāmacchandādīhi naṭṭhā viya na kiñcena paccāharitabbā hoti mandapāripanthakattā,
tika-abh03t0:116_1: Attano anurūpena pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppatīti parihīno nāma na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:116_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅge paṭisaṃhaṭamatte samāpajjituṃ samatthatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:116_9: appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā adhigatā,
tika-abh03t0:116_10: tesāhamassa lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmī”ti sutte pana samayena samayaṃ āpajjanena pariharitabbānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:116_11: samāpattisukhavihārānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅgakāle anipphattito lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyoti vuttoti
tika-abh03t0:117_3: Idha hi tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyyāti dhammehi puggalassa parihānampi aparihānampi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:117_4: Tattha ca puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyunti dhammānaṃ kuppanaṃ akuppanañca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:117_5: puggalassa pana parihānadhammānameva vināsoti vacananānattamattena vacanatthanānattamattena vā pariyāyantaratā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:120_1: Arahattamaggaṭṭho ca vaṭṭabhayato paññubbegena ubbijjanto uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanehi uparatoti bhayūparato nāmāti āha “satta sekkhā bhayūparatā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:121_1: Bhavaṅgapaññāvirahitā “vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā”ti iminā gahitāti tihetukapaṭisandhikā keci “duppaññā”ti
tika-abh03t0:121_3: Paññāya hi vinā na tadupanissayo atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:122_2: tattheva niyatadhammā hontīti uttarakurūsu tadabhāvā niyato nāma natthīti dassento “yā pana uttarakurukāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:123_5: Pariyādakassa maggassa phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodhoti pariyādiyitabbānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:123_6: pariyādakaphalārammaṇānaṃ saha viya saṃsiddhidassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ terasa
tika-abh03t0:123_8: Idha pana “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti vacanato tesu kilesapavattasīsānameva
tika-abh03t0:123_10: Tattha pavattasīsampi vaṭṭato vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādiyati,
tika-abh03t0:123_12: tāva pavattisabbhāvato “pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyatī”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:123_13: Kilesapariyādānena pana attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-abh03t0:123_14: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato hi paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ samāpitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh03t0:123_15: Taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti,
tika-abh03t0:123_16: teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca hotīti imāya vāracutisamatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ apubbācarimatā hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:123_17: Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti ettha parinibbānacittameva bhavaṅgotaraṇabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:126_3: sā ca āgamanavasena siddhā sātisayā tevijjatāti āha “āgamanīyameva dhura”nti.
tika-abh03t0:127_3: Tattheva hi sabbaññutaṃ patto nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:128_0: 23. Ananussutesu dhammesūti ca ananussutesu saccesūti attho.
tika-abh03t0:129_1: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā “yato kho, ānanda,
tika-abh03t0:129_2: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-abh03t0:129_3: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-abh03t0:129_6: taṃ pana ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttanti idha kīṭāgirisuttavasena sabbaubhatobhāgavimuttasaṅgahatthaṃ
tika-abh03t0:129_10: ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
tika-abh03t0:129_12: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-abh03t0:129_15: puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti arūpasamāpattivasena cattāro ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:130_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti na āsavā paññāya passanti,
tika-abh03t0:130_1: dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇāti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:130_2: Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ purimakiriyā hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:130_3: Nāmanissitako esoti eso ubhatobhāgavimutto rūpato muccitvā nāmaṃ nissāya ṭhito puna tato muccanato “nāmanissitako”ti
tika-abh03t0:130_4: vatvā tassa ca sādhakaṃ suttaṃ vatvā “kāyadvayato suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti āhāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:130_5: Sutte hi ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino upasīvabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā nāmakāyā vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti muni akkhātoti.
tika-abh03t0:131_2: tatiyattheravāde dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh03t0:131_4: kilesavikkhambhanasamucchedanehi vā kāyadvayato vimuttoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:131_5: Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttanti nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyato vimuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:131_6: Tañhi nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena nāmakāyato rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ
tika-abh03t0:131_7: nāma hotīti arahattamaggassa pādakabhūtaṃ ubhatobhāgavimuttanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:132_1: Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī na hotīti ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ ekampi vimokkhaṃ anadhigatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:132_2: Arūpāvacaresu hi ekampi adhigato ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvakāraṇapaṭilābhato aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena tena
tika-abh03t0:133_6: Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto,
tika-abh03t0:133_7: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-abh03t0:133_9: Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti,
tika-abh03t0:133_10: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
tika-abh03t0:133_11: na tu vimuttoti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-abh03t0:134_1: Diṭṭhattā pattoti etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:134_3: dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:134_4: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
tika-abh03t0:135_1: Imaṃ pana nayaṃ “no”ti paṭikkhipitvāti ettha diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttabhāvappattānaṃ paññānānattaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:135_2: na pana yena visesena so viseso patto,
tika-abh03t0:135_3: so vuttoti imaṃ dosaṃ disvā paṭikkhepo katoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:135_4: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsūti ca vacanena āgamanīyanānattasanniṭṭhānameva thiraṃ karotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:135_5: Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:136_1: Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:136_2: Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:137_3: nanu ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato maggakkhaṇe eva hotīti tadā eva sotāpanno nāmāti āpannanti? Nāpannaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:137_4: Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ dinnanti tenapi samannāgatassa sotāpannabhāvato,
tika-abh03t0:137_5: sotena vā maggena pavattetuṃ aparihīnena phalaṭṭhopi samannāgato eva nāma,
tika-abh03t0:137_6: na ca tena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe viya soto samāpajjiyamāno,
tika-abh03t0:137_7: tasmā samāpannasotattā paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ yutto.
tika-abh03t0:137_14: Tattha dutiyaphalaṭṭhādīnaṃ visuṃ nāmaṃ atthīti paṭhamaphalaṭṭho eva itarehi visesiyamāno “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ yuttoti so eva idhādhippeto.
tika-abh03t0:137_15: Paṭiladdhamaggena bujjhatīti etena paṭiladdhamaggassa catusaccapaccavekkhaṇādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:137_16: Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo etassāti hi sambodhiparāyaṇoti.
tika-abh03t0:137_17: Dutiyenatthena sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-abh03t0:138_0: 32. Kevalena kulasaddena mahākulameva vuccatīti āha “mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho”ti.
tika-abh03t0:139_2: Ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitāti sajjhānako ajjhattasaṃyojanasamucchede akatepi anāgāmisabhāgo
tika-abh03t0:139_4: heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsaraṇako kāmabhavagato hīnajjhānako idha gaṇanūpagoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:140_0: 34. Yaṃ vattabbanti “dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo”tiādi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:141_1: Upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannaṃ vā etena puggalena hoti,
tika-abh03t0:141_3: Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ tassa puggalassa vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:141_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “appatvā pabbataṃ nadī”ti viya āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ vā hutvāti parasaddayoge
tika-abh03t0:141_6: parato bhūto hutvā saddo vacanasesabhūto payuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:143_5: Avihesu uddhaṃsoto yadipi tattha parinibbāyī na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:143_6: yattha vā tattha vā gantvā parinibbāyatu,
tika-abh03t0:143_7: parinibbāyino pana tassa asaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā ca atthīti tattha dasa anāgāmino vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:143_11: na uppajjitvāva nibbāyanakādīhi adhimattatā viya samuddaṃ patvā nibbāyanakato anadhimattatā viya ca antarā
tika-abh03t0:144_0: No cassa no ca me siyāti avijjāsaṅkhārādikaṃ hetupañcakaṃ no ca assa,
tika-abh03t0:144_1: viññāṇādikaṃ idaṃ phalapañcakaṃ vattamānaṃ no ca me siyāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:144_2: Tena atītabhavasaṃsiddhito dukkhasamudayato imassa dukkhassa pavattidassanato paccayasamudayaṭṭhena khandhānaṃ udayadassanapaṭipatti vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:144_4: na me bhavissatīti yadi etarahi hetupañcakaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-abh03t0:144_5: anāgate phalapañcakaṃ na me bhavissatīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:144_7: etarahi anāgate ca attattaniyanivāraṇavasena suññatāpaṭipatti vā catūhipi vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:144_9: Bhūtanti sasabhāvaṃ nibbattaṃ vā yathādiṭṭhaudayabbayaṃ yathādiṭṭhasuññataṃ vā khandhapañcakaṃ parikappitaitthipurisasattādibhāvarahitaṃ
tika-abh03t0:144_11: Vivaṭṭānupassanāya vivaṭṭamānaso taṃ bhūtaṃ pajahāmīti upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh03t0:145_1: sambhave na rajjatīti avisiṭṭhe visiṭṭhe ca bhave na rajjatīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:145_3: anāgato jātiyā gahaṇena gahito sambhavoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:145_6: tasmiṃ dvaye na rajjatīti sekkhapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:145_7: Bhūte hi sasambhave ca virāgo sekkhapaṭipatti.
tika-abh03t0:145_10: bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
tika-abh03t0:145_16: disvā nirodhadhammassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-abh03t0:145_18: Athuttarīti atha evaṃ arajjamāno uttari santaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ anukkamena maggapaññāya sammā passati,
tika-abh03t0:145_19: tañca khvassa padaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ catutthamaggeneva sacchikātabbassa tassa tena asacchikatattā.
tika-abh03t0:148_1: Kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kassaci kathañci avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti ajjhattaṃ nāma.
tika-abh03t0:149_2: Anāgatampi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno purimaggahitaṃ taṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t0:149_4: Tamojotiparāyaṇo puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto eva puññāni karotīti “pubbakārī”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t0:149_5: “Iṇaṃ demī”ti saññaṃ karotīti evaṃsaññaṃ akarontopi karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:150_1: Acchamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyatīti acchamaṃsanti jānantopi sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyati,
tika-abh03t0:154_4: Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ pāpako ājīvo”ti vuttehi samannāgamena.
tika-abh03t0:154_6: evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hotīti evaṃ sāsaṅko samācāro hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:156_1: Samādhi vā ādīti lokuttaradhammā hi paramatthato sāsananti tadattho pādakasamādhi tassa ādi vutto,
tika-abh03t0:157_1: Ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabboti ucchaṅgasadisapaññatāya eva paññā viya puggalopi ucchaṅgo viya hoti,
tika-abh03t0:159_1: Ciraṭṭhānato thiraṭṭhānato ca pāsāṇalekhasadisā parāparādhanibbattā kodhalekhā yassa so pāsāṇalekhūpamasamannāgato pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vutto,
tika-abh03t0:160_0: 118. Sutādivatthurahito tucchamāno naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti vuccati, so uggato naḷo etassāti unnaḷo.
tika-abh03t0:161_1: “Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ sīlakathābhavanaṃ paṭhamārambhopi dussīlena saha na hotīti dassento āha neva sīlakathā hotī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:162_1: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ anuggahetabbe paññāya sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe ca adhikasīlaṃ nissāya uppannapaññāya anuggaṇhāti nāmāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:163_0: 124. Gūthakūpo viya dussīlyanti etena dussīlyassa gūthasadisattameva dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:164_1: No ca sammā paññapetuṃ sakkontīti yebhuyyena na sakkontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:164_2: uppanne tathāgate tasmiṃ anādariyaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ uppādetuṃ vāyamantassa asamatthabhāvaṃ vā.
tika-abh03t0:167_1: Parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ āṇattiyā attanā ca payogena katanti āṇattiyā pāpassa dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t0:169_2: Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhaṭavelāya saddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle anatikkante evāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:170_2: “Katamo loko”ti vutte “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti mahantaṃ atthaṃ saṅgahitvā ṭhitavacanaṃ atthayuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:173_1: Puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatāti puggale abhikkamanādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatāti attho,
tika-abh03t0:173_2: ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādinā puggalassa sadisatāti vā sadisābhikkamanāditāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:174_2: Pāṇātipātena dussīlaṃ adinnādānena dussīloti avatvā pāṇātipātenevāti vadanto tacchaṃ bhāsati nāma.
tika-abh03t0:174_6: so kīdisoti dassanatthaṃ “kālaññū hotī”tiādi vuttanti dassento “yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:175_6: Kulasampattiyādīhi jotamāno ca joti viyāti joti.
tika-abh03t0:176_1: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāpi yehi kilesehi vimutto avimutto ca,
tika-abh03t0:176_2: tesaṃ dassanavasena vimuttidassanameva hotīti āha “vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t0:177_1: Yāni kānici tantāvutānanti tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ yāni kānici vatthānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:178_1: Tattha sikkhanabhāvenāti sikkhāya sājīve ca sikkhanabhāvena.
tika-abh03t0:178_3: Sājīvañca avītikkamantoti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:178_6: Tato hi yāva maggā saṃvarapāripūrī hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:178_8: Haliddirāgo viya na thirakatho hotīti ettha kathāya aṭṭhitabhāvena haliddirāgasadisatā veditabbā,
tika-abh03t0:179_3: Aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattananti dasagghanakaṃ vatthayugaṃ dassetvā tassa ajānantassa pañcagghanakassa dānaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:181_1: Khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattā vipassanā maggaphalalābhena paṭiladdhā nāma hoti tadalābhena anavaṭṭhānatoti
tika-abh03t0:181_3: maggaphalañāṇameva ca adhikapaññābhāvato catusaccadhamme sabbadhammassa vare nibbāne eva vā visiṭṭhadassanabhāvato
tika-abh03t0:182_0: 189. Sutena anupapannoti yathāsutena vā atthena vā na samannāgatoti attho.
tika-abh03t0:185_1: Paṭhamapañcake uddeseneva puggalavibhāgo viññāyatīti yathā tesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:185_4: Phaluppattiyā maggakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti “maggakiccavasena phalameva vutta”nti āha.
tika-abh03t0:186_2: dassanasavanapaṭivacanadānavasena mukhena viya pavattaṃ gahaṇaṃ mukhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:186_4: gahaṇatthaṃ pakatimukhameva vā ādheyyaṃ yassa so ādheyyamukho,
tika-abh03t0:186_5: avicāretvā ādikathāya eva ṭhapitagahaṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:188_1: Gavā khīraṃ aggamakkhāyatīti na evaṃ sambandho,
tika-abh03t0:188_2: uppattito pana pañca gorase dassetvā tesu sappimaṇḍassa aggabhāvadassanatthaṃ “gavā khīra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:191_1: Chakke ekantato pākaṭā sammāsambuddhādayo te yathāvuttaguṇā puggalāti dassento “sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:191_2: Tattha tenāti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayo tattha ca sabbaññutappattibalesu ca vasibhāvappattīti etena sabbena samuditena.
tika-abh03t0:191_3: “Sabbaññutaññāṇenā”ti pana vutte sabbamidaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayena balesu ca vasibhāvappattiyā ca vinā sabbaññutaññāṇassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:191_5: Tattha anācariyakena attanā uppāditenāti vacanena sabbaññutaññāṇassa sācariyakattaṃ parato uppattiñca paṭisedheti,
tika-abh03t0:191_7: Na hi taṃ tādisaṃ nivāretabbaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:194_1: Saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjatīti etena kusalesu dhammesu antogadhā,
tika-abh03t0:194_2: bodhipakkhiyadhammesu vā adhimokkhabhūtā saddhā sādhūti ummujjamānaṃ kusalaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:194_4: Kusalesu dhammesūti ettha bhummaniddeso tadantogadhatāya tadupakāratāya vā veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:194_5: Ettha ca ummujjati sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūtiādinā saddhādīnaṃ ummujjanapaññāya saddhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:194_6: Teneva “tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:194_7: “Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesū”ti vā ummujjanassa upakārakaṃ ānisaṃsadassanaṃ vatvā “ummujjatī”ti etena
tika-abh03t0:194_10: Ekakammanibbattā paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisantati eko cittavāroti cutito anantaro yathāgahito dutiyo hotīti āha “dutiyacittavārenā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:194_11: Ummujjitvā ṭhitādayo cattāro tāya tāya jātiyā arahattaṃ asacchikarontā aneke puggalā veditabbā,
tika-abh03t0:194_12: sacchikaronto pana ekopi pubbabhāge tatiyapuggalādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā ante sattamapuggalo hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:197_2: pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhāti ettha ye sotāpannādayo rūpārūpabhave upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-abh03t0:197_3: te idha vihāya niṭṭhāpakkhaṃ bhajamānāpi ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ asamucchinnattā puthujjanasādhāraṇe ca ṭhāne upapattiyā na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:197_4: Asādhāraṇaṭṭhānuppattivasena pana antarāparinibbāyīādayo eva “idha vihāya niṭṭhā”ti vuttāti veditabbāti.
tika-abh03t0:202_0: Kathānaṃ vatthubhāvatoti kathāsamudāyassa pakaraṇassa attano ekadesānaṃ okāsabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:204_0: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti parinibbānameva parinibbānassa parinibbānantarato visesanatthaṃ karaṇabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:204_1: Yāya vā nibbānadhātuyā adhigatāya pacchimacittaṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:204_9: laddhiyā suttantehi liṅgākappehi ca visadisabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:205_1: Aññatra saṅgahitātiādīsu dīghādīsu aññatra saṅgahitato suttantarāsito taṃ taṃ suttaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā aññatra akariṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:205_2: Saṅgahitato vā aññatra asaṅgahitaṃ suttaṃ aññatra katthaci akariṃsu,
tika-abh03t0:205_5: Vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasūti vinaye ca avasesapañcanikāyesu ca.
tika-abh03t0:206_2: Upekkhāvedanā hi santasmiṃ paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatāti ayañhettha pariyāyo.
tika-abh03t0:206_5: vedanā sukhā dukkhā upekkhā vedanā”tiādi nippariyāyadesitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:206_11: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse”tiādikaṃ aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-abh03t0:206_12: “Natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso”tiādikaṃ suttañca aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ atthañca aññaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:206_13: “Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādi byañjanacchāyāya saṇhasukhumaṃ suññatādiatthaṃ bahuṃ vināsayuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:207_0: Vinayagambhīranti vinaye gambhīrañca ekadesaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:207_1: Kilesavinayena vā gambhīraṃ ekadesaṃ suttaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:207_5: ekacce sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti āha “atthuddhāraṃ abhidhammaṃ chappakaraṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t0:207_6: Kathāvatthussa savivādattepi avivādāni chappakaraṇāni paṭhitabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:207_8: Tatiyasaṅgītito vā pubbe pavattamānānaṃ vasena “chappakaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:207_10: Nāmanti yaṃ buddhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ na hoti mañjusirītiādikaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:208_0: Saṅkantikassapikena nikāyena vādena vā bhinnā saṅkantikāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:208_1: Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedā suttavādī anupubbena bhijjatha bhijjiṃsūti attho.
tika-abh03t0:208_3: tena abhinnena theravādena saha aṭṭhārasa hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:208_4: Bhinnavādenāti vā bhinnāya laddhiyā aṭṭhārasa honti,
tika-abh03t0:208_8: Therānaṃ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo.
tika-abh03t0:215_2: Abhūtena maṇiudakādiākārena gayhamānā māyāmarīciādayo abhūtaññeyyākārattā asaccikaṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t0:215_6: Anussavādivasena gayhamāno tathāpi hoti aññathāpīti tādiso ñeyyo na paramattho,
tika-abh03t0:216_0: Chalavādassāti atthīti vacanasāmaññena atthīti vuttehi rūpādīhi sāmaññavacanassāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:216_2: laddhiṃ gahetvā āmantāti paṭijānātī”ti vacanato pana “chalavādassā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:216_7: tathā anupalabbhanīyato na tava vādo tiṭṭhatīti nivattentoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:216_8: Taṃ sandhāyāti “yo saccikaṭṭho”ti ettha vutto yo saccikaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t0:216_9: so sappaccayādibhāvena dīpito “rūpañca upalabbhatī”tiādīsu āgato dhammappabhedoti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:217_1: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthākārena upalabbhamānaṃ saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhamānaṃ nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:217_2: Aññathā tatoti tassa tenākārenāti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:217_4: Purimapucchāya sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo yathā bhūtena sabhāvatthena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t0:217_6: Idha pana bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamāno so dhammappabhedo yena ruppanādisappaccayādiākārena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t0:217_7: kiṃ tenākārena puggalopi upalabbhatīti esa viseso.
tika-abh03t0:217_8: Yathā pana rūpaṃ viya bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamānā vedanā na ruppanākārena upalabbhati,
tika-abh03t0:217_9: evaṃ dhammappabhedo viya bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbhamāno puggalo na ruppanādisappaccayādiākārena upalabbhatīti
tika-abh03t0:217_10: sakkā paravādinā vattunti acodanīyaṃ etaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:217_11: Avajānanañca tassa yuttanti niggaho ca na kātabbo.
tika-abh03t0:217_12: Dhammappabhedato pana aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā dhammappabhedākāreneva codeti.
tika-abh03t0:217_14: Anujānanāvajānanapakkhā sāmaññavisesehi paṭiññāpaṭikkhepapakkhā anulomapaṭilomapakkhā paṭhamadutiyanayāti ayametesaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:218_0: “Tena vata re vattabbe”ti vadanto vattabbassa avacane dosaṃ pāpetīti iminā adhippāyena “niggahassa pāpitattā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:218_1: “Evametaṃ niggahassa ca anulomapaṭilomato catunnaṃ pāpanāropanañca vuttattā upalabbhatītiādikaṃ anulomapañcakaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:218_2: anulomapaṭilomato pana dvīhi ṭhapanāhi saha sattakena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:218_4: Yaṃ pana vakkhati “ṭhapanā nāma paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato ‘ayaṃ tava doso’ti dassetuṃ ṭhapanamattameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:218_5: na niggahassa vā paṭikammassa vā pākaṭabhāvakaraṇa”nti.
tika-abh03t0:218_7: Yathā pana tattha paṭikammapañcakabhāvaṃ avatvā paṭikammacatukkabhāvaṃ vakkhati,
tika-abh03t0:218_9: Suddhikaniggahassa pana niggahappadhānattā uddesabhāvena vutto niggahova visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:218_10: Ye pana “ayathābhūtaniggahattā tattha paṭikammaṃ visuṃ na vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh03t0:218_11: tesaṃ dutiye vādamukhe niggahacatukkabhāvo paṭikammapañcakabhāvo ca āpajjati.
tika-abh03t0:219_1: Attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhamevāti sammutisaccaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:219_2: Vakkhati hi “suddhasammutisaccaṃ vā paramatthamissakaṃ vā sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya ‘yo saccikaṭṭho’ti puna anuyogo paravādissā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:219_3: Tattha yadi paravādinā attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭho sammutisaccaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:219_4: sammutisaccākārena puggalo upalabbhatīti vadantena samānaladdhiko nappaṭisedhitabbo,
tika-abh03t0:219_6: Atha sakavādinā attanā ca adhippetasaccikaṭṭhaṃyeva sandhāya paravādī “yo saccikaṭṭho”tiādimāhāti ayamattho.
tika-abh03t0:219_9: puna “sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni vā ekato katvāpi evamāhā”ti na vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh03t0:219_11: saccikaṭṭhekadesena upaladdhiṃ icchantena “puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”tiādi anuyogo na kātabbo,
tika-abh03t0:219_13: Na hi vedayitākārena upalabbhamānā vedanā ruppanākārena upalabbhatīti anuyuñjitabbā,
tika-abh03t0:219_14: na ca paravādī ruppanādisabhāvaṃ puggalaṃ icchati,
tika-abh03t0:219_16: Paramatthasaccato aññasmiṃ saccikaṭṭhe vijjamāne nāssa paramatthasaccatā anuyuñjitabbā.
tika-abh03t0:219_17: Asaccikaṭṭhe saccikaṭṭhavohāraṃ āropetvā taṃ sandhāya pucchatīti vadantānaṃ voharitasaccikaṭṭhassa attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭhatā na yuttā.
tika-abh03t0:219_19: Sammutisaccākārena upalabbhamānañca bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbheyya vā na vā.
tika-abh03t0:219_23: taṃvinimutto sammutisaccassa saccikaṭṭhaparamatthākāro na vattabbo asiddhattā.
tika-abh03t0:220_0: Dvinnaṃ saccānanti ettha saccadvayākārena anupalabbhanīyato anuññeyyametaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:220_2: Yathā hi ekadesena paramatthākārena anupalabbhanīyatā anujānanassa na kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:220_3: evaṃ ekadesena sammutiyākārena upalabbhanīyatā paṭikkhepassa cāti maggitabbo etthāpi adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:220_4: Nupalabbhatīti vacanasāmaññamattanti nupalabbhatīti idameva vacanaṃ anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittañcāti etaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:220_5: Yathā upalabbhatīti etasseva anujānanapaṭikkhepehi ahaṃ niggahetabbo,
tika-abh03t0:220_6: evaṃ nupalabbhatīti etasseva anujānanapaṭikkhepehi tvanti evaṃ sambhavantassa sāmaññena asambhavantassa kappanaṃ panettha chalavādo bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh03t0:220_7: Tena nupalabbhatīti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ chalavādassa kāraṇattā “chalavādo”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:220_9: Ṭhapanā niggahappaṭikammānaṃ pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ na hotīti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:220_10: Na hi pakkhaṭṭhapanena vinā purimaṃ anujānitvā pacchimassa avajānanaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:220_11: pacchimaṃ vā avajānantassa purimānujānanaṃ micchāti sakkā āropetunti.
tika-abh03t0:221_1: paṭijānantanti ca paccatte sāmiupayogavacanānīti adhippāyena “tvaṃyeva paṭijānanto”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:222_1: Catūhi pāpanāropanāhi niggahassa upanītattāti “dunniggahitā ca homa,
tika-abh03t0:222_3: mayā tava kato niggaho viya micchāti evaṃ tena anulomapañcake catūhi pāpanāropanāhi katassa niggahassa
tika-abh03t0:222_4: tena niyāmena dukkaṭabhāvassa attanā kataniggahena saha upanītattā aniggahabhāvassa vā upagamitattāti
tika-abh03t0:222_6: Evameva tena hi yaṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci…pe…
tika-abh03t0:222_7: idaṃ te micchāti etassa aniggahabhāvanigamanasseva niggamanacatukkatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:225_1: “Attano laddhiṃ nissāya paṭiññā paravādissā”ti vatvā puna “paramatthavasena puggalassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:225_2: Tatrāyaṃ paṭikkhepo attano laddhiyā yadi kato,
tika-abh03t0:225_3: paramatthato aññena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamassa laddhīti āpajjati.
tika-abh03t0:225_4: Tathā ca sati nāyaṃ sammutisaccavasena upaladdhiṃ icchantena niggahetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:225_5: Atha attano laddhiṃ niggūhitvā parassa laddhivasena paṭikkhipati,
tika-abh03t0:225_7: Na hi attano ca parassa ca laddhiṃ vadantassa doso āpajjatīti.
tika-abh03t0:225_8: Attano pana laddhiyā paṭijānitvā paraladdhiyā paṭikkhipantena attano laddhiṃ chaḍḍetvā paraladdhi gahitā
tika-abh03t0:230_1: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīreti ayamatthoti dassento āha “sarīraṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:230_3: Yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāya “sabbattha na upalabbhatī”ti vutte sarīrato bahi upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:230_4: tasmā paccanīke paṭikkhepo sakavādissāti etena na kenaci sabhāvena puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamattho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t0:230_5: Na hi kenaci sabhāvena upalabbhamānassa sarīratadaññāvimutto upaladdhiokāso atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:233_1: Purimapacchimajātikālañcāti majjhimajātikāle upalabbhamānassa tasseva purimapacchimajātikālesu upaladdhiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:233_2: Sesaṃ paṭhamanaye vuttasadisamevāti imesu tīsu paṭhame “sabbatthā”ti etasmiṃ naye vuttasadisameva, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh03t0:233_4: Idhāpi hi yasmā “sabbadā na upalabbhatī”ti vutte ekadā upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:236_1: Tatiyanaye ca yasmā “sabbesu na upalabbhatī”ti vutte ekasmiṃ upalabbhatīti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:239_3: Tattha anulomapañcakassa “sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādikassa attho “sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādipāḷiṃ
tika-abh03t0:239_4: saṃkhipitvā āgate sarūpena avutte “yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāyā”tiādinā vuttanayena veditabbo,
tika-abh03t0:239_5: paccanīkassa ca “sabbattha puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādikassa paṭikammakaraṇavasena vuttassa attho paṭikammādipāḷiṃ
tika-abh03t0:239_6: saṃkhipitvā ādimattadassanena āgate “puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādimhi anulome “sabbatthāti sarīraṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t0:239_7: anuyogo sakavādissā”tiādinā vuttanayena veditabboti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:239_9: tasminti evaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā tattha tesu tīsu mukhesūti attho gahetabbo.
