tika-abh03t0:345_6: Ettha ca purimanaye hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāhotibhāvo codito,
tika-abh03t0:345_7: dutiyanaye anāgatādīsu ekekassa hutvāhotināmatāti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-abh03t0:348_2: atthitāya paṭijānātīti ettha paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ tenāti etena anuvattamānāpekkhanavacanena kathaṃ vuccatīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:351_1: Yuttivirodho arahato sarāgādibhāve puthujjanena anānattaṃ brahmacariyavāsassa aphalatāti evamādiko daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:354_1: Tena kāraṇenāti atītaatthisaddānaṃ ekatthattā atthisaddatthassa ca nvātītabhāvato “atītaṃ nvātītaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:354_3: Ettha pana atītādīnaṃ atthitaṃ vadantassa paravādissevāyaṃ doso yathā āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:359_2: Vohāravasena avipakkavipākānaṃ atthitaṃ vadanto kathaṃ codetabboti vicāreti “kammupacayaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ saṅkhāraṃ icchantī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:362_2: lokuttarāyayeva vā paramatthasatipaṭṭhānattā tassā vasena lokuttarabhāvaṃ pucchanatthāyāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:365_0: 304. Ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattāti avattabbuttarena upekkhitabbena patiṭṭhāpitattāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:370_3: bāhirakānampi ca kāmesu vītarāgānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiyā abhāvo vuttoti.
tika-abh03t0:371_2: “kiṃ kāraṇā”ti pana kāraṇassa pucchitattā brahmacariyakathāyaṃ viya kāraṇattheti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:374_1: Vacībhedakathāyaṃ lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannoti paṭhamamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-abh03t0:375_1: Yena taṃ saddaṃ suṇātīti idaṃ vacīsamuṭṭhāpanakkhaṇe eva etaṃ saddaṃ suṇātīti icchite āropite vā yujjati.
tika-abh03t0:376_0: 332. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe vacībhedaṃ icchato parassa abhibhūsuttāharaṇe adhippāyo vattabbo.
tika-abh03t0:379_7: Muhuttaṃ muhuttanti pañho sakavādinā pucchito viya vutto,
tika-abh03t0:382_2: catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekamaggabhāvato na ekamaggassa bahubhāvāpatti,
tika-abh03t0:382_3: anupubbena ca sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetīti upapannanti paṭijānātīti.
tika-abh03t0:384_1: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti ettha paṭisambhidāñāṇehi saha aṭṭhasu gahitesu niruttipaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāhi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyā kathaṃ hotīti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:387_1: Vohārakathāyaṃ udāhu sotādīnipīti ekantalokiyesu visayavisayīsu visayasseva lokuttarabhāvo,
tika-abh03t0:387_6: evaṃ sotādīnaṃ āpannāti kinti tānipi lokuttarānīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:388_2: Na hi lokuttare paṭihaññatīti parikappitepi saddassa lokuttarabhāvo atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:388_6: Anekantatāti lokiyena ñāṇena jānitabbato lokiyoti etassa hetussa lokiye lokuttare ca sambhavato anekantabhāvo siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:391_1: Dve dukkhasaccāni na icchatīti yesaṃ dvinnaṃ dvīhi nirodhehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:391_2: tāni dve dukkhasaccāni na icchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:391_3: Ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhātiādinā paṭisaṅkhāya vinā niruddhā asamudācaraṇasaṅkhārā appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāti dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:391_5: Tena appaṭisaṅkhānirodho ca asamudācaraṇanirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:396_1: Indriyaparopariyattaṃ asādhāraṇanti yathā niddesato vitthārato sabbaṃ sabbākāraṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānādiṃ ajānantāpi “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
tika-abh03t0:396_2: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyyā”tiādinā ṭhānāṭṭhānāni uddesato saṅkhepato sāvakā jānanti,
tika-abh03t0:396_3: na evaṃ “āsayaṃ jānāti anusayaṃ jānātī”tiādinā uddesamattenapi indriyaparopariyattaṃ jānantīti “asādhāraṇa”nti āha.
tika-abh03t0:396_4: Therena pana saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvajānanamattaṃ sandhāya “sattānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:396_5: na yathāvuttaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ tathāgatabalanti ayamettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:396_7: evaṃ pana paṭijānantena “tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇa”nti idampi evameva paṭiññātaṃ siyāti kathamayaṃ codetabbo siyā.
tika-abh03t0:397_1: Sesesu paṭikkhepo sakavādissa ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīnaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇattā tattha sādhāraṇapakkhaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:400_1: Saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānantassa dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ samodhānaṃ kathaṃ āpajjati yathāvuttanayenāti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:400_3: So pana ekasmimpi āropetvā na ṭhapetabboti ekasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbena tena rahitatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:403_1: Jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ cittaṃ maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotīti etissā laddhiyā ko dosoti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:403_5: vayakkhaṇe vimuccamānanti vimuttavimuccamānavacanassa na codetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:403_8: ekadese vā vimuccamānassa ca vimuttakiriyāya ekadeso visesanaṃ hotīti “bhāvanapuṃsaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:406_1: Anulomagotrabhukkhaṇepi asamudācarantā maggakkhaṇepi pahīnā eva nāma bhaveyyunti laddhi uppannāti adhippāyena anulomagotrabhuggahaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh03t0:409_1: Indriyāni paṭilabhati appaṭiladdhindriyattā anindriyabhūtāni saddhādīni niyyānikāni bhāvento indriyāni paṭilabhati,
tika-abh03t0:412_3: Taṃmattamevāti purimaṃ maṃsacakkhumattameva dhammupatthaddhaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:412_5: Ettha ca visayassa dīpakaṃ ānubhāvagocarānameva asadisataṃ vadanto yādiso maṃsacakkhussa visayoti visayaggahaṇaṃ na visayavisesadassanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:412_6: atha kho yādise visaye ānubhāvagocaravisesā honti,
tika-abh03t0:413_0: Na ca maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchatīti dhammupatthaddhakāle purimaṃ maṃsacakkhumevāti na icchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:413_3: Rūpāvacarikānanti rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannāni mahābhūtāni rūpāvacarikānīti so icchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:413_5: Arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipatīti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacaraṃ na jātanti paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:414_1: Kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati,
tika-abh03t0:414_2: yena tīṇi cakkhūni dhammupatthambhena cakkhuntarabhāvaṃ vadato bhaveyyunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:417_1: Dibbena cakkhunā yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti yathākammūpagatañāṇassa upanissaye dibbacakkhumhi karaṇaniddeso kato,
tika-abh03t0:417_3: Taṃkiccakeyeva pana paro karaṇaniddesaṃ maññatīti āha “ayoniso gahetvā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:417_4: Yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhīti iminā vacanena dibbacakkhumeva yathākammūpagatañāṇanti evaṃ bhavitabbaṃ. Eva-
tika-abh03t0:417_5: saddo ca aṭṭhāne ṭhito dibbacakkhusaddassa parato yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:417_6: Yathākammūpagatañāṇassa hi so dibbacakkhuto atthantarabhāvaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t0:420_1: Cātumahārājikānaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarasabbhāvo āṭānāṭiyasuttena pakāsitoti “tāvatiṃse deve upādāyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:420_2: Evaṃ sati sugatikathāyaṃ “tāvatiṃse saṅgahitānaṃ pubbadevānaṃ surāpānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:420_4: taṃ tesaṃ surāpānaṃ asaṃvaro na hotī”ti vattabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:428_0: 388. Ayonisoti opapātiko hoti, tattha tassāyevūpapattiyā parinibbāyīti atthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:431_1: Samannāgatakathāyaṃ pattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānanto catūhi khandhehi viya samannāgamaṃ na vadatīti tassa
tika-abh03t0:434_1: Imināva nayenāti “tattha dve samannāgamā”tiādi sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:434_2: Tattha pattidhammo nāma rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmiṃ paṭhamajjhānādivasena pāpuṇantassa paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ paṭilābho.
tika-abh03t0:434_4: yena supanto sajjhāyādipasuto ca tehi samannāgatoti vuccatīti vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:437_2: Taṃ aggahetvā pattidhammavasena natthitāya bodhiyā samannāgato buddhoti yesaṃ laddhi,
tika-abh03t0:437_3: te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissāti yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:440_1: Bodhisattameva sandhāya vuttanti lakkhaṇasamannāgatesu abodhisatte chaḍḍetvā bodhisattameva gahetvā idaṃ suttaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:443_1: Ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇanti pāramīpūraṇeneva te “bodhiyā niyatā narā”ti vuccantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:443_2: Kevalañhi nantiādinā ca na niyāmakassa nāma kassaci uppannattā byākarontīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:446_1: Nippariyāyenevāti avasiṭṭhassa pahātabbassa abhāvā “sabbasaṃyojanappahāna”nti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh03t0:446_2: arahattamaggena pajahanato evāti gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:446_3: Appahīnassa abhāvāti avasiṭṭhassa pahātabbassa abhāvā paṭijānātīti vadanti,
tika-abh03t0:446_5: Evaṃ sati tena attano laddhiṃ chaḍḍetvā sakavādissa laddhiyā paṭiññātanti āpajjati.
tika-abh03t0:451_1: Phalañāṇaṃ na hotīti “vimuttānī”ti vā tadaṅgavimuttiyādibhāvato maggena pahīnānaṃ puna anuppattito ca “avimuttānī”ti vā na vattabbānīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:454_1: Na panetaṃ asekhanti etena asekhavisayattā asekhameva ñāṇanti parassa laddhi,
tika-abh03t0:457_3: Anicce niccantiādivipariyeso pana viparītañāṇaṃ nāmāti aññāṇepi ñāṇavohāraṃ āropetvā vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:460_2: yaṃ saccānulomaṃ maggañāṇānugatikaṃ passanto bhagavā “bhabbo”ti jānātīti laddhi.
tika-abh03t0:460_3: Paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvāti ettha “niyatassa aniyāmagamanāyā”ti viparītānuyogato pabhuti gaṇetvā “catuttha”nti āha.
tika-abh03t0:463_2: sabbaṃ lokuttaramevāti gaṇhantenapi sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:463_4: Tassa vā ñāṇataṃ na icchatīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:463_5: Pathavīkasiṇasammutiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇaṃ sandhāyāti anariyassa etaṃ ñāṇaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo siyā.
tika-abh03t0:466_1: Saccanti vacanasāmaññena ubhayassapi saccasāmaññattaṃ gahetvā vadatīti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:469_1: Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ manasikarototi etena purimā vattabbapaṭiññā anupadadhammamanasikārato aññaṃ samudāyamanasikāraṃ sandhāya katāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:472_1: Sabbasmimpīti “pāṭaliputtassa kho”tiādinā anāgate ñāṇanti vuttanti anāgatabhāvasāmaññena anantarānāgatepi ñāṇaṃ icchantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:475_3: Santatiṃ sandhāyāti bhaṅgānupassanānaṃ bhaṅgato anupassanāsantatiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:478_1: Buddhānaṃ viyāti yathā buddhā sabbappakāraphalaparopariyattajānanavasena attano eva ca balena phalaṃ jānanti,
tika-abh03t0:484_1: Aniyato nāma na hotīti yathā micchattaniyatassa bhavantare aniyataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t0:484_2: evaṃ etassa kadācipi aniyatatā na hotīti yo niyāmo,
tika-abh03t0:487_2: Etena ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo dhammaṭṭhitatāti etamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:493_1: Kariyamānā karīyatīti arūpakkhandhānaṃ pavattamānānaṃ samathavipassanānukkamena appavatti sādhīyatīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:493_2: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana abhāvenāti vadanto sabhāvadhammataṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh03t0:493_4: Asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hoti sabhāvadhammattāsādhakattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:501_1: Nānattavavatthānaṃ natthīti vadanto “tilamhi telaṃ anupaviṭṭha”nti vacanameva na yujjatīti “na heva”nti paṭikkhittanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:504_1: Phassādīnaṃ ekuppādatādivirahitā sahajātatā natthīti āha “sampayuttasahajātataṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:507_1: Deyyadhammavasena codetunti yadi cetasikova dhammo dānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:507_2: “diyyatīti dāna”nti imināpi atthena cetasikasseva dānabhāvo āpajjatīti codetunti attho.
tika-abh03t0:508_1: Aniṭṭhaphalantiādi acetasikassa dhammassa dānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttanti phaladānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ na vuttanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:508_2: Aniṭṭhaphalantiādinā acetasikassa dhammassa phaladānaṃ vuttaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh03t0:508_5: Evañca katvā anantaramevāha “na hi acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ detī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:508_6: Iṭṭhaphalabhāvaniyamanatthanti deyyadhammo viya kenaci pariyāyena aniṭṭhaphalatā dānassa natthi,
tika-abh03t0:509_1: Na pana ekenatthenāti “deyyadhammova dāna”nti imaṃ sakavādīvādaṃ nivattetuṃ “saddhā hiriya”ntiādikaṃ suttasādhanaṃ paravādīvāde yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:509_3: “cetasikova dhammo dāna”nti imaṃ nivattetuṃ “cetasiko dhammo dāna”nti imaṃ pana sādhetuṃ “saddhā hiriya”ntiādikaṃ sakavādīvāde yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:509_4: “idhekacco annaṃ detī”tiādikaṃ vā “deyyadhammo dāna”nti sādhetunti evaṃ nivattanasādhanatthanānattaṃ
tika-abh03t0:509_6: Tattha yathā paravādīvāde ca suttasādhanatthaṃ “na vattabbaṃ cetasiko dhammo dāna”nti pucchāyaṃ cetasikovāti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:509_7: tathā “na vattabbaṃ deyyadhammo dāna”nti pucchāya ca deyyadhammovāti.
tika-abh03t0:509_8: Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphaloti iṭṭhaphalābhāvamattameva paṭikkhittanti ettha “iṭṭhaphalabhāvamattameva paṭikkhitta”nti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti.
tika-abh03t0:509_10: Saṅkarabhāvamocanatthanti cetasikassa dātabbaṭṭhena deyyadhammassa ca iṭṭhaphalaṭṭhena dānabhāvamocanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:512_1: Paribhogamayaṃ nāma cittavippayuttaṃ puññaṃ atthīti laddhi.
tika-abh03t0:512_2: Tañhi te sandhāya paribhogamayaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti vadantīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:513_2: Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ viya etesampi samodhānaṃ siyāti paṭijānātīti vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:513_3: Pañcaviññāṇaphassādīnameva pana samodhānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānātīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:514_1: Aparibhuttepīti iminā “paṭiggāhako paṭiggahetvā na paribhuñjati chaḍḍetī”tiādikaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:514_2: Aparibhutte deyyadhamme puññabhāvato paribhogamayaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ayaṃ vādo hīyati.
tika-abh03t0:514_4: Cāgacetanāya eva hi puññabhāvo evaṃ siddho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:514_5: Aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññabhāve cāgacetanāya eva puññabhāvoti āha “sakavādīvādova balavā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:517_4: Iminā kāraṇenāti yadi yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:517_7: somanassaṃ paṭilabheyyunti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassapīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:520_1: Phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo hotīti phassena sabbampi kammavipākaṃ dassetvā puna attavajjehi sampayogadassanatthaṃ “so ca saññādayo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:520_2: Atthi ca nesanti sāvajjane cakkhuviññāṇādisahajātadhamme sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:520_4: tassa patthanāti iṭṭhavipāke eva patthanaṃ katvā kammaṃ karontīti kammūpanissayabhūtameva patthanaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:520_5: paccuppannavedanāpaccayaṃ vā taṇhaṃ upādānādinibbattanavasena dukkhassa pabhāvitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:521_0: 493. Sakasamayavasena ca codanāya payujjamānataṃ dassetuṃ “tesañca laddhiyā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:522_1: Paṭilābhavasenāti kamme sati pathaviyādīnaṃ paṭilābho hotīti kammaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:526_1: Pariyāyo natthīti sakavādinā attanā vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthīti abyākatānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa vipākanivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh03t0:527_2: taṃ akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassātiādinā rūpasseva dubbaṇṇatādassanena samamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:533_1: Tappaccayāpīti yassa vipākassa vipāko aññamaññapaccayo hoti tappaccayāpi aññamaññapaccayabhūtatopīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:533_2: So hītiādinā purimapaṭiññāya imassa codanassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:533_4: saddena sahajātādipaccaye saṅgaṇhitvā tesu tena tena paccayabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:541_1: Atidūrassa antaritassa pattabbassa desassa dassanato dibbacakkhuko viya.
tika-abh03t0:541_2: Ākāsena pathavantaraṭṭhānāni bhinditvā gamanato iddhimā viya.
tika-abh03t0:541_3: Na sahadhammenāti yadi so bhavānaṃ antarā na siyā,
tika-abh03t0:541_4: na nāma antarābhavoti paṭikkhepe karaṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:542_1: Tattha jātijarāmaraṇāni ceva cutipaṭisandhiparamparañca anicchantoti etena cutianantaraṃ antarābhavaṃ khandhāti,
tika-abh03t0:542_3: mātukucchimeva paviṭṭhā antaradhāyamānā maraṇanti na icchati.
tika-abh03t0:543_1: Yathā kāmabhavādīsu tattha tattheva punappunaṃ cavitvā upapattivasena cutipaṭisandhiparamparā hoti,
tika-abh03t0:543_2: evaṃ taṃ tattha na icchatīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:546_1: Kāmabhavassa kamanaṭṭhena kāmabhavabhāvo sabbepi kāmāvacarā khandhādayo kāmabhavoti iminā adhippāyena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:546_5: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāyāti pañceva kāmakoṭṭhāsā “kāmo”ti vuttāti kāmadhātūtivacanaṃ na aññassa
tika-abh03t0:546_6: nāmanti iminā adhippāyenevaṃ vacanamattaṃ nissāyāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:549_1: Rūpadhātukathāyaṃ rūpadhātūti vacanato rūpīdhammeheva rūpadhātuyā bhavitabbanti laddhi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:552_1: Imināvupāyenāti yathā hi purimakathāyaṃ rūpino dhammā avisesena “rūpadhātū”ti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:552_2: evamidhāpi arūpino dhammā avisesena “arūpadhātū”ti vuttāti tattha vuttanayo idhāpi samānoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:555_2: Nimittanti ghānādīnaṃ okāsabhāvena upalakkhitaṃ tathāvidhasaṇṭhānaṃ rūpasamudāyamāha.
tika-abh03t0:558_0: 524-526. Sukhumarūpaṃ atthi, yato nissaraṇaṃ taṃ āruppanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:561_4: sabbaṃ taṃ akusala”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:564_1: Arūpajīvitindriyantipañhe “atthi arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyū”tiādikaṃ pañhaṃ antaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-abh03t0:564_2: Arūpadhammānaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ jīvitindriyasantānaṃ nāma atthīti icchatīti ettha rūpārūpadhammānaṃ taṃ
tika-abh03t0:564_3: icchanto arūpadhammānaṃ icchatīti vattuṃ yuttoti “arūpadhammāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:565_0: 541. Sattasantāne rūpino vā dhammā hontūtiādināpi tameva jīvitindriyasantānaṃ vadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:566_0: 542. Pubbāparabhāgaṃ sandhāyāti samāpattiyā āsannabhāvato tadāpi samāpannoyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:570_1: Sesanti pāṇātipātādikammassa hetūti ito purimaṃ sotāpannādianuyogaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:570_2: Handa hīti paravādissevetaṃ sampaṭicchanavacananti sampaṭicchāpetunti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:570_3: “katamassa kammassa hetū”ti pana sakavādī taṃ sampaṭicchāpetuṃ vadatīti yujjeyya,
tika-abh03t0:570_4: sampaṭicchāpetunti pana pakkhaṃ paṭijānāpetunti atthaṃ aggahetvā paravādī attano laddhiṃ sakavādiṃ gāhāpetunti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:575_2: Nānācittavasena paṭijānantassa adhippāyamaddanaṃ kathaṃ yuttanti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:575_3: Ārammaṇavasena hi dassanadvayaṃ saha vadantassa tadabhāvadassanatthaṃ idaṃ āraddhanti yuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:575_4: Anussavavasenātiādinā na kevalaṃ aniccādiārammaṇameva ñāṇaṃ vipassanā,
tika-abh03t0:575_5: atha kho “anuppādo khema”ntiādikaṃ nibbāne ānisaṃsadassanañcāti dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:578_3: nibbānassetaṃ adhivacana”nti asaṃyojaniyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya khemādibhāvo vuttoti evamādinā suttabhayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:581_1: Ārammaṇatthassa vibhāgadassanatthanti paccayaṭṭho olubbhaṭṭhoti evaṃ vibhāge vijjamāne paccayolubbhānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:581_2: visesābhāvaṃ kappetvā akappetvā vā sappaccayattā olubbhārammaṇenapi sārammaṇamevāti na gahetabbanti dassanatthanti
tika-abh03t0:584_0: 554-556. Appahīnattāva atthīti vuccati, na pana vijjamānattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:593_1: Sabbasoti savitakkacittesu sabbattha sabbadā vāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “antamaso manodhātupavattikālepī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:596_0: 565. Anāpattīti visaṃvādanādhippāyassa abhāvā musāvādo na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:599_5: Lābhīti vuccati ayaṃ paṭilābhapaññatti nāmāti vā adhippāyo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:604_1: Bhavaṅgacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena sahevātiādiṃ vadantena kiriyakhandhānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇena saha upapattesiyā khandhā uppajjantīti ca vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:607_1: Taṃ lakkhaṇanti “cha viññāṇā”ti avatvā “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā”tiādinā vuttaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:607_2: “Cha viññāṇā”ti avacanaṃ panettha “no ca vata re vattabbe”tiādivacanassa kāraṇanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:608_2: Yaṃ tattha animittanti cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgikkhaṇe yaṃ animittaṃ gaṇhanto na nimittaggāhīti vutto,
tika-abh03t0:611_1: Kusalākusalavasena namīti kusalākusalabhāvena namitvā pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:611_2: Sā pana ārammaṇappakāraggahaṇaṃ yena alobhādīhi lobhādīhi ca sampayogo hotīti daṭṭhabbo “sukhamiti cetaso abhāgo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh03t0:614_4: Vītikkamaṃ viyāti yathā vītikkame kate dussīlo,
tika-abh03t0:614_5: evaṃ niruddhepīti evaṃ vītikkamena ninnānaṃ sallakkhentoti attho.
tika-abh03t0:617_1: Yena so sīlavāyeva nāma hotīti yena cittavippayuttena ṭhitena upacayena akusalābyākatacittasamaṅgī sīlavāyeva nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:617_2: Sesamettha “dānaṃ acetasika”nti kathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:623_1: Āṇattiyā ca pāṇātipātādīsu aṅgapāripūrinti ekasmiṃ divase āṇattassa aparasmiṃ divase pāṇātipātaṃ karontassa
tika-abh03t0:623_2: tadā sā āṇatti viññattiṃ vināyeva aṅgaṃ hotīti aviññatti dussīlyanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:629_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānanti pubbe ñāṇaṃanārammaṇantikathāyaṃ vuttehi andhakehi aññe idha mahāsaṅghikā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:629_2: Yadi aññāṇe vigatetiādinā rāgavigamo viya vītarāgapaññattiyā aññāṇavigamo ñāṇīpaññattiyā kāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:629_3: Na hi ñāṇaṃ assa atthīti ñāṇī,
tika-abh03t0:629_5: Yasmā ñāṇapaṭilābhenāti ettha ca ñāṇapaṭilābhena aññāṇassa vigatattā so ñāṇīti vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:632_0: 618-620. Itaro pana sakasamayeti paravādī attano samayeti attho.
tika-abh03t0:635_1: Kammassa vipākavasena vāti nirayaṃva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:635_2: Tattha hi abbudādiparicchedo tādisassa kammavipākassa vasena vutto.
tika-abh03t0:635_3: Vassagaṇanāya vāti manusse cātumahārājikādideve ca sandhāya.
tika-abh03t0:635_4: Tesañhi asaṅkhyeyampi kālaṃ vipākadānasamatthaṃ kammaṃ vassagaṇanāya paricchijjatīti.
tika-abh03t0:638_1: Samādhānaṭṭhenāti samaṃ ṭhapanaṭṭhena samādhi nāma cetasikantaraṃ atthīti aggahetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:638_2: Chalenāti ekacittakkhaṇikatte cakkhuviññāṇassa ca jhānacittassa ca na koci visesoti etena sāmaññamattenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:641_1: Anantarapaccayatañcevāti avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ anantarapaccayo avijjāya yā ṭhitatā tato hoti,
tika-abh03t0:641_2: tāya ṭhitatāya anantarapaccayabhāvasaṅkhātā ṭhitatā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:641_3: Anantarapaccayaggahaṇañcettha aññamaññapaccayabhāvarahitassa ekassa paccayassa dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:641_4: Tena hi sabbo tādiso paccayo dassito hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:641_7: Tattha avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya ṭhitatāya saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāya paccayabhāvasaṅkhātā ṭhitatā hoti,
tika-abh03t0:644_1: Rūpādayo viya parinipphannāti rūpādīhi saha uppajjitvā nirujjhanato parinipphannāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:644_2: Aniccatāvibhāgānuyuñjanavasenāti tīsu daṇḍesu daṇḍavohāro viya tīsu lakkhaṇesu aniccatāvohāro hotīti tassā vibhāgānuyuñjanavasenāti vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:652_1: Abyākataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepoti sakasamayalakkhaṇena paṭikkhepo katoti vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:652_2: Avipākacetanāya sarūpena dassitāya savipākāpi dassitāyeva nāma hotīti maññamāno āha “savipākāvipākacetanaṃ sarūpena dassetu”nti.
tika-abh03t0:655_1: Kammasamuṭṭhānā arūpadhammāvātiādinā kammasamuṭṭhānesu cakkhādīsupi vipākavohāro natthi,
tika-abh03t0:655_2: ko pana vādo akammasamuṭṭhāne saddeti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:658_0: 638-640. Tasmā vipākoti avisesena saḷāyatanaṃ vipākoti yesaṃ laddhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:661_3: Tvaṃ panassa niyāmaṃ icchasīti avinipātadhammatāphalappattīhi aññasmiṃ sattakkhattuparamabhāve ca niyāmaṃ icchasīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:662_0: Ānantariyābhāvanti yena so dhammābhisamayena bhabbo nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t0:662_8: tathāpi bhavaniyāmassa kassaci abhāvā bhabboti vuccati.
tika-abh03t0:662_9: Yathā kusalā abhiññācetanā kadāci vipākaṃ adadamānāpi sati kāraṇe dātuṃ bhabbatāya vipākadhammadhammā nāma,
tika-abh03t0:662_12: na ca indriyamudutā abhabbatākaro dhammoti na so abhabbo nāma.
tika-abh03t0:662_14: na pana antarā abhisametuṃ bhabbatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:662_17: Visesaṃ pana akatvā bhabbasabhāvatāya bhabboti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:662_18: Na bhavaniyāmakaṃ kiñcīti ettha passitvāti vacanaseso,
tika-abh03t0:670_1: Anantarāpayuttakathāyaṃ ānantariyaṃ payuttaṃ etenāti anantarāpayuttoti ānantariye anantarāsaddaṃ āropetvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ attho vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:673_1: Sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāmāti ettha appattaniyāmānaṃ dhamme sandhāya “tebhūmakadhammā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:673_2: Eteva hi sandhāya “tehi samannāgatopi aniyatoyevā”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:673_3: Iti imaṃ vohāramattaṃ gahetvā “niyato bodhisatto pacchimabhaviko bhabbo dhammaṃ abhisametuṃ okkamitu”nti
tika-abh03t0:673_6: dhammaṃ abhisametuṃ bhabbatā ca “niyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti vacanassa kāraṇabhāvena vuttā hoti,
tika-abh03t0:673_11: na ca taṃ atthīti dassanatthanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:676_1: Asātarāgakathāyaṃ “aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanāti iminā evaṃ pavattamānoyeva lobho idha “rāgo”ti adhippeto,
tika-abh03t0:680_2: tasmā abyākatāti kusalesu dhammesu lokuttaresu vā sabbesu taṇhā “dhammataṇhā”ti gahetvā yasmā sā taṇhā,
tika-abh03t0:680_5: tasmā akusalā na hotīti abyākatāti laddhīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:680_6: Tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṃkhipitvā dassitā,
tika-abh03t0:680_7: tasmā dhammataṇhāpi kāmataṇhādibhāvato na abyākatāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:685_1: Tanti kusalaṃ akusalañcāti visuṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:688_1: Keci vādino “aṅkure sākhāviṭapādisampannānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ bījamattaṃ āvibhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti vadantīti tesaṃ
tika-abh03t0:691_1: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti ettha “laddhivasena paṭijānātī”ti anantaruppattiṃ
tika-abh03t0:691_2: sallakkhentopi na so cakkhumhi rūpārammaṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ icchati,
tika-abh03t0:691_3: atha kho sotamhiyeva saddārammaṇanti anantarūpaladdhivasena āpannattā “paṭijānātī”ti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:694_0: 698-699. Sammāvācādi rūpaṃ maggo cāti icchanto “ariyarūpa”ntipi vadati.
tika-abh03t0:697_1: “Sarāgotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye rāgassa appahīnattā sarāgoti vattabbata”nti purimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:697_2: “sānusayotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye anusayassa appahīnattā sānusayoti vattabbata”nti pacchimapāṭho, so yutto.
tika-abh03t0:703_5: rūpadhātudhammesu aññatarabhāvena rūpadhātupariyāpannoti ca pucchitabhāvaṃ asallakkhentoti attho.
tika-abh03t0:706_5: tasmā sabbathāpi diṭṭhigataṃ “abyākata”nti na vattabbanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:709_1: Tasmāti yasmā diṭṭhirāgānaṃ samāne vikkhambhanabhāvepi “vītarāgo”ti vuccati,
tika-abh03t0:709_3: tasmā diṭṭhi lokiyapariyāpannā na hotīti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:709_4: Rūpadiṭṭhiyā abhāvā pana kāmadhātupariyāpannāya diṭṭhiyā bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:709_6: tathā ca sati kāmarāgo viya jhānalābhino diṭṭhipi vigaccheyyāti “vigatadiṭṭhiko”ti vattabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t0:709_9: Na hi sā tassa avigatā diṭṭhi kāmarāgo viya kāmadiṭṭhi yena kāmadhātuyā pariyāpannā siyāti vadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:714_1: Tasmā paccayatā vavatthitāti hetupaccayabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvādinā viya adhipatipaccayatādinā
tika-abh03t0:714_2: ca na bhavitabbanti hetupaccayabhāvoyevetassa vavatthito hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:717_1: Apuññābhisaṅkhārova gahito “nanu avijjā saṅkhārena sahajātā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:717_2: Sahajātaaññamaññaatthiavigatasampayuttavasenāti ettha nissayo kamabhedena atthiggahaṇena gahito hotīti na vutto,
tika-abh03t0:717_4: Vakkhati hi “tīṇi upādānāni avijjāya saṅkhārā viya taṇhāya paccayā hontī”ti,
tika-abh03t0:717_5: tasmā upādānehi samānā evettha saṅkhārānaṃ paccayatā dassitāti.
tika-abh03t0:720_1: Tatiyasaññāvedayitakathāyaṃ sesasatte sandhāyāti nirodhasamāpannato aññe yesaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:720_3: asaññasattānampi ca saññuppādā cutiṃ icchantīti sesasabbasatte sandhāyāti vā.
tika-abh03t0:721_0: 733-734. Suttavirodho siyāti idaṃ paravādiṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:724_1: Saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanā asaññasamāpattipīti laddhikittane saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanaṃ
tika-abh03t0:724_4: Yasmā asaññasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa alobhādayo atthīti ettha sakasamayasiddhā catutthajjhānasamāpatti “asaññasamāpattī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:725_2: na saññāya abhāvatoti catutthajjhānasamāpattimeva sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh03t0:729_1: Tasmāti tiṇṇampi ekakkhaṇe sabbhāvato tiṇṇaṃ phassānañca samodhānā ca ekattaṃ pucchatīti adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:735_3: evarūpaṃ nāma anuppadinnaṃ bhavituṃ na arahati aññassa asakkuṇeyyattāti laddhimattena paṭijānāti,
tika-abh03t0:738_1: Taṃcittatāyāti tadeva ārammaṇabhūtaṃ cittaṃ etassāti taṃcitto,
tika-abh03t0:738_4: Taṃ vā ālambakaṃ ālambitabbañca cittaṃ taṃcittaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:741_3: Yañcettha “atthi rūpaṃ arūpāvacara”nti arūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:746_1: Cittaṃ anādiyitvāti “kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato”ti vuttaṃ kiriyacittaṃ abyākataṃ anādiyitvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:749_1: Ayoniso gahetvāti aladdhavipākavārānampi kammānaṃ byantībhāvaṃ na vadāmīti atthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:749_2: Keci pana “kammānaṃ vipākaṃ appaṭisaṃviditvā puggalassa byantībhāvaṃ na vadāmīti evaṃ ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:750_1: Tāva na kamatīti laddhiyā paṭikkhipatīti tāva na kamati,
tika-abh03t0:750_2: tato paraṃ kamatīti laddhiyā paṭikkhipatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:750_3: Ettha kira “sati jīvite jīvitāvasese jīvitā voropetī”ti vacanato attano dhammatāya marantaṃ koṭṭentassa
tika-abh03t0:750_4: vā sīsaṃ vā chindantassa natthi pāṇātipātoti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:750_5: Pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittaupakkamamaraṇesu vijjamānesupi na tena upakkamena matoti natthi pāṇātipātoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:750_6: Evaṃ pana marantena tena ekacittavārampi dhammatāmaraṇato orato na matoti dubbiññeyyametaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:753_1: Bījato aṅkurassevāti yathā aṅkurassa abījato nibbatti natthi,
tika-abh03t0:753_2: tathā paccuppannapavattassapi akammato kammavipākato nibbatti natthi,
tika-abh03t0:753_4: Deyyadhammavasena dānaphalaṃ pucchatīti deyyadhammavasena yāya cetanāya taṃ deti,
tika-abh03t0:756_1: Vināpi aniccattenāti “yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu viya dukkhārammaṇattenapi dukkhaṃ vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:759_1: Navattabbaṃsaṅghodakkhiṇaṃvisodhetītikathāyaṃ na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkontīti yathā puggalo
tika-abh03t0:759_2: sīlaparisodhanādīni katvā nirodhampi samāpajjitvā visodhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh03t0:762_1: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathāyaṃ visujjheyyāti etassa atthaṃ dassento “mahapphalā bhaveyyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:762_2: Dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotīti paṭiggāhakanirapekkhā paṭiggāhakena paccayabhūtena vinā dāyakeneva mahāvipākacetanattaṃ āpādikā,
tika-abh03t0:762_4: Añño aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā nāma paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t0:762_7: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyyā”ti vuttanti?
tika-abh03t0:762_9: paṭiggāhakena vipākanibbattanampi pana dānacetanānibbattanena yadi bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t0:762_10: evaṃ sati añño aññassa kārakoti yuttarūpaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:770_0: 804-806. Tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sayameva ca āyasmatā ānandattherena desitoti vadati.
tika-abh03t0:773_1: Jhānasaṅkantikathāyaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāti paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vitakkavicārā ādīnavato manasikātabbā,
tika-abh03t0:773_2: tato dutiyajjhānena bhavitabbanti evaṃ yo upacārānaṃ jhānānañca anukkamo,
tika-abh03t0:776_1: Jhānantarikā nāma esāti paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññatarabhāvābhāvato na jhānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:776_2: atha kho dakkhiṇapubbādidisantarikā viya jhānantarikā nāma esāti. Katarā?
tika-abh03t0:779_1: Paṭijānanaṃ sandhāyāti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ manoviññāṇapaṭijānanaṃ kira sandhāyāti adhippāyo,
tika-abh03t0:779_2: tasmā “evaṃ sante rūpaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ āpajjatīti manoviññāṇapaṭijānanaṃ pana rūpadassanaṃ kathaṃ hotī”ti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:784_5: na ca uppannāti atīte kilese pajahatītiādi na vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:787_1: Anattalakkhaṇaṃ tāva ekaccanti arūpakkhandhānaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:787_3: Rūpakkhandhādīnañhi mā jīratu mā maratūti alabbhaneyyo avasavattanākāro anattatā,
tika-abh03t0:787_5: tañca “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti vuttattā arūpakkhandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannanti ayametesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:793_1: Rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātāti ettha rūpādīnaṃ sabhāvatāti rūpādisabhāvatāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:799_1: “Sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāyāti tāya jātiyā lokuttarasaddhādīnaṃ anuppattiṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t0:799_2: kataṃ avadhāraṇaṃ saṃsārakhāṇukabhāvaṃ sandhāya katanti maññamāno puthujjanassāyaṃ accantaniyāmatā,
tika-abh03t0:799_4: Vicikicchuppatti niyāmantaruppatti ca accantaniyāmanivattakā vicāretvā gahetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:802_1: Lokiyānampīti lokuttarānaṃ viya lokiyānampi saddhādīnaṃyeva saddhindriyādibhāvadassanena lokiyasaddhindriyādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t0:802_2: sādhetuṃ saddhādīnaṃyeva saddhindriyādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:807_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpetīti “dukkhaṃ parijānātī”ti vadanto idaṃ tava vacanaṃ lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti,
tika-abh03t0:807_4: tasmā na idaṃ sādhakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:813_1: Tassa atthitāya paṭiññāti tassa hatthināgassa ca dibbayānassa ca atthitāyāti visuṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:816_1: Ñāṇakathāyaṃ sace taṃ dvādasavatthukanti ettha ca “lokuttara”nti vacanaseso,
tika-abh03t0:816_2: taṃ vā lokuttarañāṇaṃ sace dvādasavatthukanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:816_5: saccañāṇaṃ pana maggakkhaṇepi parijānanādikiccasādhanavasena hotīti āha “saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:822_1: Tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttanti tīsupi pucchāsu “sāsana”ntiādivacanaṃ vuttanti samudāyā ekadesānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:825_1: Iddhikathāyaṃ atthi adhippāyaiddhīti adhippāyavasena ijjhanato adhippāyoti evaṃnāmikā iddhi atthīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:828_1: Dhammakathāyaṃ rūpaṭṭhato aññassa rūpassa abhāvāti yo rūpassa niyāmo vucceyya,
tika-abh03t0:828_2: so rūpaṭṭho nāma koci rūpato añño natthīti rūpaṭṭhato aññaṃ rūpañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:828_4: na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:828_6: Tattha rūpato aññassa rūpaṭṭhassa abhāve dassite rūpaṭṭhato aññassa rūpassa abhāvo dassitoyeva nāma hotīti
tika-abh03t0:828_7: tameva rūpato aññassa rūpaṭṭhassa abhāvaṃ dassento “rūpasabhāvo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:828_9: rūpassa attho rūpaṭṭhoti evaṃ aññattaṃ gahetvā viya pavatto rūpasabhāvavohāro rūpaṭṭhavohāro vā vedanādīhi
tika-abh03t0:828_10: nānattameva so sabhāvoti nānattasaññāpanatthaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:828_13: na vedanādisabhāva”nti avatvā “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vadato tañca vacanaṃ vuttappakārena sadosaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:828_14: atha kasmā “rūpañhi rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti rūpaṃ rūpameva,
tika-abh03t0:828_15: na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena vattabba”nti vadanto “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti paṭijānātīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:828_17: na parenāti paṭijānātīti na vattabbanti? Na,
tika-abh03t0:828_19: Vattabbanti vā sakavādinā vattabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:828_20: Yadi ca tena vattabbaṃ paṭijānāti ca so etamatthanti,
tika-abh03t0:828_21: atha kasmā paṭijānāti sakavādīti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh03t0:828_22: Atthantaravasenāti tattha vuttameva kāraṇaṃ nigūhitvā parena coditanti tameva kāraṇaṃ dassetvā codanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-abh03t0:828_23: Ito aññathāti rūpādisabhāvamattaṃ muñcitvā tena parikappitaṃ niyataṃ natthīti tassa parikappitassa nivattanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t0:839_1: Sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ disvā “gabbheyeva arahattappattihetubhūto indriyaparipāko atthī”ti “arahattappattipi atthī”ti maññati,
tika-abh03t0:839_2: ākāsasupinaṃ disvā “ākāsagamanādiabhiññā viya dhammābhisamayo arahattappatti ca atthī”ti maññatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:842_1: Na koci āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāmāti yathā bījaṃ catumadhurabhāvaṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-abh03t0:842_2: evaṃ bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ āsevanapaccayaṃ gaṇhanto āsevanto nāma koci natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:845_1: Pathaviyādirūpesu kesañci uppādo kesañci nirodhoti evaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ rūpasantatiyā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:845_3: yehi arūpasantatiyā viya rūpasantatiyā pavatti siyāti citte “citte mahāpathavī saṇṭhātī”tiādi coditaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:850_1: Karuṇādhippāyena ekādhippāyoti rāgādhippāyato aññādhippāyovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:850_2: Eko adhippāyoti ettha ekatobhāve ekasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:850_3: Samānatthe hi sati rāgādhippāyepi ekādhippāyenāti ekādhippāyatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:853_3: Issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā karīyatīti ettha dukkarakārikā nāma issariyakāmakārikāhetu
tika-abh03t0:853_5: issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma vinā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyamānā natthīti vā.
tika-abh03t0:856_1: Mettādayo sandhāya “mettādayo viya na rāgo rāgapatirūpako koci atthīti rāgameva gaṇhāti,
tika-abh03t0:859_1: Na aniccādibhāvanti ettha aniccādiko bhāvo etassāti aniccādibhāvanti rūpaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:859_2: “Na kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkha”nti vadantena “dukkhaññeva parinipphanna”nti dukkhasaccaṃ sandhāya pucchā katāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:859_3: Evaṃ sati tena “cakkhāyatanaṃ aparinipphanna”ntiādi na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:859_4: Na hi cakkhāyatanādīni anupādinnāni lokuttarāni vā.
tika-abh03t0:859_6: na pana rūpa”nti etaṃ rūpassa ca dukkhattā no vata re vattabbeti attho.
tika-abh03t0:866_0: Kathāvatthupakaraṇena saṅkhepeneva desitena dhammesu viparītaggahaṇaṃ nivāretvā tesveva dhammesu dhammasaṅgahādīsu
tika-abh03t0:866_1: pakāsitesu dhammapuggalokāsādinissayānaṃ sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayānaṃ vasena nānappakārakaosallatthaṃ yamakapakaraṇaṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:866_2: taṃ samayadesadesakavaseneva dassetvā saṃvaṇṇanākkamañcassa anuppattaṃ “āgato bhāro avassaṃ vahitabbo”ti
tika-abh03t0:867_0: Tattha yamassa visayātītoti jātiyā sati maraṇaṃ hotīti jāti,
tika-abh03t0:867_5: “Chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti vuttānaṃ channaṃ abhabbaṭṭhānānaṃ desakoti chaṭṭhānadesako.
tika-abh03t0:867_6: Ayamā ekekā hutvā āvattā nīlā amalā ca tanuruhā assāti ayamāvattanīlāmalatanuruho.
tika-abh03t0:871_1: Yamakānaṃ vasena desitattāti iminā dasasu ekekassa yamakasamūhassa taṃsamūhassa ca sakalassa pakaraṇassa yamakānaṃ vasena laddhavohārataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:872_0: Kusalākusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena atthayamakanti etena “ye keci kusalā dhammā,
tika-abh03t0:872_1: sabbe te kusalamūlā”ti etasseva yamakabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t0:872_2: Nāpajjati ñātuṃ icchitānaṃ dutiyapaṭhamapucchāsu vuttānaṃ kusalakusalamūlavisesānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:872_3: kusalamūlakusalavisesehi vā ñātuṃ icchitānaṃ paṭhamadutiyapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitānaṃ kusalakusalamūlānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:872_6: taṃvisesavataṃ vā dhammānañca visesāpekkhānaṃ ettha padhānabhāvoti ekekāya pucchāya ekeko eva attho saṅgahito hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:872_7: Atthasaddo cettha na dhammavācako hetuphalādivācako vā,
tika-abh03t0:873_0: Tīṇipi padāni ekato katvāti idaṃ nāmapadassa kusalādīnaṃ saṅgāhakattamattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:873_2: Sabbakusalādisaṅgaṇhanatthameva ca nāmapadassa vuttattā “kusalattikamātikāya catūsu padesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:876_1: Aññamaññayamake ye keci kusalāti apucchitvāti ettha yathā dutiyayamake “ye keci kusalamūlā”ti apucchitvā “ye keci kusalā”ti pucchā katā,
tika-abh03t0:876_2: evamidhāpi “ye keci kusalā”ti pucchā kātabbā siyā purimayamakavisiṭṭhaṃ apubbaṃ gahetvā pacchimayamakassa appavattattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:876_4: Purimapucchāya pana atthavasena katāya tadanurūpāya pacchimapucchāya bhavitabbaṃ anulome vigatasaṃsayassa paṭilome saṃsayuppattito.
tika-abh03t0:876_5: Tena na ca pacchimapucchānurūpāya purimapucchāya bhavitabbanti purimovettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t0:876_6: Imināpi byañjanena tassevatthassa sambhavatoti idamevaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:876_7: Na hi kusalabyañjanattho eva kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanattho,
tika-abh03t0:876_9: Kusalabyañjanena hi pucchāya katāya “avasesā”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne “avasesā kusalā dhammā”ti vattabbaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:876_11: na ca tāni vacanāni samānatthāni kusalakusalābyākatadīpanatoti.
tika-abh03t0:876_13: “ye keci kusalā”ti imināpi byañjanena “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti vuttabyañjanatthasseva sambhavato
tika-abh03t0:876_14: dutiyayamake viya apucchitvā “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti pucchā katā.
tika-abh03t0:876_15: Na hi kusalamūlehi viya kusalamūlena ekamūlehi aññe kusalā santi,
tika-abh03t0:877_0: Paṭilomapucchāvaṇṇanāyaṃ “kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti hi pucchāya katāya “mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī”ti
tika-abh03t0:877_1: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:877_4: sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti ca pucchite “āmantā” icceva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:877_5: Na hi kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlesu kiñci ekamūlaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:877_6: yena anulomapucchāya viya vibhāgo kātabbo bhaveyya.
tika-abh03t0:877_8: tattha tāni aññamaññamūlāni ekamūlāni ca dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ ekekena aññamaññekamūlattā.
tika-abh03t0:877_11: na ekamūlānīti etassa gahaṇassa nivāraṇatthaṃ “mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī”tiādinā vissajjanaṃ kātabbanti ce? Na,
tika-abh03t0:877_12: “āmantā”ti imināva vissajjanena taṃgahaṇanivāraṇato anulomapucchāvissajjanena ca ekato uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:877_17: Tesu hi ekekaṃ itarena mūlena taṃmūlehi aññehi samānamūlanti.
tika-abh03t0:878_0: Aññamaññamūlatte pana nicchite ekamūlattasaṃsayābhāvato “sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti pucchā na katāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:878_2: samānatthena ekaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti ekamūlā”ti ubhayampi vacanaṃ mūlayuttatameva vadati,
tika-abh03t0:878_4: Tattha mūlayogasāmaññe ekamūlatte nicchite tabbiseso aññamaññamūlabhāvo na nicchito hotīti anulomapucchā pavattā,
tika-abh03t0:878_5: mūlayogavisese pana aññamaññamūlatte nicchite na vinā ekamūlattena aññamaññamūlattaṃ atthīti mūlayogasāmaññaṃ ekamūlattaṃ nicchitameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:878_6: tasmā “ekamūlā”ti pucchaṃ akatvā yathā kusalamūlavacanaṃ ekamūlavacanañca kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti
tika-abh03t0:878_7: kusalabhāve saṃsayasabbhāvā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti paṭilomapucchā katā,
tika-abh03t0:878_8: evaṃ aññamaññamūlavacanaṃ kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti kusalabhāve saṃsayasabbhāvā kusalādhikārassa ca
tika-abh03t0:878_9: anuvattamānattā “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti paṭilomapucchā katāti.
tika-abh03t0:879_1: Mūlanaye vutte eva atthe kusalamūlabhāvena mūlassa visesanena samānena mūlena aññamaññassa ca mūlena
tika-abh03t0:879_2: mūlayogadīpanena cāti iminā pariyāyantarena pakāsetuṃ mūlamūlanayo vutto.
tika-abh03t0:879_4: kārena tīsupi yamakesu mūlayogameva dīpetuṃ mūlakanayo vutto.
tika-abh03t0:880_1: Abbohārikaṃ katvāti na ekamūlabhāvaṃ labhamānehi ekato labbhamānattā sahetukavohārarahitaṃ katvā.
tika-abh03t0:880_2: Na vā sahetukaduke viya ettha hetupaccayayogāyogavasena abbohārikaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:880_5: Ekato labbhamānakavasenāti ahetukacittuppādanibbānehi hetupaccayarahitehi saha labbhamānakarūpavasenāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:881_3: tattha “ye keci nāmā dhammā”ti nāmānaṃ niddhāritattā “ahetukaṃ sahetuka”nti ca vutte “nāma”nti ca idaṃ viññāyamānamevāti na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:887_1: Khandhayamake chasu kālabhedesu puggalaokāsapuggalokāsavasena khandhānaṃ uppādanirodhā tesaṃ pariññā ca vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:887_2: Te pana khandhā “rūpakkhandho”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:887_7: so eva avayavapadassāti etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne rūpādiavayavapadehi vutto ekadeso sakalo vā samudāyapadānaṃ attho,
tika-abh03t0:887_8: samudāyapadehi pana vutto ekantena rūpādiavayavapadānaṃ atthoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
tika-abh03t0:888_0: Puna “rūpakkhandho”tiādīnaṃ samāsapadānaṃ uttarapadatthappadhānattā padhānabhūtassa khandhapadassa vedanādiupapadatthassa
tika-abh03t0:888_1: ca sambhavato yathā “rūpakkhandho”ti etasmiṃ pade rūpāvayavapadena vuttassa rūpakkhandhabhāvo hoti rūpasaddassa

tika-abh03t0:930_1: tāva uppajjatīti pana atthe gayhamāne pucchādvayavissajjanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:930_2: Evañca sati “yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh03t0:930_7: no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatī”ti evamādīsu gabbhaseyyakāpi pacchimabhavikādayo upapajjantā gahitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:930_8: Evañca katvā indriyayamake “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:930_11: Somanassindriyuppādakassa kammassa ekantena cakkhundriyuppādanato gabbhepi yāva cakkhundriyuppatti,
tika-abh03t0:931_0: Yaṃ pana “yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t0:931_5: no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”ti ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:931_6: taṃ ye ekādasamasattāhā orato kālaṃ karissanti,
tika-abh03t0:931_7: tesaṃ ghānāyatanānibbattakakammena gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:931_12: rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t0:931_13: no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti hi ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantāna”nti vacanaṃ
tika-abh03t0:931_14: anuppanneyeva ghānāyatane gabbhaseyyakānaṃ cuti atthīti dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:931_15: Na hi kāmāvacare gabbhaseyyakato añño aghānako atthi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh03t0:931_17: Atha kasmā opapātike eva sandhāya idha,
tika-abh03t0:931_18: indriyayamake ca yathādassitāsu pucchāsu “āmantā”ti vuttanti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t0:931_19: Yamake sanniṭṭhānena gahitatthassa ekadese saṃsayatthasambhavena paṭivacanassa akaraṇato.
tika-abh03t0:931_23: Atha kasmā “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:931_25: Āmantā”ti iminā “gabbhaseyyakānaṃ somanassapaṭisandhi natthī”ti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t0:931_27: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasindriyāni pātubhavanti kāyindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t0:931_28: manindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā jīvitindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā saddhindriya”ntiādivacanato.
tika-abh03t0:932_0: Nirodhavāre anāgatakālabhede yathā tasseva cittassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppattikkhaṇe vutto,
tika-abh03t0:932_1: evaṃ tasseva kammajasantānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppāde vattabboti sabbattha upapajjantānaṃ eva so tathā vutto,
tika-abh03t0:932_3: Uppannānaṃ pana aññassa anāgatassa santānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena vattabbo,
tika-abh03t0:932_5: Tassa hi uppādānantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:932_6: Tasmā arahataṃ pavatte sotassa cakkhussa ca bhede satipi anāgatakālāmasanavaseneva “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati,
tika-abh03t0:932_11: Yasmā ca upapattianantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti,
tika-abh03t0:932_13: tasmā pavatte niruddhepi santānekadese aniruddhaṃ upādāya aniṭṭhitanirodhoti cutiyāva tassa nirodhoti vuccati.
tika-abh03t0:932_14: Vakkhati hi “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t0:932_17: tenetthāpi cutinirodhe eva ca adhippete yañca pavatte nirujjhissati,
tika-abh03t0:932_18: tañca niṭṭhānavasena cutiyā eva nirujjhissatīti vuttanti “āmantā”ti yuttaṃ paṭivacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:933_3: acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t0:933_4: no ca tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ettha āruppe pacchimabhavike ṭhapetvā sabbe upapajjantā,
tika-abh03t0:933_6: Te hi dutiyakoṭṭhāsena saṅgayhantīti tadapekkhattā sāvasesamidaṃ sabbavacanaṃ acakkhukavacanañcāti.
tika-abh03t0:933_7: “Āruppe pacchimabhavikāna”nti ettha ca arūpato pañcavokāraṃ agacchantā anaññūpapattikāpi “arūpe pacchimabhavikā”icceva saṅgayhantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:937_1: Labbhamānānanti idaṃ pavattivāre saddadhātusambandhānaṃ yamakānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātādisambandhānañca
tika-abh03t0:942_2: Āmantā”ti ettha kiñcāpi dukkhadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhanti tīsupi dukkhasaddo pavattati,
tika-abh03t0:942_4: so pana dukkhadukkhato aññattha pavattamāno aññanirapekkho nappavattati.
tika-abh03t0:942_5: Suddhañcettha dukkhapadaṃ aññanirapekkhaṃ gahetvā paṇṇattisodhanaṃ karoti,
tika-abh03t0:942_6: tena nippariyāyato dukkhasabhāvattā eva yaṃ dukkhadukkhaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:942_9: Suddhasaccavāre saccavibhaṅge vuttesu samudayesu koci phaladhammesu natthi,
tika-abh03t0:942_10: na ca phaladhammesu koci nirodhoti vuccamāno atthi,
tika-abh03t0:943_0: Atha vā padasodhanena padesu sodhitesu saccavisesanabhūtā eva dukkhādisaddā idha gahitāti viññāyanti.
tika-abh03t0:943_2: saccānañca tabbisesanayogavisesaṃ dīpetuṃ suddhasaccavāro vuttoti saccavisesanānaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ ekantasaccattā “dukkhaṃ saccaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t0:943_6: evaṃ khandhayamakādīsupi suddhakhandhādivāresu khandhādivisesanabhūtānameva rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:943_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yasmā piyarūpasātarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vā rūpaṃ hotu bhūtupādārūpaṃ vā,
tika-abh03t0:943_9: tasmā āmantāti paṭijānātī”ti vacanena rūpādicakkhādidukkhādiggahaṇehi suddhakhandhādivāresupi khandhādivisesanato
tika-abh03t0:946_1: Antamaso suddhāvāsānampīti idaṃ tesaṃ ariyattā dukkhasaccena upapajjane āsaṅkā siyāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:946_3: Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena sabbe upapajjantā pavattiyaṃ catuvokāre maggaphalato
tika-abh03t0:946_4: aññacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino pañcavokāre ca sabbacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino saṅgahitāti tesveva
tika-abh03t0:946_5: sanniṭṭhānena nicchitesu keci “pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti etena dukkhasamudayesu
tika-abh03t0:946_8: Na hi tesu maggaphaluppādasamaṅgīsu pasaṅgatā atthi taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ sanniṭṭhānena aggahitattāti.
tika-abh03t0:946_9: Idaṃ idha na gahetabbanti idaṃ catuvokāre phalasamāpatticittaṃ idha saccānaṃ uppādavacane na gahetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:947_0: Ettha ca sabbesaṃ upapajjantānanti idaṃ kammajapavattassa paṭhamuppādadassanena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:947_2: Pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ pana samudayasaccuppādavomissassa dukkhasaccuppādassa taṃrahitassa dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:947_4: Tesaṃ pana asaññasattānaṃ pavattiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo sabbattha na gahito,
tika-abh03t0:947_7: Tesaṃ tasmiṃ upapattikkhaṇe ca taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabboti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:947_9: tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatī”ti etassa vissajjane pacchimakoṭṭhāse “itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:947_10: pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca uppajjissatī”ti idaṃ na yujjeyya.
tika-abh03t0:947_11: Na hi upapattikkhaṇe cittuppattikkhaṇe ca samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti.
tika-abh03t0:947_12: Tasmā upapattikkhaṇataṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ puggalānaṃ yasmiṃ kāmāvacarādiokāse sā upapatti cittuppatti ca pavattamānā,
tika-abh03t0:947_17: okāso pana yattha te, so evāti.
tika-abh03t0:948_0: “Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āruppe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tika-abh03t0:948_1: samudayasaccañca nuppajjati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjatī”ti ettha pana “pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh03t0:948_3: na kammajādirūpaṃ cittaṃ anapekkhitvāva uppajjanatoti keci vadanti.
tika-abh03t0:948_4: “Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena gahito puggalo na cittaṃ apekkhitvāva gahito,
tika-abh03t0:948_6: tasmā “tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena ca na cittāpekkhameva dukkhasaccaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:948_7: atha kho yaṃ kiñcīti cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yaṃ kiñci dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti ayamattho viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t0:948_8: Na hi yamake vibhajitabbe avibhattā nāma pucchā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:949_0: “Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye cittevattamāne”ti idaṃ sabbantimena paricchedena yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t0:949_3: Tasmiṃ pana dassite tena samānagatikattā dutiyākusalacittato purimasabbacittasamaṅgino teneva dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:949_4: Tesampi hi tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjitthāti.
tika-abh03t0:949_5: Evañca katvā “itaresaṃ catuvokārapañcavokārāna”nti ettha yathāvuttā suddhāvāsā aggahitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:949_7: tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa vissajjane “suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti
tika-abh03t0:949_9: dassitā hontīti na te “itaresa”nti etena gayhanti,
tika-abh03t0:949_13: Na hi te pubbe vuttā vajjetabbā santi pañcavokārā viya yathāvuttā suddhāvāsāti.
tika-abh03t0:949_14: “Abhisametāvīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjittha maggasaccañca uppajjitthā”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t0:949_15: puggalokāsā aññamaññaparicchinnā gahitāti yasmiṃ okāse abhisametāvino,
tika-abh03t0:949_17: Tena ye kāmāvacare rūpāvacare arūpāvacare vā abhisametāvino rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ vā upapannā,
tika-abh03t0:949_20: te pana purimakoṭṭhāse “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti evaṃ dassitehi suddhāvāse anuppannābhisamayehi samānagatikāti visuṃ na dassitā.
tika-abh03t0:949_21: “Anabhisametāvīna”nti gahitā ye sabbattha tattha ca anabhisametāvino,
tika-abh03t0:949_22: tesu suddhāvāsānaṃ gahaṇakālavisesanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:950_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissantīti etena vodānacittasamaṅginā samānagatikā tato purimataracittasamaṅginopi
tika-abh03t0:951_0: Pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti āgataṭṭhāne paṭisandhicittassapi bhaṅgakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:951_1: tathā “pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti āgataṭṭhāne ca cuticittassapi uppādakkhaṇassāti.
tika-abh03t0:951_3: tassa samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti etassa vissajjane dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu “arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe”icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:951_5: Ekassapi maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgino ubhayakoṭṭhāsabhajanato.
tika-abh03t0:951_6: Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu hi arupe maggaphalabhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīsu
tika-abh03t0:951_7: kesañci tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ dvinnañca maggānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ nirantaraṃ anuppādetvā antarantarā
tika-abh03t0:951_8: vipassanānikantiṃ bhavanikantiṃ uppādetvā ye uparimagge uppādessanti,
tika-abh03t0:951_9: tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti tesaṃyeva pana kesañci antarā taṇhaṃ anuppādetvā uparimaggauppādentānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:951_11: Sāmaññavacanenapi ca purimakoṭṭhāse vuccamānena pacchimakoṭṭhāse vakkhamāne vajjetvāva gahaṇaṃ hotīti dassitoyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh03t0:954_2: tissopettha pariññā labbhantīti ettheva visesanaṃ khandhayamakādīsu sabbakhandhādīnaṃ viya sabbasaccānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:954_4: Dukkhassa pariññatthaṃ samudayassa ca pahānatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti pariññāpahānaṃ saccesu dassetuṃ dukkhe tīraṇapariññā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:954_9: Maggañāṇañhi dukkhasamudayāni vibhāvetīti ñātapariññā ca hoti,
tika-abh03t0:954_11: samudayassa appavattikaraṇatova pahānapariññā cāti tissopi pariññā maggakkhaṇe eva yojetabbāti.
tika-abh03t0:959_1: Khandhādayo viya pubbe avibhattā kāyasaṅkhārādayoti tesaṃ aviññātattā “assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā tayo saṅkhāre vibhajati.
tika-abh03t0:959_2: Kāyassa saṅkhāroti paṭhame atthe sāmiatthe eva sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:959_6: So pana karaṇavacanassa atthoti katvā “karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:960_1: Suddhikaekekapadavasena atthābhāvatoti padasodhanataṃmūlakacakkavārehi yopi attho dassito dvīhi padehi labbhamāno eko assāsapassāsādiko,
tika-abh03t0:960_2: tassa suddhikehi kāyādipadehi suddhikena ca saṅkhārapadena avacanīyattā yathā rūpapadassa khandhekadeso
tika-abh03t0:960_3: khandhapadassa khandhasamudāyo padasodhane dassito yathādhippeto attho atthi,
tika-abh03t0:960_5: Kāyo kāyasaṅkhārotiādi pana vattabbaṃ siyāti yadi visuṃ adīpetvā samudito kāyasaṅkhārasaddo ekattha dīpeti,
tika-abh03t0:960_6: kāyasaṅkhārasaddo kāyasaṅkhāratthe vattamāno khandhasaddo viya rūpasaddena kāyasaddena visesitabboti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-abh03t0:960_7: Suddhasaṅkhāravāro hesāti etena imassa vārassa padasodhanena dassitānaṃ yathādhippetānameva gahaṇato
tika-abh03t0:960_8: tesañca kāyādipadehi aggahitattā “kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādivacanassa ayuttiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:960_9: Idha pana saṅkhārayamake kāyādipadānaṃ saṅkhārapadassa ca asamānādhikaraṇattā “kāyo saṅkhāro,
tika-abh03t0:960_10: saṅkhārā kāyo”tiādimhi vuccamāne adhippetatthapariccāgo anadhippetatthapariggaho ca kato siyāti suddhasaṅkhārataṃmūlacakkavārā na vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:960_11: Padasodhanavārataṃmūlacakkavārehi pana asamānādhikaraṇehi kāyādipadehi saṅkhārasaddassa visesanīyatāya
tika-abh03t0:960_12: dassitāya saṃsayo hoti “yo atthantarappavattinā kāyasaddena visesito kāyasaṅkhāro,
tika-abh03t0:960_13: eso atthantarappavattīhi vacīcittehi visesito udāhu añño”ti.
tika-abh03t0:960_15: Ettha tesaṃ aññattha dassanatthaṃ “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”tiādinā anulomapaṭilomavasena cha yamakāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:960_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana suddhasaṅkhāravāraṭṭhāne vuttattā ayaṃ nayo suddhasaṅkhāravāroti vutto.
tika-abh03t0:963_1: Pavattivāre saṅkhārānaṃ puggalānañca okāsattā jhānaṃ bhūmi ca visuṃ okāsabhāvena gahitāti puggalavāre
tika-abh03t0:963_2: ca okāsavasena puggalaggahaṇena tesaṃ dvinnaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena gahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:963_3: tasmā “vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti dutiyatatiyajjhānokāsavasena gahitā puggalā visesetvā dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:963_4: Puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānanti jhānokāsavasena puggalaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:963_7: Tena rūpārūpāvacaresu paṭhamajjhānasamāpannake kāmāvacare gabbhagatādike ca nivatteti.
tika-abh03t0:963_8: Kāmāvacarānampi hi gabbhagatādīnaṃ vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh03t0:963_10: Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppādakkhaṇeti etena pana dassitā puggalā paṭhamajjhānokāsā kāmāvacarādiokāsā
tika-abh03t0:964_1: “Paṭhamajjhāne kāmāvacareti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ uppanne paṭhamajjhāne”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:964_2: etasmiṃ pana atthe sati “catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha cittasaṅkhāro uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:964_3: no ca tattha kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjatī”ti etthāpi rūpārūpāvacarabhūmīsu uppanne catutthajjhāneti attho bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t0:964_4: so ca aniṭṭho bhūmīnaṃ okāsabhāvasseva aggahitatāpattito,
tika-abh03t0:964_6: tasmā jhānabhūmokāsānaṃ saṅkaraṃ akatvā visuṃ eva okāsabhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:964_7: Paṭhamajjhānokāsepi hi kāyasaṅkhāro ca uppajjati vacīsaṅkhāro ca uppajjati kāmāvacarokāse ca.
tika-abh03t0:964_8: Yadipi na sabbamhi paṭhamajjhāne sabbamhi ca kāmāvacare dvayaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:964_9: tattha pana taṃdvayuppatti atthīti katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:964_10: Visuṃ okāsattā ca “aṅgamattavasena cetthā”tiādivacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:964_11: Imamhi ca yamake avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ vicāravasena paṭhamajjhāne saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:964_12: Muddhabhūtaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ gahetvā itaraṃ asaṅgahitanti vā.
tika-abh03t0:964_14: Na hi te asaññasattā viya okāse hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:965_1: Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāneti tesaṃ paṭhamato avitakkaavicārato dutiye savitakkasavicārepi bhavanikantiāvajjane
tika-abh03t0:965_2: vattamāne ubhayaṃ nuppajjitthāti dassentena tato purimacittakkhaṇesupi nuppajjitthāti dassitameva hoti.
tika-abh03t0:965_3: Yathā pana cittasaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:965_4: evaṃ vacīsaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ “dutiye citte vattamāne”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:970_2: khandhādīsu tīraṇabāhullato khandhādiyamakehi tīraṇapariññañca vibhāvetvā anusayapahānantā pahānapariññāti
tika-abh03t0:970_3: pahātabbamuddhabhūtehi anusayehi pahānapariññaṃ vibhāvetuṃ anusayayamakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:970_5: Tīhākārehi anusayānaṃ gāhāpanaṃ tesu tathā aggahitesu anusayavārādipāḷiyā duravabodhattā.
tika-abh03t0:971_0: Ayaṃ panettha purimesūti etesu sānusayavārādīsu purimesūti attho.
tika-abh03t0:971_1: Atthavisesābhāvato “kāmadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa kāmadhātuyā cutassa,
tika-abh03t0:971_2: rūpadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa kāmadhātuyā cutassā”ti evamādīhi avuccamāne kathamayaṃ yamakadesanā siyāti?
tika-abh03t0:971_4: purimavārehi pana yamakavasena desitānaṃ anusayānaṃ cutiupapattivasena anusayaṭṭhānaparicchedadassanaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:971_5: Yamakadesanābāhullato pana sabbavārasamudāyassa anusayayamakanti nāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:971_7: atthavisesābhāvato pana na vuttāti labbhamānatāvasena etissāpi desanāya yamakadesanatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:972_0: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti etena kāraṇalābhe uppattiarahataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:972_1: Appahīnā hi anusayā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
tika-abh03t0:972_2: Yāva ca maggena tesaṃ anuppattiarahatā na katā hoti,
tika-abh03t0:972_10: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ pana labhitvā ye uppajjiṃsu uppajjamānā ca,
tika-abh03t0:972_11: tepi appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā ahesuṃ bhavanti ca.
tika-abh03t0:972_12: Uppattiarahatāya eva ca te uppajjiṃsu uppajjanti ca,
tika-abh03t0:972_13: na ca atītānāgatapaccuppannato aññe uppattiarahā nāma atthi,
tika-abh03t0:972_17: maggassa pana tādisānaṃ anuppattiarahatāpādanena anusayappahānaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:972_20: dhammo eva ca uppajjatīti iminā adhippāyenāha “appahīnākāro ca uppajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjatī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:972_21: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena santāne anusentīti anusayā,
tika-abh03t0:972_23: nanu sattānusayato aññesampi kilesānaṃ appahīnattā anusayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t0:972_27: tasmā appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagato kilesoyeva anusayo nāmāti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:972_28: Thāmagatanti ca aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:972_29: Tathā hi dhammasabhāvabodhinā tathāgatena imeyeva “anusayā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:973_1: evaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ siyāti uppajjanavārena “uppajjatī”ti vacanassa avuttatā sakkā vattunti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh03t0:973_3: “Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjatī”ti hi etasmiṃ atthe avisiṭṭhepi “anusetī”ti vacanaṃ santāne anusayitataṃ thāmagatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:973_5: kassaci visesassa abhāvā uppajjanavāro na vattabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t0:973_8: anusayasaddassa sabbadā vijjamānānaṃ aparinipphannasayanatthatāya nivāraṇatthaṃ uppattiarahatāya thāmagatabhāvasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh03t0:973_9: yathādhippetasayanatthassa dassanatthaṃ “anusentīti anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantī”ti yaṃ uppattiyoggavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:976_1: Kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsūti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ sukhāya ca upekkhāya cāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāmadhātuggahaṇaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ visesanabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:976_2: evaṃ sati kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānatā na vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:976_3: Dvīsu pana rāgesu bhavarāgassa tīsu dhātūsu rūpārūpadhātūnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā vuttāti kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:976_4: Dhātuvedanāsabbasakkāyapariyāpannavasena hi tippakāraṃ anusayānaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:976_5: Tasmā tīsu dhātūsu kāmadhātuyā tīsu vedanāsu dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetīti visuṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā dhātuyā vedanānañca yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:976_6: Dvīsu vedanāsūti idañca vedanāsu anusayamāno kāmarāgānusayo dvīsveva anuseti,
tika-abh03t0:976_7: na tīsūti tiṇṇampi ṭhānatānivāraṇatthameva vuttanti na sabbāsu dvīsu anusayanappatto atthi,
tika-abh03t0:976_8: tena vedanāvisesanatthaṃ na kāmadhātuggahaṇena koci attho.
tika-abh03t0:976_9: Bhavarāgānusayanaṭṭhānañhi aṭṭhānañca anusayānaṃ apariyāpannaṃ sakkāye kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti pākaṭametaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:976_10: Yathā ca “dvīsu vedanāsū”ti vutte paṭighānusayānusayaṭṭhānato aññā dve vedanā gayhanti,
tika-abh03t0:976_11: evaṃ bhavarāgānusayānusayanaṭṭhānato ca aññā tā gayhantīti.
tika-abh03t0:977_0: Ettha ca dvīhi vedanāhi sampayuttesu aññesu ca piyarūpasātarūpesu iṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh03t0:977_1: sātasantasukhagiddhiyā pavattatīti dvīsu vedanāsu tassa anusayanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:977_2: Aññattha uppajjamānopi hi so imāsu dvīsu vedanāsu anugato hutvā seti sukhamicceva abhilabhatīti.
tika-abh03t0:977_3: Evaṃ paṭighānusayo ca dukkhavedanāsampayuttesu aññesu ca appiyarūpāsātarūpesu aniṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno
tika-abh03t0:977_4: dukkhapaṭikūlato dukkhamicceva paṭihaññatīti dukkhavedanameva anugato hutvā seti,
tika-abh03t0:977_6: Evaṃ kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ tīsu vedanāsu anusayavacanena iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhesu ārammaṇapakatiyā viparītasaññāya
tika-abh03t0:977_7: ca vasena iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesu kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ uppatti dassitā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:977_8: Tattha uppajjamānā hi te tīsu vedanāsu anusenti nāma.
tika-abh03t0:977_9: Vedanāttayamukhena vā ettha iṭṭhādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:977_11: Tattha kāmarāgānusayo bhavassādavasena anusayamāno kāmadhātuyā anuseti,
tika-abh03t0:977_13: Paṭigho dukkhapaṭighātavaseneva pavattatīti yattha tattha paṭihaññamānopi dukkhavedanāya eva anuseti.
tika-abh03t0:977_14: Rūpārūpabhavesu pana rūpārūpāvacaradhammesu ca kāmassādassa pavatti natthīti tattha anusayamāno rāgo bhavarāgoicceva veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:977_15: Dhātuttayavedanāttayaggahaṇena ca sabbasakkāyapariyāpannānaṃ gahitattā “yattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t0:977_16: tattha diṭṭhānusayo nānusetī”ti evamādīnaṃ vissajjanesu dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:977_17: Nanu ca anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato pihapaccayā uppannadomanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t0:977_18: tathā nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsu kāmarāgena nānusayitabbanti tadanusayanaṭṭhānato aññāpi diṭṭhānusayānusayanaṭṭhānabhūtā
tika-abh03t0:977_20: na pana dhātuttayavedanāttayato aññaṃ tadanusayanaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:977_22: Yasmā pana “yattha kāmarāgānusayo ca paṭighānusayo ca mānānusayo ca nānusenti,
tika-abh03t0:977_25: tasmā avisesena dukkhaṃ paṭighānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhānanti samudāyavasena gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:978_1: bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ domanassaṃ pajaheyya’nti,
tika-abh03t0:978_2: so iti paṭisañcikkhitvā paṭighaṃ tena pajahati,
tika-abh03t0:978_3: na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vikkhambhetvā vīriyaṃ katvā
tika-abh03t0:978_7: Paṭighuppattirahaṭṭhānatāya pana idha sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ “paṭighānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:978_10: Evañca katvā paṭhamajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā anāgāmimaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “vivicceva…pe…
tika-abh03t0:978_14: Evaṃ catutthajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā arahattamaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “sukhassa ca pahānā…pe…
tika-abh03t0:978_18: Na hi lokiyacatutthajjhānupekkhāya avijjānusayo sabbathā nānusetīti sakkā vattuṃ “sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu
tika-abh03t0:978_21: nekkhammassitadomanassañca paṭighānusayassa vatthu na na hotīti tatthāpi tassa anusayanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:978_22: Avatthubhāvato hi idha anusayanaṃ na vuccati,
tika-abh03t0:978_23: na suttantesu viya vuttanayena taṃpaṭipakkhabhāvato taṃsamugghātakamaggassa balavūpanissayabhāvato cāti.
tika-abh03t0:979_0: Ettha ca ārammaṇe anusayaṭṭhāne sati bhavarāgavajjo sabbo lobho kāmarāgānusayoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:979_1: Dukkhāya hi vedanāya rūpārūpadhātūsu ca anusayamānena diṭṭhānusayena sampayuttopi lobho lobho eva,
tika-abh03t0:979_4: diṭṭhānusayassa viya etassapi ṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh03t0:979_5: Atha pana ajjhāsayavasena tanninnatāya anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:979_6: Yathā iṭṭhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ sukhāya ca vedanāya appaṭiladdhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato,
tika-abh03t0:979_7: paṭiladdhapubbaṃ vā atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ pariṇataṃ samanupassato uppajjamāno paṭigho dukkhe paṭihaññanavaseneva
tika-abh03t0:979_10: evaṃ dukkhādīsu abhinivesanavasena uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena sampayuttopi lobho sukhābhisaṅgavaseneva
tika-abh03t0:979_11: pavattatīti sātasantasukhadvayamevassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti bhavarāgavajjassa sabbalobhassa kāmarāgānusayatā
tika-abh03t0:979_13: ekasmiṃyeva ca ārammaṇe rajjanti dussanti ca.
tika-abh03t0:979_14: Tattha rāgo sukhajjhāsayo paṭigho dukkhajjhāsayoti tesaṃ nānānusayaṭṭhānatā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:980_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvīsu vedanāsu iṭṭhārammaṇe ca domanassuppattiṃ vatvā “domanassamattameva pana taṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:980_4: na paṭighānusayo”ti vuttattā yathā tattha paṭigho paṭighānusayo na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:980_5: evaṃ dukkhādīsu uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena sahajāto lobho kāmarāgānusayo na hoticceva viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t0:980_6: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “domanassamattameva pana taṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:980_8: ettha na paṭighānusayoti natthi paṭighānusayoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:981_0: Desanā saṃkiṇṇā viya bhaveyyāti bhavarāgassapi kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva uppatti vuttā viya bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t0:981_1: tasmā ārammaṇavisesena visesadassanatthaṃ evaṃ desanā katā sahajātavedanāvisesābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:985_2: Maggeneva hi anusayānaṃ virāmo vicchedo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:986_2: na ekaṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontīti ettha purimena ekasmiṃ cittuppāde uppatti nivāritā,
tika-abh03t0:986_4: Puggalokāsavārassa paṭilome tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ tassa tassa anusayassa ananusayanaṭṭhānaṃ pakatiyā pahānena ca veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:986_5: “tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t0:986_6: no ca tesaṃ tattha paṭighānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh03t0:986_7: tesaññeva puggalānaṃ rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā apariyāpanne tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo ca nānuseti,
tika-abh03t0:986_8: paṭighānusayo ca nānusetī”ti pakatiyā dukkhādīnaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ ananusayaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:986_11: Ettha purimanayena okāsaṃ avekkhitvā puggalassa vijjamānānaṃ anusayānaṃ ananusayanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:986_12: pacchimanayena puggalaṃ avekkhitvā okāsassa kāmadhātuādikassa anokāsatāti.
tika-abh03t0:989_3: Puggalassa ca imasmiṃ bhave sānusayoti evaṃ bhavavisesena vā,
tika-abh03t0:989_4: imasmiṃ kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo imasmiṃ itaresu kenacīti evaṃ bhavānusayavisesena vā sānusayatāniranusayatādikā natthi.
tika-abh03t0:989_9: Anusayassa pana tassa tassa so so anusayanokāso puggalassa tena tena anusayena sānusayatāya,
tika-abh03t0:989_12: tasmā okāsavāresu bhummaniddesaṃ akatvā “yato tato”ti nimittatthe nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:989_14: Tato tato hi okāsato apagamakaraṇaṃ vināsanaṃ pajahanaṃ parijānanañcāti.
tika-abh03t0:990_2: Anusayānānusayasseva hi nimittāpādānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā tato mānānusayena sānusayoti (yama.2.anusayayamaka.77),
tika-abh03t0:990_3: pajahatī”ti ca “dukkhāya vedanāya tato kāmarāgānusayena niranusayoti,
tika-abh03t0:990_4: na pajahatī”ti ca evamādīsu rūpadhātuādayo eva bhummaniddeseneva niddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:990_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana catutthapañhavissajjanena sarūpato anusayanaṭṭhānassa dassitattā tadatthe ādipañhepi
tika-abh03t0:990_6: “yato”ti anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā puna “yato”ti etassa vacanatthaṃ dassetuṃ “uppannena
tika-abh03t0:990_10: uppattirahaṭṭhānatañca sandhāyeva nissakkavacanaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:990_11: Na hi apariyāpannānaṃ anusayuppattirahaṭṭhānatāti taṃ tatheva dissati.
tika-abh03t0:990_16: Uppattipaṭisedhe akate anuppattiyā anicchitattā sabbadhammesu uppajjanakabhāvaṃ āpannena anuppajjanabhāvaṃ apaneti nāma.
tika-abh03t0:990_17: Sabbatthāti etassa pana sabbaṭṭhānatoti ayamattho na na sambhavati. Ttha-
tika-abh03t0:993_2: so te pajahatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vattabbo na hoti apajahanasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:993_9: tasmā yathāvijjamānaṃ pahānaṃ sandhāya “yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati,
tika-abh03t0:993_12: Paṭilome pana “nappajahatī”ti pajahanābhāvo eva sanniṭṭhānapadena saṃsayapadena ca vinicchito pucchito ca,
tika-abh03t0:993_13: tasmā yesaṃ pajahanaṃ natthi niravasesavasena pajahanakānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:993_14: te ṭhapetvā avasesā appajahanasabbhāveneva nappajahantīti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:993_15: na ca yathāvijjamānena pahāneneva vajjitāti daṭṭhabbāti.
tika-abh03t0:993_16: “Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgiñca aṭṭhamakañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahanti vicikicchānusayañca
tika-abh03t0:993_17: nappajahantī”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puthujjano pahānapariññāya abhāvena nappajahati,
tika-abh03t0:994_0: Tattha kiñcāpi kesañci vicikicchānusayo kesañci ubhayanti sesānaṃ tesaṃ pahīnatā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:994_1: tathāpi sotāpannādīnaṃ vicikicchānusayassa pahīnatā ubhayāpajahanassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti tesaṃ pahīnattā “nappajahantī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:994_2: atha pana kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahantīti imaṃ sanniṭṭhānena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ saṅgahitatādassanatthaṃ vuttanti na tattha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:994_4: Evaṃ sati “sesā tassa anusayassa pahīnattā”ti vattabbanti?
tika-abh03t0:994_6: so diṭṭhānusayaṃ vicikicchānusayaṃ nappajahatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā pucchite sadisavissajjanake diṭṭhivicikicchānusaye sandhāya kāraṇassa vattabbattā,
tika-abh03t0:994_7: tasmā tesaṃ anusayānaṃ pahīnattāti tesaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānusayānaṃ pahīnattā te saṃsayatthasaṅgahite anusaye nappajahantīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:997_1: Pahīnavāre phalaṭṭhavaseneva desanā āraddhāti anulomaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:998_1: Okāsavāre so so anusayo attano attano okāse eva anuppattidhammataṃ āpādito pahīno,
tika-abh03t0:998_2: anāpādito ca appahīnoti pahīnāppahīnavacanāni tadokāsameva dīpenti,
tika-abh03t0:998_4: Sādhāraṇaṭṭhāne tena saddhiṃ pahīno nāma hotīti tena saddhiṃ samānokāse pahīno nāmāti attho,
tika-abh03t0:1001_1: Dhātuvāre santānaṃ anugatā hutvā sayantīti yasmiṃ santāne appahīnā,
tika-abh03t0:1001_2: taṃsantāne appahīnabhāvena anugantvā uppattiarahabhāvena sayantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1001_3: Uppattirahatā eva hi anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti idhāpi yuttāti.
tika-abh03t0:1001_4: Ettha ca na kāmadhātuādīni cha paṭinisedhavacanāni dhātuvisesaniddhāraṇāni na hontīti “na kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh03t0:1001_5: cutassa na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādimhi vuccamāne imaṃ nāma upapajjantassāti na viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t0:1001_6: tasmā taṃmūlikāsu yojanāsu “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”ti
tika-abh03t0:1001_7: paṭhamaṃ yojetvā puna anukkamena “na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādikā yojanā katā.
tika-abh03t0:1001_10: Yathā anusayavāre “anusentīti padassa uppajjantīti attho gahito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1001_11: tatthāpi uppajjamānameva sandhāya uppajjantīti gahetuṃ na sakkā “yassa kāmarāgānusayo anuseti,
tika-abh03t0:1001_14: Athāpi appahīnataṃ sandhāya uppajjantīti attho tattha gahito,
tika-abh03t0:1001_18: Nanu na koci anusayo yattha uppajjantassa anuseti nānuseti cāti dvidhā kātabbā,
tika-abh03t0:1006_1: Cittayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ āditova tayo suddhikamahāvārā hontīti ime tayo mahāvārā sarāgādikusalādīhi missakā suddhikā ca,
tika-abh03t0:1006_3: Missakesu ca ekekasmiṃ sarāgādimissakacitte tayo tayo mahāvārā,
tika-abh03t0:1006_4: te tattha tattha pana vutte sampiṇḍetvā “soḷasa puggalavārā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1006_7: tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”tiādinā uppādanirodhānaṃ paccuppannānāgatakālānañca saṃsaggavasena
tika-abh03t0:1006_9: Evaṃ sesānampi vārānaṃ taṃtaṃnāmatā pāḷianusārena veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1009_1: Tathārūpasseva khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ sandhāyāti idaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgipacchimacittasamaṅgimhi puggale
tika-abh03t0:1009_2: adhippete tañca cittaṃ adhippetameva hotīti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1009_3: Arahato pacchimacittampīti nuppajjati nirujjhatīti evaṃpakāraṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1010_4: no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa “sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1010_5: cittaṃ khaṇapaccuppannameva hutvā uppādakkhaṇaṃ atītattā uppajjittha nāmā”ti attho vutto.
tika-abh03t0:1010_6: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati cāti etassapi uppādaṃ pattattā uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t0:1010_7: anatītattā uppajjati nāmāti dvayametaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1010_11: taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “no”ti avatvā vibhajitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:1010_13: taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti ettha ca “no”ti avatvā “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:1010_17: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti ca uppajjamānacittasamaṅgī puggalo vutto,
tika-abh03t0:1010_19: taṃ pana cittaṃ uppajjatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1010_20: Cittanti hi sāmaññavacanaṃ ekasmiṃ anekasmiñca yathāgahitavisese tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh03t0:1010_23: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti ettha yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitapuggalasseva
tika-abh03t0:1010_24: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti evaṃ sabbattha sanniṭṭhānavasena niyamo veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1010_25: Uppannuppajjamānavāro niruddhanirujjhamānavāro ca puggalavārādīsu tīsupi ninnānākaraṇā uddiṭṭhā niddiṭṭhā ca.
tika-abh03t0:1010_26: Tattha puggalavāre avisesena yaṃ kañci tādisaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1010_28: puggaladhammavāre puggalaṃ cittañcāti ayamettha viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1011_1: Atikkantakālavāre imassa puggalavārattā puggalo pucchitoti puggalasseva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1011_2: Yathā yassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti etena na koci puggalo na gahito,
tika-abh03t0:1011_3: evaṃ yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālanti etena sanniṭṭhānena na koci na gahito.
tika-abh03t0:1011_6: te ca pana nirujjhamānakkhaṇātītacittā na na hontīti paṭhamo pañho “āmantā”ti vissajjitabbo siyā,
tika-abh03t0:1011_8: Catuttho pana “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1011_9: no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1011_10: itaresaṃ cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkanta”nti vissajjitabbo bhaveyya,
tika-abh03t0:1011_11: tathā avissajjetvā kasmā sabbattha cittameva vibhattanti?
tika-abh03t0:1011_13: Khaṇassa hi vītikkantatāya atikkantakālatāvacanena vattamānassa ca cittassa vasena puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto vutto atītassa ca,
tika-abh03t0:1011_14: tattha purimassa cittaṃ na bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ pacchimassa vītikkantanti evamādiko puggalavibhāgo
tika-abh03t0:1011_16: tassa cittassa taṃtaṃkhaṇavītikkamāvītikkamadassanavasena dassito hotīti sabbavissajjanesu cittameva vibhattaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1011_17: Atha vā nayidha dhammamattavisiṭṭho puggalo pucchito,
tika-abh03t0:1011_23: tathā pana avatvā nirodhakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā na uppādakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā
tika-abh03t0:1011_24: viya vattamānassa atthīti dassanatthaṃ “atītaṃ citta”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1011_25: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti ettha uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ yassa cittaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1012_1: Missakavāresu yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t0:1012_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t0:1012_5: tassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”ti mātikāṭhapanāyaṃ vuttattā vissajjanepi tatheva sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayatthesu
tika-abh03t0:1012_6: sarāgādimissakacittavaseneva pucchā uddharitvā “sarāgapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1012_8: itaresaṃ sarāgacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati ceva
tika-abh03t0:1012_9: uppajjissati cā”ti evamādinā nayena yebhuyyena suddhikavārasadisameva vissajjanaṃ kātabbanti katvā saṃkhittanti
tika-abh03t0:1018_1: Dhammayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāti yathā mūlayamake kusalādidhammā desitā,
tika-abh03t0:1018_2: yathā ca khandhayamakādīsu “pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā aññathā saṅgahetvā desitā,
tika-abh03t0:1018_3: tathā adesetvā yā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalākusalā dhammā”tiādikā mātikā,
tika-abh03t0:1018_4: taṃ idha ādimhi ṭhapetvā desitassāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1021_2: tassa abyākatā dhammā uppajjantī”ti etassa vissajjane “abyākatā cāti cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1021_4: taṃ pana paṭilomavārassa vissajjane sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1021_6: āruppe akusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā ca dhammā na uppajjanti abyākatā ca dhammā na uppajjantīti
tika-abh03t0:1021_7: ettha pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppajjamānampi kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpaṃ aggahetvā “abyākatā ca dhammā
tika-abh03t0:1021_11: tathā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva sandhāya “yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t0:1021_14: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānarūpādīnampi uppādassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t0:1021_15: ca nirodhassa evamādīhi eva pāḷīhi paṭisedhasiddhito.
tika-abh03t0:1022_0: Ye ca vadanti “yathā paṭisambhidāmagge nirodhakathāyaṃ ‘sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammā ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1022_1: sabbepi virāgā ceva honti virāgārammaṇā virāgagocarā virāgasamudāgatā virāgapatiṭṭhā’tiādīsu ‘ṭhapetvā
tika-abh03t0:1022_2: rūpa’nti avatvā cittapaṭibaddhattā cittajarūpānaṃ ‘ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1022_7: te sotāpattimaggasahajātā dhammā sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammāti tattha vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1022_8: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātāti hi vacanaṃ magge jātataṃ dīpeti,
tika-abh03t0:1022_9: na ca kammajādīni amagge jāyamānāni maggakkhaṇe jātavohāraṃ arahanti tesaṃ tassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe sahajātapaccayattābhāvato,
tika-abh03t0:1022_10: tasmā maggakkhaṇe taṃsahajātadhammesu ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetuṃ “ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1022_11: idha pana kusalādidhammā yassa yattha uppajjanti nirujjhanti ca,
tika-abh03t0:1022_12: tassa puggalassa tasmiñca okāse abyākatadhammānaṃ uppādanirodhānaṃ kusalādipaṭibaddhatā appaṭibaddhatā ca āmaṭṭhā,
tika-abh03t0:1022_13: na ca kammajādirūpaṃ abyākataṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1022_14: tasmā sanniṭṭhānena gahitassa puggalassa okāse vā uppādanirodhesu vijjamānesu abyākatānaṃ te veditabbā,
