tika-abh03t0:1022_16: na ca acittapaṭibaddhā abyākatāti ettha na gahitāti sakkā vattuṃ nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānañca uppādanirodhavacanatoti.
tika-abh03t0:1023_0: Catutthapañhe pavatte akusalābyākatacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ “yassa vā pana abyākatā dhammā uppajjantī”ti
tika-abh03t0:1023_1: etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu pañcavokāre akusalābyākatacittānaṃ catuvokāre ca abyākatacittasseva uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino
tika-abh03t0:1024_2: nānāvajjanenapi pana tato purimatarajavanavīthīsu uppannassa “uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā dhammā nuppajjissanti,
tika-abh03t0:1024_3: no ca tesaṃ kusalā dhammā nuppajjantī”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ labbhateva,
tika-abh03t0:1024_4: tasmā etena lakkhaṇena samānalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tika-abh03t0:1024_5: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti eteneva kusalānāgatabhāvapariyosānena tāya eva samānalakkhaṇatāya dīpitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1024_6: Esa nayo akusalātītabhāvassa abyākatātītabhāvassa ca ādimhi “dutiye akusale”ti,
tika-abh03t0:1024_8: Yathā hi bhāvanāvāre bhāvanāpahānānaṃ pariyosānena aggamaggena tato purimatarānipi bhāvanāpahānāni dassitāni honti,
tika-abh03t0:1024_9: evamidhāpi taṃ taṃ tena tena ādinā antena ca dassitanti.
tika-abh03t0:1025_1: Pañcavokāre akusalānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā ca dhammā nirujjhanti abyākatā ca dhammā nirujjhantīti vacanena paṭisandhicittato soḷasamaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1031_1: Indriyayamake vibhaṅge viya jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyānantaraṃ aniddisitvā purisindriyānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ “tīṇimāni,
tika-abh03t0:1031_6: Pavattivāre hi ekantaṃ pavattiyaṃ eva uppajjamānānaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ kammajānaṃ akammajānañca anupālakaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1031_7: jīvitindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhīsu ca pavattamānānaṃ kammajānanti taṃmūlakāni yamakāni cutipaṭisandhipavattivasena
tika-abh03t0:1031_9: Cakkhundriyādīsu pana purisindriyāvasānesu yaṃ mūlakameva na hoti manindriyaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1031_10: taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlakāni cutiupapattivaseneva vattabbāni āyatanayamake viya,
tika-abh03t0:1031_11: tasmā jīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ majjhe anuddisitvā ante uddiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1034_1: Itthī itthindriyanti ettha yasmā itthīti koci sabhāvo natthi,
tika-abh03t0:1034_2: na ca rūpādidhamme upādāya itthiggahaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1034_3: tasmā itthiggahaṇassa avijjamānampi vijjamānamiva gahetvā pavattito tathāgahitassa vasena “natthī”ti avatvā “no”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1034_5: dukkhassa ca “dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti vacaneneva somanassato aññā sukhā vedanā sukhaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1034_6: domanassato ca aññā dukkhā vedanā dukkhanti ayaṃ viseso gahitoyevāti “sukhaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhindriya”nti ettha “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1035_1: Suddhindriyavāre cakkhu indriyanti ettha dibbacakkhupaññācakkhūni paññindriyāni hontīti “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1038_6: kāyindriyaṃ manindriya”nti sutte vuttanayena idha uddiṭṭhaṃ manindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu pavattamānehi
tika-abh03t0:1038_8: na ca jīvitindriyaṃ viya aññadhammanissayena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1038_10: tasmā kūṭaṃ viya gopānasīnaṃ sabbindriyānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ante ṭhapetvā yojitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1038_11: Jīvitindriyādimūlakesu pavattiñca gahetvā gatesu “yassa jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1038_14: pavatte sukhindriyavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1038_16: sukhindriyasampayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ jīvitindriyañca uppajjati sukhindriyañca uppajjatī”tiādinā
tika-abh03t0:1038_21: Tehi pana pavattiyaṃyeva uppajjamānehi yojanā taṃmūlakā ca cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu pavattamānehi somanassindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t0:1038_22: yojanāya jīvitindriyamūlakehi ca nayehi pākaṭāyevāti katvā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1039_0: “Sacakkhukānaṃ vinā somanassenāti upekkhāsahagatānaṃ catunnaṃ mahāvipākapaṭisandhīnaṃ vasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1039_4: Tattha kāmāvacaresu somanassapaṭisandhisamānatāya mahāvipākehi catūhi nidassanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1039_5: tena yathā sasomanassapaṭisandhikā acakkhukā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:1039_7: Gabbhaseyyakānañca anuppannesu cakkhādīsu cavantānaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhikatā sahetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1039_9: Gabbhaseyyakepi hi sandhāya “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1039_13: Na hi sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vajjane kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1039_14: “itthīnaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantīna”ntiādīsu ca te eva vuttāti.
tika-abh03t0:1040_0: Upekkhāya acakkhukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhivasena vuttanti ettha ca kāmāvacare sopekkhaacakkhukapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh03t0:1041_1: samādhivīriyāni pana indriyappattāni na hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1041_3: “indriyappattāni na hontī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ “samādhi samādhindriyanti?
tika-abh03t0:1041_6: Ahetukapaṭisandhicitte ca yathā samādhileso ekaggatā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1041_8: tasmā evamettha vattabbaṃ siyā “tattha hi ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo natthi,
tika-abh03t0:1041_11: yathā aññesu kesuci ahetukacittesu samādhivīriyāni honti indriyappattāni ca,
tika-abh03t0:1041_14: Tattha “samādhivīriyāni pana na hontī”ti vattabbe “indriyappattānī”ti samādhilesassa samādhindriyabhāvaṃ appattassa sabbhāvato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1041_17: Yesu pana potthakesu “tattha ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo natthī”ti pāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:1042_1: tāva gabbhagatānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ bhāvo atthīti iminā adhippāyenāha “sahetukānaṃ acakkhukānanti gabbhaseyyakavasena ceva arūpīvasena ca vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t0:1042_2: Gabbhaseyyakāpi pana avassaṃ uppajjanakacakkhukā na labbhantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1042_3: Sacakkhukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānanti kāmadhātuyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttanti idhāpi ahetukapaṭisandhikā ca acakkhukā labbhanteva.
tika-abh03t0:1042_6: Kadāci hi tesaṃ paṭhamakappikādīnaṃ viya pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:1042_7: Ettha purisindriyāvasānesu indriyamūlayamakesu paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānehi gahitehi upapatticutivasena
tika-abh03t0:1042_8: gacchantehi cakkhundriyādīhi niyamitattā jīvitindriyādīnaṃ pavattivasenapi labbhamānānaṃ upapatticutivaseneva
tika-abh03t0:1043_2: āha “pavatte somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti arūpajīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t0:1043_3: Etesañceva aññesañca pañcindriyānaṃ yathālābhavasenāti ettha etesaṃ jīvitindriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattesu,
tika-abh03t0:1043_4: aññesañca cakkhundriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhīsūti evaṃ yathālābho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1043_5: Ayaṃ pana chedeyevāti ettha tassa tassa paripuṇṇapañhassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sarūpadassanena vissajjane vissajjite
tika-abh03t0:1044_0: Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1044_2: Vinā somanassena upapajjantānaṃ pavatte somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1044_3: no ca tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjatīti ettha “nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattāna”nti avacanaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa
tika-abh03t0:1044_6: “Vinā somanassena upapajjantāna”nti ettha asaññasatte saṅgahetvā pavattivasena te ca nirodhasamāpannā ca na vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1044_10: pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca na uppajjati jīvitindriyañca na uppajjatī”ti evaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1044_11: “sabbesaṃ cavantāna”nti ettheva asaññasatte saṅgaṇhitvā pavattivasena te ca nirodhasamāpannā na ca vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1044_12: Yassayatthake ca nirodhasamāpannā na dassetabbā na gahetabbāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1044_13: Na hi “nirodhasamāpannāna”nti vacanaṃ “asaññasattāna”nti vacanaṃ viya okāsadīpakaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1044_15: sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādivacanaṃ viya somanassindriyādīnaṃ anuppādakkhaṇadīpakaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1045_0: Atītakālabhede suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha
tika-abh03t0:1045_1: jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthāti ettha “upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1045_3: asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti ettha viya “upapajjantāna”nti vattabbanti?
tika-abh03t0:1045_5: Yathā hi somanassamanindriyānaṃ vasena upapajjantā puggalā upapatticittasamaṅgino honti,
tika-abh03t0:1045_6: na evaṃ somanassajīvitindriyānaṃ vasena upapattisamaṅginoyeva honti.
tika-abh03t0:1045_7: Jīvitindriyassa hi vasena yāva paṭhamarūpajīvitindriyaṃ dharati,
tika-abh03t0:1045_9: Tadā ca dutiyacittato paṭṭhāya “jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ arūpajīvitindriyassa uppajjitvā niruddhattā,
tika-abh03t0:1045_11: Yathā hi “na nirujjhitthā”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upapatticittassa dvīsu khaṇesu labbhamānaṃ sabbapaṭhamena upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena nidassitaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1046_0: Anāgatakālabhede uppajjissamāne sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā aññassa ca uppajjissamānatāva pucchitā.
tika-abh03t0:1046_1: Tattha yathā paccuppannakālabhede sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayabhedehi uppajjamānasseva gahitattā “yassa cakkhundriyādīni uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t0:1046_2: upapajjantassa tassa jīvitindriyādīni uppajjantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva tesaṃ uppādo sambhavati,
tika-abh03t0:1046_5: upapajjantassa tassa jīvitindriyādīni uppajjissantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ tesaṃ upapattito aññattha uppādo na sambhavati,
tika-abh03t0:1046_15: Na hi upapajjantassa tassa cutito pubbeva somanassindriyanirodho na sambhavatīti.
tika-abh03t0:1046_16: Ettha hi paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānattho pucchitabbatthanissayo mādisova upapattiuppādindriyavā ubhayuppādindriyavā
tika-abh03t0:1046_17: attho paṭinivattitvāpi pucchitabbatthassa nissayoti evaṃ viya dutiyapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānatthameva niyameti,
tika-abh03t0:1046_18: na tattheva pucchitabbaṃ anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ uppādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃsayatthanti.
tika-abh03t0:1047_0: Paṭilome pana yathā anulome “uppajjissati nirujjhissatī”ti uppādanirodhā anāgatā sarūpavasena vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1047_1: evaṃ avuttattā yathā tattha saṃsayapadena gahitassa indriyassa pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā cakkhundriyādimūlakesu yojitā,
tika-abh03t0:1047_3: Yathā hi uppādanirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca uppādanirodhā sambhavanti yojetuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1047_4: na evaṃ anuppādānirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca anuppādānirodhā sambhavanti abhūtābhāvassa abhūtābhāvaṃ atikkamitvā appatvā ca sambhavānuppattito,
tika-abh03t0:1047_6: tasmāssa visesarahitassa abhūtābhāvassa vattamānānaṃ uppādassa viya kālantarayogābhāvato yādisānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1047_8: tannissayā tādisānaṃyeva upapatticutiuppādanirodhānaṃ jīvitādīnampi anuppādānirodhā saṃsayapadena pucchitā
tika-abh03t0:1047_15: na vuttaṃ “ye arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”tiādinā jīvitindriyaupekkhindriyādīsu viya vissajjananti.
tika-abh03t0:1048_2: no ca tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjissatī”ti ettha ye sopekkhapaṭisandhikā bhavissanti,
tika-abh03t0:1048_3: te “ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”ti etena pacchimakoṭṭhāsavacanena taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya
tika-abh03t0:1049_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yesu ādimapotthakesu “atītānāgatavāre suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca
tika-abh03t0:1049_1: nuppajjitthāti dhammayamake viya uppādakkhaṇātikkamavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1049_3: Yesu pana potthakesu “paccuppannātītavāre suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca nuppajjitthāti…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1049_4: tasmiṃ bhave anuppannapubbavasena attho gahetabbo”ti pāṭho dissati,
tika-abh03t0:1052_1: Pariññāvāre lokiyaabyākatamissakāni cāti dukkhasaccapariyāpannehi ekantapariññeyyehi lokiyaabyākatehi
tika-abh03t0:1052_2: missakattā tāni upādāya manindriyādīnaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya pariññeyyatā ca vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1052_5: so abyākataṃ dhammaṃ parijānātī”tiādinā abyākatapadena yojetvā yamakāni na vuttānīti?
tika-abh03t0:1053_0: Kasmā panettha dukkhasaccabhājanīye āgatassa domanassassa pahātabbatāva vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1053_2: nanu dukkhasaccapariyāpannā vedanākkhandhādayo kusalākusalabhāvena aggahitā kusalākusalāpi pariññeyyāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1053_3: yathā pana vedanākkhandhādibhāvo bhāvetabbapahātabbabhāvehi vināpi hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1053_4: na evaṃ domanassindriyabhāvo pahātabbabhāvena vinā hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ domanassindriyassa pahātabbatāva idha vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1053_10: na pana sacchikātabbaniṭṭhanti bhāvetabbabhāvo eva tassa gahitoti.
tika-abh03t0:1053_11: “Dve puggalā”tiādi “cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātī”tiādikassa parato likhitabbaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1053_12: Cakkhundriyamūlakañhi atikkamitvā domanassindriyamūlake idaṃ vuttaṃ “dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ na pajahanti no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1054_3: so “puthujjano”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca na pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t0:1054_4: “Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissantī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti
tika-abh03t0:1054_5: domanassindriyañca pajahissantī”tiādīsu ca bhabbo eva bhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t0:1054_6: “Ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissantī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti
tika-abh03t0:1054_7: cakkhundriyañca na parijānissantī”tiādīsu ca abhabbo eva.
tika-abh03t0:1054_8: Aggaphalasamaṅgī ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī arahā cāti duvidho.
tika-abh03t0:1054_9: Sopi “arahā”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t0:1054_10: “Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikarotī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha,
tika-abh03t0:1054_11: no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthā”tiādīsu ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī ca bhinditvā gahito.
tika-abh03t0:1054_12: “Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu itarovāti evaṃ puggalabhedaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t0:1060_7: devanīyā vā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā,
tika-abh03t0:1060_19: māravijayasabbaññuguṇaparahitanipphādanesu appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti gamanīyato,
tika-abh03t0:1060_21: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi atikkanto atisayo vā devoti devātidevo.
tika-abh03t0:1060_23: visuddhidevabhāvaṃ vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkāraṃ pattattā aññadevehi atirekataro vā devo devātidevo.
tika-abh03t0:1060_25: Sakkādīhi devehi pahārādaasurindādīhi dānavehi ca pūjito.
tika-abh03t0:1060_26: Kāyavacīsaṃyamassa sīlassa indriyasaṃvarassa cittasaṃyamassa samādhissa ca paṭipakkhānaṃ accantapaṭippassaddhiyā suddhasaṃyamo.
tika-abh03t0:1061_0: Isisattamoti catusaccāvabodhagatiyā isayoti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ sataṃ pasatthānaṃ isīnaṃ atisayena santo pasatthoti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1061_4: Atigambhīranayamaṇḍitadesanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāma desesi pakaraṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh03t0:1064_1: kiñca taṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti nayidaṃ pucchitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh03t0:1064_2: Nidānakathāyaṃ paṭṭhānasamānane anulomādīnaṃ nayānaṃ paṭṭhānassa ca dassitattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “sammāsambuddhena hi…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1064_3: nāmāti hi vutta”nti tattha vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāḷiṃ āhari.
tika-abh03t0:1065_2: Evañhi saṅkhepato paṭṭhāne ñāte vitthāro sukhaviññeyyo hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:1065_3: Tattha ca nāmattho paṭhamaṃ vattabboti “tattha yesaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1065_4: nāmattho tāva evaṃ veditabbo”ti vatvā sabbasādhāraṇassa paṭṭhānanāmasseva tāva atthaṃ dassento “kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha. Pa-
tika-abh03t0:1065_7: yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tadupāgamuntiādīsu viya nānappakāratthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:1065_12: Atthato hi āpannaṃ nānāvidhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ nānā-
tika-abh03t0:1065_14: Tattha ekassapi dhammassa hetuādīhi anekapaccayabhāvato ca ekekassa paccayassa anekadhammabhāvato ca nānappakārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1066_0: Hetupaccayādivasena vibhattattāti etena dhammasaṅgahādīsu vuttato kusalādivibhāgato sātisayavibhāgataṃ paṭṭhānanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1066_6: sabbaññutaññāṇassa nissaṅgavasena pavattassa gamanattā gamanadesabhāvato ekekaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1066_7: Tattha aññehi gatimantehi atisayayuttassa gatimato gamanaṭṭhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1066_8: Tassa mahāvegassa purisassa papātaṭṭhānaṃ viya dhammasaṅgaṇīādīnaṃ sāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ imassa ca
tika-abh03t0:1066_9: mahāpatho viya nirāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dassento atisayayuttagamanaṭṭhānabhāvo paṭṭhānanāmalābhassa
tika-abh03t0:1067_1: Samantāti anulomādīhi sabbākārehipi gatāni catuvīsati hontīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1067_2: Etasmiṃ atthe catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānānīti “samantacatuvīsatipaṭṭhānānī”ti vattabbe samantasaddassa parayogaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1067_3: Atha vā samantā cha cha hutvāti etena anulomādisabbakoṭṭhāsato tikādichachabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1067_6: tasmā samantato paṭṭhānāni tāni catuvīsatīti katvā “catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1068_0: Hetu ca so paccayo cāti iminā vacanena hetuno adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa ca gahaṇaṃ siyāti taṃ nivārento āha “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1068_1: Etenapi so eva doso āpajjatīti punāha “hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1068_5: Tassa hi paccayasaddassa ca samānādhikaraṇataṃ sandhāya “hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:1068_8: hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tena tena hetubhāvādiupakārena tassa tassa dhammassa upakārattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1068_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ appaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā,
tika-abh03t0:1068_10: so tassa paccayo”ti “mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo”ticcevamādinā dhammappadhānaniddesena dhammato
tika-abh03t0:1068_11: aññā dhammasatti nāma natthīti dhammeheva dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1068_12: Idhāpi vā hetu ca so paccayo cāti dhammeneva dhammasattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1068_13: Na hi hetupaccayotiādiko uddeso kusalādiuddeso viya dhammappadhāno,
tika-abh03t0:1068_19: Koci hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo,
tika-abh03t0:1069_0: Upakārakalakkhaṇoti ca dhammena dhammasattiupakāraṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1069_5: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati
tika-abh03t0:1070_2: manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t0:1070_3: uppannā ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādīhi kusalabhāvassa yonisomanasikārapaṭibaddhatā siddhā hotīti
tika-abh03t0:1070_5: Eteneva akusalābyākatabhāvā kusalabhāvo viya na hetupaṭibaddhāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1070_6: Yaṃ paneke maññeyyuṃ “ahetukahetussa akusalabhāvo viya sahetukahetūnaṃ sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo aññesaṃ taṃsampayuttānaṃ hetupaṭibaddho”ti,
tika-abh03t0:1070_8: Alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā,
tika-abh03t0:1070_12: taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya.
tika-abh03t0:1070_14: tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu phassādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhakusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesatha,
tika-abh03t0:1070_20: sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya sampayuttesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
tika-abh03t0:1071_2: rūpāyatanādimatte yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ aṭṭhatvā “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyamena sabbarūpāyatana…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1071_3: dhammāyatanānañca ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā na koci dhammo na hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:1072_0: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo
tika-abh03t0:1072_1: dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sayaṃ sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh03t0:1072_2: taṃsampayuttadhammā ca tesaṃ vase vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato,
tika-abh03t0:1072_4: Garukātabbampi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ paccavekkhaṇaassādamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1072_5: tasmāyaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakatā adhipatipaccayatāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1073_2: cutianantarā paṭisandhīti yassa yassa cittassa anantarā yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1073_3: tassa tassa tadanantaruppādaniyamo taṃtaṃsahakārīpaccayavisiṭṭhassa purimapurimacittasseva vasena ijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1073_4: Bhāvanābalena pana vāritattāti ettha yathā rukkhassa vekhe dinne pupphituṃ samatthasseva pupphanaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1073_5: agadavekhe pana apanīte tāyayeva samatthatāya pupphanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1073_7: tasmiñca apagate tāyayeva samatthatāya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1074_1: na atthatoti upacayasantatiadhivacananiruttipadānaṃ viya saddatthamattato nānākaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1074_5: Rūpadhammānaṃ viya saṇṭhānābhāvato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito heṭṭhā uddhaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1074_6: tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādanasamatthatā samanantarapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t0:1075_0: Uppādanasamatthatāti ca abyāpārattā dhammānaṃ yasmiṃ yadākāre niruddhe vattamāne vā sati taṃtaṃvisesavantā dhammā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1075_2: Dhammānaṃ pavattimeva ca upādāya kālavohāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1075_3: asaññasattā cavantassa purimacutipacchimapaṭisandhīnañca nirodhuppādanirantaratāya kālantaratā natthīti
tika-abh03t0:1075_5: Na hi tesaṃ antarā arūpadhammānaṃ pavatti atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1075_7: na ca rūpadhammappavatti arūpadhammappavattiyā antaraṃ karoti aññasantānattā.
tika-abh03t0:1075_8: Rūpārūpadhammasantatiyo hi dve aññamaññaṃ visadisasabhāvattā aññamaññopakārabhāvena vattamānāpi visuṃyeva honti.
tika-abh03t0:1075_9: Ekasantatiyañca purimapacchimānaṃ majjhe vattamānaṃ taṃsantatipariyāpannatāya antarakārakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1075_11: na ca abhāvo antarakārako hoti abhāvattāyeva,
tika-abh03t0:1075_13: bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viya ca nirantaratā suṭṭhu ca anantaratā hotīti tathā uppādanasamatthatā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacutīnampi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1075_14: Uppattiyā paccayabhāvo cettha anantarapaccayādīnaṃ pākaṭoti uppādanasamatthatāva vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1075_15: Paccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ pubbantāparantaparicchedena gahitānaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ alabhantānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1075_16: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā anantarādipaccayabhāvo vuttoti
tika-abh03t0:1075_18: Na hi kusalādiggahaṇaṃ viya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ aparicchedaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1075_20: teneva ca atītattike paṭiccavārādayo na santīti.
tika-abh03t0:1076_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādabhāvenāti etthāpi uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭena ṭhitiyāpi paccayabhāvaṃ nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1077_3: Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1077_4: na ca purejātapacchājātabhāvehi upakārakassa upakārakā vatthukhandhā aññamaññapaccayā hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:1078_0: Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1078_1: cakkhādayo ca cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ upakārakā cittakammassa paṭādayo viya nissayākārena khandhādayo taṃtaṃnissayānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1079_0: Tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissitoti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vadati.
tika-abh03t0:1080_2: so attano phalassa uppādane samatthabhāvena suṭṭhukatataṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t0:1080_3: Tathā ca kataṃ attano santāne kataṃ hotīti āha “attano santāne”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1080_4: Karaṇañca duvidhaṃ nipphādanaṃ upasevanañcāti dassetuṃ “nipphādito vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:1080_5: Tattha upasevito vāti etena kāyaallīyāpanavasena upabhogūpasevanaṃ vijānanādivasena ārammaṇūpasevanañca dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1080_6: Tena anāgatānampi cakkhusampadādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanena yathāpaṭisevitānaṃ pakatūpanissayatā vuttā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1081_0: Yathā pacchājātena vinā santānāvicchedahetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye pacchājātākārena upakārakā,
tika-abh03t0:1081_1: tesaṃ sā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā upakārakatā pacchājātapaccayatā,
tika-abh03t0:1081_2: tathā nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārakabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1081_4: evaṃ sabbattha paccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā upakārakatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1082_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viyāti etena manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehi arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1083_0: Kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ āsevanaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t0:1083_2: Ganthādīsu purimāpurimābhiyogo viyāti purimā purimā āsevanā viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1084_4: Sā tāya uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānampi teneva kiriyabhāvena upakārikā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1084_5: Tassa hi kiriyabhāvassa pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti,
tika-abh03t0:1084_7: Sahajātānaṃ pana tena upakārikāti kiṃ vattabbanti.
tika-abh03t0:1085_0: Nirussāhasantabhāvenāti etena saussāhehi vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi sārammaṇādibhāvena sadisavipākabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1085_1: So hi vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāya payogena aññathā vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattāyeva siddhito nirussāho santabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1085_4: Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati,
tika-abh03t0:1085_7: Etena tappaccayavataṃ avipākānampi vipākānukulaṃ pavattiṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1086_0: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1086_1: Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa ca hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1086_3: asati pana upatthambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1086_4: Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhayamānoyeva janetīti upatthambhanabhāvo āhārabhāvoti.
tika-abh03t0:1087_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho,
tika-abh03t0:1087_1: atha kho dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi jīvane jīvantehi sukhitādibhāve sukhitādīhi adhimokkhapaggahupaṭṭhānāvikkhepajānanesu
tika-abh03t0:1087_2: anaññātaññassāmīti pavattiyaṃ ājānane aññātāvībhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi
tika-abh03t0:1087_4: Tesu tesu hi kiccesu cakkhādīnaṃ issariyaṃ tappaccayānañca tadanuvattanena tattha pavattīti.
tika-abh03t0:1087_5: Itthipurisindriyānaṃ pana yadipi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1087_7: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1087_10: na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1087_11: kevalaṃ pana yathāsakeheva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1087_12: tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā indriyatā ca tesaṃ vuccati,
tika-abh03t0:1087_14: Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti ettha sukhadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh03t0:1088_0: Lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānabhūtānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanādivasena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1088_1: cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva sādhāraṇo byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
tika-abh03t0:1088_3: “Sabbānipī”ti vatvā “sattajhānaṅgānī”ti vacanena ajhānaṅgānaṃ upekkhācittekaggatānaṃ nivattanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1088_4: Yadi evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā vuttaṃ?
tika-abh03t0:1088_5: Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa ekantena ajhānaṅgattadassanatthaṃ jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh03t0:1088_6: Satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre vedanābhedadvayassa ekantena jhānapaccayattābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1088_8: jhānapaccayabhāvo pana na natthīti “sabbānipi satta jhānaṅgānī”ti ettha gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1089_0: Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1089_1: Ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu na labbhantīti idaṃ ahetukacittesu na labbhanti,
tika-abh03t0:1089_4: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci kassaci lābho na vāritoti ettakameva viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t0:1089_6: Ahetukacittesu vā lābhābhāvadassanatthe pana imasmiṃ vacane savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa lābhābhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1089_7: tasmā yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ saṅgahasuññatavāresu jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1089_8: taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya esa jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu alābho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1089_9: Yathā hi sahetukesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā,
tika-abh03t0:1089_11: Imasmiṃ pana pakaraṇe dubbalampi upanijjhāyanaṃ yadipi kiñcimattampi atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1089_12: tena upakārakatā hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi jhānapaccayo vuttova,
tika-abh03t0:1089_13: tasmā ye evaṃ paṭhanti “na ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇaahetukacittesu labbhantī”ti,
tika-abh03t0:1090_0: Samaṃ pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvopagamena viya upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t0:1091_0: Yuttānampi sataṃ vippayuttabhāvena nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t0:1091_1: Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ vippayuttānaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1091_2: Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge vippayogoyeva natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t0:1092_2: “atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattaupalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t0:1092_3: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti āha “upatthambhakattenā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1092_4: Idañca upatthambhakattaṃ vatthārammaṇasahajātādīnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ atthibhāvena upakārakattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1093_0: Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena vattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1093_3: Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tāni natthibhāvena upakārakāni,
tika-abh03t0:1093_4: anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānānaṃ natthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ dadamānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1094_0: Ettha ca abhāvamattena upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā,
tika-abh03t0:1094_6: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso dhammāvisesepi veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1094_7: Dhammānañhi sattivisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā tathāgatena catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti
tika-abh03t0:1094_8: bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃvisesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya
tika-abh03t0:1095_0: Catūsu khandhesu ekassapi asaṅgahitattābhāvato nāmadhammekadesatā anantarādīnaṃ natthīti “nāmadhammāvā”ti
tika-abh03t0:1095_1: vatvā na kevalaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāve bhajantānaṃ catunnaṃyeva khandhānaṃ nāmatā,
tika-abh03t0:1095_2: atha kho nibbānañca nāmamevāti dassento “nibbānassa asaṅgahitattā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:1095_3: Purejātapaccayo rūpekadesoti ettha ekadesavacanena rūparūpato aññaṃ vajjeti,
tika-abh03t0:1095_4: rūparūpaṃ pana kusalattike anāgatampi purejātapaccayabhāvena aññattha āgatameva.
tika-abh03t0:1095_5: Vuttañhi “anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo –
tika-abh03t0:1095_8: Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1099_2: so evaṃ veditabboti etena hetusaṅkhātassa paccayadhammassa hetusampayuttakataṃsamuṭṭhānarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1099_4: Yo pana hetubhāvena yathāvutto paccayadhammo yathāvuttānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1099_6: Ubhayathāpi hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1099_10: Tathā tathā upakārakaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ dassento hi bhagavā taṃ taṃ upakārakataṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh03t0:1100_2: Tena etassa hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1100_4: Tena na yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayabhāvena paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1100_6: Nanu ca sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā dutiye hetusadde avijjamānepi aññassa apekkhitabbassa aniddiṭṭhattā
tika-abh03t0:1100_7: attanāva sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayoti ayamattho viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t0:1100_9: Hetusaddo hi paccattaniddiṭṭho “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettheva byāvaṭo yadā gayhati,
tika-abh03t0:1100_10: tadā sampayuttavisesanaṃ na hotīti sampayuttā avisiṭṭhā ye keci gahitā bhaveyyunti evaṃ sampayuttasaddena
tika-abh03t0:1100_11: attani eva byāvaṭena hetusaddena visesanena vinā yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti taṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t0:1100_15: “arūpino indriyā sampayuttakāna”nti ca vutte dutiyena āhāraggahaṇena indriyaggahaṇena ca vināpi āhārindriyasampayuttakāva gayhanti,
tika-abh03t0:1100_18: Vajjetabbābhāvato hi tattha dutiyaāhārindriyaggahaṇe asatipi taṃsampayuttakāva gayhantīti taṃ na kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1100_19: idha pana vajjetabbaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇanti.
tika-abh03t0:1101_0: Evampi hetū hetusampayuttakānanti ettha hetusampayuttakānaṃ so eva sampayuttakahetūti visesanassa akatattā
tika-abh03t0:1101_1: yo koci hetu yassa kassaci hetusampayuttakassa hetupaccayena paccayoti āpajjatīti?
tika-abh03t0:1101_4: etadatthameva ca vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepi tassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1101_5: Atha vā asati dutiye hetusadde hetusampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh03t0:1101_6: na pana hetūnanti evampi gahaṇaṃ siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ so vutto,
tika-abh03t0:1101_8: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesampi hetupaccayena paccayoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1101_13: tasmā te vināpi dutiyena āhārindriyaggahaṇena attanā eva āharitabbe ca isitabbe ca āhārindriyabhūte aññe
tika-abh03t0:1101_14: ca sampayuttake paricchindantīti taṃ tattha na kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1101_15: idha ca dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ hetunā paccayabhūteneva sampayuttānaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesañca
tika-abh03t0:1101_16: paricchinnattā puna visesanakiccaṃ natthīti pañhāvāre “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādīsu
tika-abh03t0:1102_1: saddo purimavacanāpekkho vuttasseva niddeso “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakāna”ntiādīsu
tika-abh03t0:1102_3: Ettha ca paccattaniddiṭṭho hetusaddo “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettha byāvaṭo sampayuttasaddena viya taṃ-
tika-abh03t0:1102_4: saddenapi anapekkhanīyo añño ca koci niddisitabbappakāsako vutto natthi,
tika-abh03t0:1103_0: “Hetusampayuttakāna”nti iminā pana paccayuppannavacanena asamattena paccayuppannavacanantarāpekkhena pubbe vuttena taṃ-
tika-abh03t0:1103_6: te hetū ceva sampayuttakavisesanabhūtā tabbisesitā ca hetusampayuttakā.
tika-abh03t0:1103_8: Aññathā “te hetū cevā”ti etassa paccattaniddiṭṭhena hetusaddena sambandhe sati yathā idha teneva taṃ-
tika-abh03t0:1103_10: evaṃ pubbepi bhavituṃ arahantīti “niddisitabbassa apākaṭattā ‘taṃsampayuttakāna’nti na vutta”nti idaṃ na yujjeyyāti.
tika-abh03t0:1103_11: Duvidhampi vā hetuggahaṇaṃ apanetvā taṃsaddavacanīyataṃ codeti pariharati ca.
tika-abh03t0:1104_2: Yadi “cittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpassa aggahaṇato taṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1104_3: sahajātapaccayavibhaṅge cittacetasikānaṃ tassa kaṭattārūpassa paccayabhāvo na vutto bhaveyya.
tika-abh03t0:1104_4: Yadi ca tattha cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ paccayabhāvena taṃsamānalakkhaṇānaṃ kaṭattārūpānampi paccayabhāvo nidassito,
tika-abh03t0:1104_7: Evaṃpakārena hi taṃsamuṭṭhānavacanena tattha tattha vuttaṃ samuṭṭhānavacanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1104_8: Nanu “cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti vacanena cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittacetasikasamuṭṭhānatā vuttāti? Na vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1104_9: Cittacetasikānaṃ paccayabhāvo eva hi tattha vuttoti.
tika-abh03t0:1105_5: viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1105_6: tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe viruḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1105_7: nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti imasmimpi sutte paṭisandhināmarūpassa viññāṇapaccayatā vuttāti āha “tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite”tiādi.
tika-abh03t0:1106_0: Purimatarasiddhāya pathaviyā bījapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya purimatarasiddhe kamme tannibbattasseva viññāṇabījassa
tika-abh03t0:1106_1: patiṭṭhānaṃ kammassa kaṭattā uppattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-abh03t0:1107_3: Vatthurūpamattampīti vadanto vatthurūpassa upatthambhakānaṃ sesarūpānampi tadupatthambhakabhāveneva arūpadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:1107_5: Tattha kāyabhāvādikalāpānaṃ katthaci abhāvato katthaci abhāvābhāvato “vatthurūpamattampi vinā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:1108_0: Pavattiyaṃ kaṭattārūpādīnaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭibāhanatoti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1108_1: nanu tesaṃ paccayabhāvappasaṅgoyeva natthi “hetū sahajātāna”nti vacanato.
tika-abh03t0:1108_2: Na hi yesaṃ hetū sahajātapaccayo na honti,
tika-abh03t0:1108_5: “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati na hetupaccayā”tiādi ca labbheyya,
tika-abh03t0:1108_9: yo pana hetūhi samānakāluppattimattaṃ gahetvā hetusahajātabhāvaṃ maññeyya,
tika-abh03t0:1108_10: tassāyaṃ pasaṅgo atthīti idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1108_11: Bhagavā pana vacanānaṃ lahugarubhāvaṃ na gaṇeti,
tika-abh03t0:1108_12: bodhaneyyānaṃ pana ajjhāsayānurūpato dhammasabhāvaṃ avilomento tathā tathā desanaṃ niyāmetīti na katthaci akkharānaṃ bahutā vā appatā vā codetabbāti.
tika-abh03t0:1111_1: Uppajjanakkhaṇeyevāti etena vattamānakkhaṇekadesena sabbaṃ vattamānakkhaṇaṃ gayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1111_2: Na hi uppajjanakkhaṇeyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpādīni ārammaṇapaccayo,
tika-abh03t0:1111_4: Tena ālambiyamānānampi rūpādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādivattamānatāya pure pacchā ca vijjamānānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayattābhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:1111_6: Na ekato hontīti nīlādīni sabbarūpāni saha na honti,
tika-abh03t0:1111_9: Tattha purimenatthena “uppajjantī”ti vacanena ārammaṇapaccayabhāvalakkhaṇadīpanatthaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhamma”ntiādi vuttanti dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:1111_11: “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā”ti etassa vaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitasabbārammaṇādivasena vā idhāpi attho gahetabboti.
tika-abh03t0:1112_0: Evaṃ vuttanti yathā nadīpabbatānaṃ sandanaṃ ṭhānañca pavattaṃ avirataṃ avicchinnanti sandanti tiṭṭhantīti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1112_1: evaṃ “ye ye dhammā”ti atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbasaṅgahasamudāyavasena gahitattā tesaṃ uppajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1112_2: pavattanaṃ aviratanti uppajjantīti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1112_3: Ime pana na hetādipaccayā sabbepi atītānāgatānaṃ honti.
tika-abh03t0:1112_4: Na hi atīto ca anāgato ca atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1112_6: Evañca katvā atītattike atītānāgatānaṃ na koci paccayo vutto,
tika-abh03t0:1112_7: tasmā idhāpi “uppajjantī”ti vacanena yesaṃ rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1112_9: Tesu hi dassitesu atītānāgatesu taṃtaṃpaccayā ahesuṃ bhavissanti cāti ayamattho dassito hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1113_0: Ettha ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti ekavacananiddesaṃ katvā puna “te te dhammā”ti bahuvacananiddeso
tika-abh03t0:1113_1: “yaṃ ya”nti vuttassa ārammaṇadhammassa anekabhāvopi atthīti dassanattho.
tika-abh03t0:1113_2: Cattāro hi khandhā saheva ārammaṇapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1113_3: te sabbepi ārabbha uppajjamānampi tesu ekekaṃ ārabbha uppajjamānaṃ na na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1113_4: tasmā vedanādīsu phassādīsu ca ekekassapi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1113_6: Tattha yo ca rūpādiko ekekova yaṃyaṃ-
tika-abh03t0:1113_8: ye ca aneke phassādayo ekekavasena yaṃyaṃ-
tika-abh03t0:1113_10: te sabbe gahetvā “te te”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1113_11: Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle ārabbha uppajjanti,
tika-abh03t0:1113_12: tasmiṃ kāle nīlādīsu cittuppādesu ca ekekameva ārabbha uppajjantīti dassanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1113_13: te pana ālambiyamānā rūpārammaṇadhammā ca aneke,
tika-abh03t0:1114_1: cāti imesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hotīti idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena khandhapaṭibaddhānussaraṇakāle
tika-abh03t0:1114_2: nibbānampi rūpāvacarakusalakiriyānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1114_3: Evaṃ sati yathā “appamāṇā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1114_6: Na hi nibbānaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhaṃ asaṅkhatattā,
tika-abh03t0:1114_7: na ca pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbe nivuṭṭhesu appamāṇakkhandhesu ñātesu nibbānajānane na tena payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-abh03t0:1114_8: Yathā hi cetopariyañāṇaṃ cittaṃ vibhāventameva cittārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1114_9: evamidampi appamāṇakkhandhe vibhāventameva tadārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:1114_10: Diṭṭhanibbānoyeva ca pubbe nivuṭṭhe appamāṇakkhandhe anussarati,
tika-abh03t0:1114_11: tena yathādiṭṭhameva nibbānaṃ tesaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1114_15: tasmā nibbānaṃ na kassaci rūpāvacarassa ārammaṇanti “catunnaṃ rāsīna”nti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1117_3: Chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānanti ettha purimachandassa samānarūpena tadanantaraṃ niddiṭṭhena taṃsambandhena
tika-abh03t0:1117_4: chandasaddeneva paccayabhūtassa chandassa sampayuttakavisesanabhāvo dassito hotīti “chandādhipati sampayuttakāna”nti
tika-abh03t0:1118_6: Anavaññātanti avaññātampi adosadassitāya assādanena anavaññātaṃ katvā.
tika-abh03t0:1119_0: Micchattaniyatā appanāsadisā mahābalā vinā adhipatinā nuppajjantīti “ekantenevā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:1119_1: Kammakilesāvaraṇabhūtā ca te saggāvaraṇā ca maggāvaraṇā ca paccakkhasaggānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānampi uppajjituṃ na arahanti,
tika-abh03t0:1120_0: Kāmāvacarādibhedato pana tividho kiriyārammaṇādhipati lobhasahagatākusalasseva ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo
tika-abh03t0:1120_1: hotīti idaṃ parasantānagatānaṃ sārammaṇadhammānaṃ “ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa
tika-abh03t0:1120_2: adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti etassa abhāvato “bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassā”ti ettha ca ārammaṇādhipatino
tika-abh03t0:1120_3: anuddhaṭattā adhipatipaccayatā natthīti viññāyamānepi “bahiddhā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1120_4: nissāya arahato kiriyadhammā puthujjanādīhi garuṃ katvā assādiyantīti iminā adhippāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1120_5: “Sanidassanasappaṭighā khandhā”tiādīsu viya khandhasaddo rūpe eva bhavituṃ arahatīti vicāritametaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1120_6: Puthujjanādikāle vā anāgate kiriyadhamme garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1120_7: “Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatī”tiādivacanato kiriyadhammā rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayo honteva,
tika-abh03t0:1120_8: te ca “atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanato anāgatā tebhūmakāpi adhipatipaccayo hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:1123_4: tasmā taṃ cittaniyāmahetuvisesabhāvaṃ dassento “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā dhātuvasena kusalādivasena ca niddesamāha.
tika-abh03t0:1123_5: Tattha “manoviññāṇadhātu manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti vutte paccayapaccayuppannaviseso na viññāyatīti “purimā purimā pacchimāya pacchimāyā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:1123_6: Tathā ca sati dhātuvisesena cittavisese dassanaṃ yaṃ kātuṃ āraddho,
tika-abh03t0:1123_8: “Manoviññāṇadhātu manodhātuyā”ti idampi na sakkā vattuṃ niyāmābhāvato,
tika-abh03t0:1123_10: Na hi manodhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyāyeva anantarapaccayoti niyāmo atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1123_11: tasmā pākaṭā pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo ādiṃ katvā yāva dhātuvisesaniyāmo atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1123_12: tāva nidassanena nayaṃ dassetvā puna niravasesadassanatthaṃ “purimā purimā kusalā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:1123_13: Sadisakusalānanti vedanāya vā hetūhi vā sadisakusalānaṃ anurūpakusalānanti vā attho.
tika-abh03t0:1124_0: Kāmāvacarakiriyāvajjanassāti kāmāvacarakiriyāya āvajjanassāti āvajjanaggahaṇena kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ visesetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1127_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti ettha vuttassa “aññamañña”nti imassa attho vattabbo,
tika-abh03t0:1127_4: na ca samānatthassapi saddantarassa atthe vutte saddantarassa attho vutto hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1127_8: Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti idaṃ yadipi pubbe “okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1127_9: tathāpi na tena khaṇantare paccayabhāvo rūpīnaṃ nivāritoti tannivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1127_10: Kañci kāleti keci kismiñci kāleti vā attho.
tika-abh03t0:1127_11: Tena rūpino dhammā keci vatthubhūtā kismiñci paṭisandhikāleti rūpantarānaṃ vatthussa ca kālantare arūpīnaṃ sahajātapaccayaṃ pubbe anivāritaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh03t0:1127_12: Evañca katvā “kañci kāla”nti vā “kismiñci kāle”ti vā vattabbe vibhattivipallāso kato.
tika-abh03t0:1127_13: Tena hi “kañcī”ti upayogekavacanaṃ “rūpino dhammā”ti etena saha sambandhena paccattabahuvacanassa ādeso,
tika-abh03t0:1127_15: Purimena ca “eko khandho vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nāmasahitasseva vatthussa “nāmassa paccayo”ti
tika-abh03t0:1127_16: vattabbatte āpanne etena kevalasseva tathā vattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1128_0: Tayo na aññamaññavasenāti labbhamānepi katthaci aññamaññasahajātapaccayabhāve vacanena asaṅgahitattā tassa evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1128_1: Catusamuṭṭhānikassa rūpassa ekadesabhūte kammasamuṭṭhānarūpe samudāyekadesavasena sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1131_1: Nissayapaccayaniddese “rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kismiñci kāle”ti idaṃ na labbhati.
tika-abh03t0:1131_3: tattha te eva dhamme dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatana”ntiādi vuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:1131_4: “Vatthurūpaṃ pañcavokārabhave”ti vuttattā “ṭhapetvā āruppavipāka”nti idaṃ na vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-abh03t0:1131_5: “tebhūmakavipākassā”ti vutte pañcavokārabhave anuppajjanakaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ ajānantassa tassa pakāsetabbattā.
tika-abh03t0:1134_1: Te tayopi rāsayoti upanissaye tayo anekasaṅgāhakatāya rāsayoti vadati.
tika-abh03t0:1134_2: Etasmiṃ pana upanissayaniddese ye purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ anantarūpanissayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1134_6: tesu “kesañcī”ti na sakkā vattunti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1134_7: Ye pana purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1134_8: te tesaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekantena honti,
tika-abh03t0:1134_12: Tasmā yesu padesu anantarūpanissayo na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:1134_14: Siddhānaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ yehi paccayuppannehi akusalādīhi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1135_3: Na hi rūpābyākataṃ upanissayaṃ labhatīti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh03t0:1135_4: Ārammaṇānantarūpanissaye tāva na labhati anārammaṇattā pubbāparaniyamena appavattito ca,
tika-abh03t0:1135_5: pakatūpanissayañca na labhati acetanena rūpasantānena pakatassa abhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:1135_6: Yathā hi arūpasantānena saddhādayo nipphāditā utubhojanādayo ca upasevitā,
tika-abh03t0:1135_8: Yasmiñca utubījādike kammādike ca sati rūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh03t0:1135_10: Sacetanasseva hi uppādanupatthambhanupayogādivasena cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ pakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1135_12: Yathā ca nirīhakesu paccayāyattesu dhammesu kesañci sārammaṇasabhāvatā hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1135_15: Utubījādayo pana aṅkurādīnaṃ tesu asantesu abhāvato eva paccayā,
tika-abh03t0:1135_17: Purimapurimānaṃyeva panettha upanissayapaccayabhāvo bāhullavasena pākaṭavasena ca vutto.
tika-abh03t0:1135_18: “Anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ detī”tiādivacanato pana anāgatāpi upanissayapaccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1135_19: te purimehi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayehi taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya idha saṅgayhantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1136_0: Puggalopi senāsanampīti puggalasenāsanaggahaṇavasena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajante dhamme dasseti, pi-
tika-abh03t0:1136_1: saddena cīvarāraññarukkhapabbatādiggahaṇavasena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajante sabbe saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh03t0:1136_2: “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādīsu hi “senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassā”tiādivacanena
tika-abh03t0:1136_3: senāsanaggahaṇena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajantāva dhammā upanissayapaccayena paccayoti imamatthaṃ dassentena
tika-abh03t0:1136_5: Paccuppannāpi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā paccuppannatāya senāsanasamānalakkhaṇattā ettheva saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1136_6: Vakkhati hi “paccuppannaṃ utuṃ bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādetī”tiādinā senāsanassa paccuppannabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1136_9: vatthuṃ paccuppanne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādinā cakkhādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvañcāti.
tika-abh03t0:1136_10: Paccuppannānampi ca tādisānaṃ pubbe pakatattā pakatūpanissayatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1137_0: Kasiṇārammaṇādīni ārammaṇameva honti, na upanissayoti iminā adhippāyena “ekaccāyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:1138_1: tasmiṃ anuppannajhānuppādane sabbassa ca uppannajhānassa samāpajjane iddhividhādīnaṃ abhiññānañca upanissayoti
tika-abh03t0:1138_3: Vuttampi cetaṃ “arūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ vipassanaṃ maggaṃ abhiññaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādetī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1138_5: paṭisandhiniyāmakassa cutito purimajavanassa ca vasena upanissayo,
tika-abh03t0:1138_7: arūpāvacarakusalañca rūpāvacaravipākassa taduppādakakusalūpanissayabhāvenāti evaṃ paccekaṃ tebhūmakakusalānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1138_8: catubhūmakavipākassa tebhūmakakiriyassa ca yathāyogaṃ paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1138_9: Pāḷiyampi hi pakatūpanissayo nayadassanamatteneva pañhāvāresu vissajjitoti.
tika-abh03t0:1139_0: Iminā pana nayenāti lokuttaranibbattanaṃ upanissāya sinehuppādanalesenāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1139_1: Lokuttarā pana dhammā akusalānaṃ na kenaci paccayena paccayo hontīti na idaṃ sārato daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1139_3: arūpāvacaravipāko rūpāvacarakusalassa taṃ patthetvā tannibbattakakusaluppādanatthaṃ uppādiyamānassa,
tika-abh03t0:1139_4: rūpāvacarakiriyassa ca pubbe nivuṭṭhādīsu arūpāvacaravipākajānanatthaṃ jhānābhiññāyo uppādentassa arahato,
tika-abh03t0:1139_5: catubhūmakavipākānaṃ pana taduppādakakusalūpanissayabhāvavasena so so vipāko upanissayo.
tika-abh03t0:1139_8: na pana tena taṃ kadāci diṭṭhapubbaṃ puthujjanādīhi sotāpattiphalādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:1139_9: tasmā tāni viya tesaṃ jhānādīnaṃ imassa ca aggaphalaṃ na jhānādīnaṃ upanissayo.
tika-abh03t0:1140_0: Kiriyaatthapaṭisambhidādimpi patthetvā dānādikusalaṃ karontassa tebhūmakakiriyāpi catubhūmakassapi kusalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh03t0:1140_6: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammesu pana utubhojanasenāsanānameva tiṇṇaṃ rāsīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvadassanaṃ nayadassanamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:1140_7: Imasmiṃ paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe āgatanayenāti idaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati na upanissayapaccayā,
tika-abh03t0:1140_8: kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpa”nti evamādikaṃ upanissayapaṭikkhepaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1142_0: Taṃ rukkhā upanissāya, vaḍḍhante te vanappatī”ti. –
tika-abh03t0:1146_1: Nayadassanavasena yāni vinā ārammaṇapurejātena na vattanti,
tika-abh03t0:1146_2: tesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapurejātadassanena manodvārepi yaṃ yadārammaṇapurejātena vattati,
tika-abh03t0:1146_3: tassa tadālambitaṃ sabbampi rūparūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dassitameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1146_4: sarūpena pana adassitattā “sāvasesavasena desanā katā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:1146_5: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmayato iddhividhābhiññāya ca aṭṭhārasasu yaṃkiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1147_0: Tadārammaṇabhāvinoti ettha paṭisandhibhāvino vatthupurejātābhāvena itarassapi abhāvā aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1147_1: Bhavaṅgabhāvino pana gahaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ na vā kātabbaṃ paṭisandhiyā viya aparibyattassa ārammaṇassa ārammaṇamattabhāvato,
tika-abh03t0:1156_1: Cetanāsampayuttakammaṃ abhijjhādi kammapaccayo na hotīti “cetanākammamevā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:1156_2: Satipi hi vipākadhammadhammatte na cetanāvajjā evaṃsabhāvāti.
tika-abh03t0:1156_3: Attano phalaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthenāti kammassa samatthatā tassa kammapaccayabhāvo vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1157_0: Pañcavokāreyeva, na aññatthāti etena kāmāvacaracetanā ekavokāre rūpampi na janetīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1160_1: Vipākapaccayaniddese yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1160_3: Na hi āruppe bhūmidvayavipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1163_1: Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitovāti asitapītādivatthūhi saha ajjhoharitovāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1164_0: Sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānassa āhārapaccayabhāvo vicāretvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1164_1: Na hi cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro nocittasamuṭṭhāno tadubhayañca cittasamuṭṭhānakāyassa āhārapaccayo vutto,
tika-abh03t0:1167_1: Arūpajīvitindriyampi saṅgahitanti missakattā jīvitindriyaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ vajjitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1168_1: rūpārūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinibbhuttavohāro natthīti arūpānaṃ indriyapaccayabhūtāni paccayantarāpekkhāni
tika-abh03t0:1168_2: cakkhādīni attano vijjamānakkhaṇe avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharantānipi indriyapaccayā siyuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1168_3: Yo pana nirapekkho indriyapaccayo avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1168_4: so attano vijjamānakkhaṇe tesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi.
tika-abh03t0:1168_5: Yadi ca itthindriyapurisindriyāni indriyapaccayo liṅgādīnaṃ siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1168_8: arūpaṃ vā arūpassa vinibbhuttassa indriyapaccayo atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1168_9: Sati cevaṃ itthipurisindriyehi avinibbhuttattā kalalādikāle ca liṅgādīni siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1168_13: avinibbhuttattābhāvato ca tesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ na pharanti.
tika-abh03t0:1168_16: tasmā āpannavinibbhuttabhāvānaṃ tesaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ avinibbhuttānaṃ aññesañca samānakalāpadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayatāya
tika-abh03t0:1168_20: te pana kalalādikālepi liṅgādīnaṃ tadanurūpānaṃ atthitaṃ icchanti.
tika-abh03t0:1169_0: Jātibhūmivasena vuttesu bhedesu kusalajātiyaṃ rūpāvacarakusalameva āruppe ṭhapetabbanti “ṭhapetvā pana
tika-abh03t0:1169_2: Paṭhamalokuttaraṃ pana domanassayuttañca visuṃ ekā jāti bhūmi vā na hotīti āruppe alabbhamānampi na ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1170_0: Ṭhitikkhaṇeti idaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa sahajātapaccayattābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1170_1: Uppādakkhaṇepi pana tassa indriyapaccayatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1170_5: Na hi asaññasattānaṃ indriyapaccayā uppajjamānassa rūpassa rūpajīvitindriyato añño indriyapaccayo atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1170_7: Paṭiccavārādayo ca cha uppādakkhaṇameva gahetvā pavattā,
tika-abh03t0:1170_8: evañca katvā pacchājātapaccayo etesu anulomato na tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh03t0:1173_3: na kāyikasukhadukkhabhūtānīti imassa dassanatthaṃ somanassadomanassaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1173_4: Nanu ca “dvipañcaviññāṇavajjesū”ti vacaneneva kāyikasukhadukkhāni vajjitānīti sukhadukkhaggahaṇameva kattabbanti? Na,
tika-abh03t0:1173_8: na pana yāni sukhadukkhāni jhānaṅgāni honti,
tika-abh03t0:1173_9: tesaṃ jhānaṅgabhūto sukhabhāvo dukkhabhāvo ca visesito,
tika-abh03t0:1173_10: tasmā somanassadomanassabhāvavisiṭṭhoyeva sukhadukkhabhāvo sukhadukkhānaṃ jhānaṅgabhāvoti dassanatthaṃ somanassadomanassaggahaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh03t0:1173_11: Tena “dvipañcaviññāṇavajjesū”ti vacanena vajjiyamānānampi sukhadukkhānaṃ somanassadomanassabhāvābhāvato jhānaṅgabhāvābhāvoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1173_15: Kasmā pana na uddhaṭāti taṃ dassetuṃ “pañcannaṃ pana viññāṇakāyāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:1174_0: Abhinipātamattattāti etena āvajjanasampaṭicchanamattāyapi cintanāpavattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1174_2: Tattha upekkhāsukhadukkheheva taṃsamānalakkhaṇāya cittekaggatāyapi yathāvutteneva kāraṇena anuddhaṭabhāvo dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1174_3: Pubbe pana satta aṅgāni dassentena cattāri aṅgāni vajjitānīti tesaṃ vajjane kāraṇaṃ dassentena na samānalakkhaṇena lesena dassetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1174_7: tiṇṇaṃ pana vacanena tato aññassa jhānaṅganti uddhaṭabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1174_10: Ye pana “jhānaṅgabhūtehi somanassādīhi sukhadukkhena avibhūtabhāvena pākaṭatāya indriyakiccayuttatāya
tika-abh03t0:1174_11: ca samānānaṃ sukhādīnaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1174_12: na cittekaggatāyāti sā ettha na gahitā”ti vadanti,
tika-abh03t0:1174_14: Yadi jhānaṅgasamānānaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1174_15: cittekaggatā cettha jhānaṅgabhūtāya vicikicchāyuttamanodhātuādīsu cittekaggatāya samānāti tassā anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:1174_16: Sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ uddhaṭameva uddharaṇaṭṭhāne cittuppādakaṇḍeti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:1177_1: Paññā vitakko sammāvācākammantājīvā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāvācākammantājīvāti imāni
tika-abh03t0:1177_2: dvādasaṅgānīti ettha duvidhampi saṅkappaṃ vīriyaṃ samādhiñca vitakkavīriyasamādhivacanehi saṅgaṇhitvā
tika-abh03t0:1177_7: micchāsamādhī”tiādīhi suttavacanehi micchāvācākammantājīvesupi maggaṅgavohārasiddhito tehi saha dvādasaṅgāni
tika-abh03t0:1177_8: idha labbhamānāni ca alabbhamānāni ca maggaṅgavacanasāmaññena saṅgaṇhitvā vuttāni.
tika-abh03t0:1177_10: evaṃ pana dassentena “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti evaṃ uddharitvā tassa pāṭhagatassa maggaṅgasaddassa
tika-abh03t0:1177_12: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa micchāvācākammantājīvoti attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1177_13: Tehi sammāvācādīhi paṭipakkhā cetanādhammā tappaṭipakkhabhāvatoyeva “micchāmaggaṅgānī”ti sutte vuttāni,
tika-abh03t0:1177_15: Maggaṅgāni maggapaccayabhūtāni ca idha pāḷiyaṃ “maggaṅgānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-abh03t0:1177_16: na ca aññaṃ uddharitvā aññassa attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1177_17: Pariyāyanippariyāyamaggaṅgadassanatthaṃ pana icchantena pāḷigatamaggaṅgasaddapatirūpako añño maggaṅgasaddo
tika-abh03t0:1177_18: ubhayapadattho uddharitabbo yathā “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1177_19: Idha pana “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti pāḷigatoyeva maggaṅgasaddo uddhaṭo,
tika-abh03t0:1177_20: na ca atthuddharaṇavasena dassetvā adhippetatthaniyamanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1177_21: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa micchāvācādīnaṃ atthabhāvo mā hotūti “sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappavācākammantājīvavāyāmasatisamādhimicchādiṭṭhisaṅkappavāyāmasamādhayoti
tika-abh03t0:1177_24: Na hi tesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo yathāvuttā santi,
tika-abh03t0:1180_1: Sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvatoti etena sampayogāsaṅkāvatthubhūto upakārakabhāvo vippayuttapaccayatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:1183_3: Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1183_5: Nibbānañca nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ hutvā atthibhāvalābhena upakārakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1183_6: Uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakārakatāviruddho upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatāti na nibbānaṃ atthipaccayo.
tika-abh03t0:1184_1: tehi ekato puretaraṃ pacchā ca uppannatte sahajātādipaccayattābhāvato āha “āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1187_1: Paccayalakkhaṇameva hettha nānanti etena natthivigatapaccayesu atthiavigatapaccayesu ca byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1187_2: na attheti idaṃ yo paccayoti attho,
tika-abh03t0:1187_4: byañjanasaṅgahite paccayalakkhaṇamatteyeva nānattanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh03t0:1191_1: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā hontī”tiādimapāṭho.
tika-abh03t0:1191_2: Ettha ca lobhadosamohānaṃ paccekaṃ sattarasahi paccayehi paccayabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh03t0:1191_3: sabbe hetū saha aggahetvā ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ amohādīnaṃ visuṃ gahitattāti dosassapi sattarasahi paccayabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1191_4: tathā ca sati dosassapi garukaraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:1191_5: “Akusalo pana ārammaṇādhipati nāma lobhasahagatacittuppādo vuccatī”ti etthāpi lobhadosasahagatacittuppādāti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:1191_9: atha kho saṅgahito purejātādīhi yathāvuttehi sesattāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ dosaṃ lobhamohehi saha aggahetvā
tika-abh03t0:1191_11: sesānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hotī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1191_14: Na hi etaṃ ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvadassananti rūpādīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvo ca etena dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1192_0: Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ bhedā cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayoti bhedaṃ anāmasitvā te eva gahetvā āha “catūsu khandhesū”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1192_1: Micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti ekūnavīsatidhāti idamevaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1192_2: Na hi micchāvācādayo micchādiṭṭhi viya maggapaccayā honti cetanāya maggapaccayattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:1192_7: Sesapaccayabhāvo ca cetanāya anekapaccayabhāvavacanena vuttoyevāti na idaṃ paṭhitabbanti na paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1192_10: vicikicchā pana adhipatipaccayo na hotīti taṃ tattha apaṭhitvā “vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni tato
tika-abh03t0:1193_3: mahābhūtāni pana vippayuttapaccayā na hontīti “purejātaatthiavigatavasena navadhā paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1193_5: Ettakamevettha apubbanti etasmiṃ purejātapaccaye sahajātanissayehi apubbaṃ rūpasaddagandharasāyatanamattamevāti attho,
tika-abh03t0:1193_6: ārammaṇāni panetāni ārammaṇapaccayadhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāve vuttānīti sabbātikkantapaccayāpekkhā etesaṃ apubbatā natthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1193_7: Indriyādīsu apubbaṃ natthīti rūpajīvitindriyassapi arūpajīvitindriyato apubbassa paccayabhāvassa abhāvaṃ maññamānena apubbatā na vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1193_9: Kabaḷīkārāhārassa ca purejātena saddhiṃ sattadhā paccayabhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1194_3: Vipākahetūsuyeva labbhatīti ettha amohavipākahetussa adhipatipaccayabhāvo ca lokuttaravipākeyeva labbhatīti.
tika-abh03t0:1194_8: na ca yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissayo hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1195_11: Tattha ārammaṇapurejātanti yadi kañci ārammaṇabhūtaṃ purejātaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1195_12: ārammaṇabhūtassa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayatā labbhatīti sā na labbhatīti na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1195_13: Atha pana vatthupurejātato aññaṃ vatthubhāvarahitārammaṇameva “ārammaṇapurejāta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1195_14: tassa nissayapaccayatā na labbhatīti “nissayindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhatī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1195_16: ito vā indriyavippayuttato nissayindriyavippayuttato vā uttari ārammaṇādhipatiādi ca labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ veditabbanti attho vattabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1195_17: Kammādīsu pana labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ na vakkhatīti purimoyevettha attho adhippeto.
tika-abh03t0:1196_2: tena “kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1197_0: “Yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti imesaṃ vasenā”ti purimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:1197_1: “yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ maggavajjānaṃ navannaṃ hetuadhipatijhānānañcāti imesaṃ vasenā”ti pacchimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:1198_0: Samanantaraniruddhatāya ārammaṇabhāvena ca sadiso paccayabhāvo paccayasabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t0:1198_2: “Iminā upāyenā”ti vacanato hetuādīnaṃ sahajātānaṃ sahajātabhāvena sabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t0:1198_3: sahajātāsahajātānaṃ hetuārammaṇādīnaṃ aññamaññavisabhāgatāti evamādinā upāyena sabhāgatā visabhāgatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1199_1: na ajanakāti janakabhāvappadhānāyeva hutvā paccayā honti,
tika-abh03t0:1199_5: na ca pavattantīti tesaṃ ubhayappadhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:1199_6: Na hi te anantarādayo viya jananeneva pavattiṃ karontīti.
tika-abh03t0:1200_5: ārammaṇānantarūpanissayānaṃ pana pubbe ārammaṇādhipatianantaraggahaṇehi gahitattā tesu ekadesena anantarūpanissayena itarampi dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1200_6: Purejātapacchājātāpi asabbaṭṭhānikā arūparūpānaññeva yathākkamena paccayabhāvatoti ettha purejātapaccayo
tika-abh03t0:1200_8: na ca yugaḷabhāvo pacchājātena saha kathane kāraṇaṃ asabbaṭṭhānikadassanamattassa adhippetattāti taṃ
tika-abh03t0:1200_9: tattha paṭhitvā “pacchājātopi asabbaṭṭhāniko rūpānaṃyeva paccayabhāvato”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1204_0: Ekekaṃ tikadukanti ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukañcāti attho, na tikadukanti.
tika-abh03t0:1205_0: Paccayā cevāti ye kusalādidhamme paṭiccāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1205_1: te paṭiccatthaṃ pharantā kusalādipaccayā cevāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1205_5: Ettha paṭiccasahajātavārehi samānatthehi paṭiccasahajātābhidhānehi samānatthaṃ bodhentena bhagavatā pacchimavārena purimavāro,
tika-abh03t0:1205_6: purimavārena ca pacchimavāro ca bodhitoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1206_0: “Te te pana pañhe uddharitvā puna kusalo hetu hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1206_1: “Kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”nti pañhāvārapāṭhoti pamādalekhā esāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatapāṭhameva paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t0:1206_2: Purimavāresu sahajātanissayasampayuttapaccayabhāvehi kusalādidhamme niyametvā tasmiṃ niyame kusalādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1206_4: na tattha “ime nāma te dhammā hetādipaccayabhūtā”ti viññāyanti,
tika-abh03t0:1206_5: tasmā tattha “siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evamādīhi saṅgahite
tika-abh03t0:1206_6: paṭiccatthādipharaṇakabhāve hetādipaccayapaccayuppannesu hetādipaccayānaṃ nicchayābhāvato pañhā nijjaṭā
tika-abh03t0:1206_8: idha pana “siyā kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādīhi saṅgahitā hetādipaccayabhūtā
tika-abh03t0:1206_10: na koci pucchāsaṅgahito attho anicchito nāma atthīti āha “sabbepi te pañhā nijjaṭā niggumbā ca katvā vibhattā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:1206_11: Pañhā pana uddharitvā vissajjanaṃ sabbattha samānanti na taṃ sandhāya nijjaṭatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1207_0: Uppattiyā paññāpitattāti pucchāmatteneva uppattiyā ṭhapitattā pakāsitattā,
tika-abh03t0:1208_2: Kiṃ siyāti eso vidhi kiṃ atthīti attho. Kiṃ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:1208_3: atha na siyāti sampucchanaṃ vā parikappapucchāti vadati.
tika-abh03t0:1208_7: atha abhidhamma”nti aññena saha sampadhāraṇanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1208_9: so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca siyāti etasmiṃ atthe sati pacchājātavipākapaccayesupi sabbapucchānaṃ pavattito
tika-abh03t0:1208_11: so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca siyā”ti ayamattho viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t0:1208_12: tathā ca sati pacchājātapaccayā vipākapaccayāti uppajjamānaṃ niddhāretvā tassa kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh03t0:1208_13: bhavanassa pucchanato kusalānaṃ tehi paccayehi uppatti anuññātāti āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1208_14: na ca taṃtaṃpaccayā uppajjamānānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ kusalādidhamme paṭicca bhavanamatthitā ettha pucchitā,
tika-abh03t0:1208_16: evañca katvā vissajjane “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjatī”ti uppattiyeva vissajjitāti,
tika-abh03t0:1208_17: tasmā ayamattho sadosoti “atha vā”ti atthantaravacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1209_0: Tattha “kusalo dhammo uppajjeyyā”ti uppattiṃ anujānitvā “hetupaccayā siyā eta”nti tassā hetupaccayā bhavanapucchanaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1209_1: “uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti hetupaccayā uppattiṃ anujānitvā tassā “siyā eta”nti bhavanapucchanañca na yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1209_3: Tasmā ananujānitvā “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ uppajjanaṃ kiṃ siyāti pucchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1209_5: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo kiṃ uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1209_6: Siyāti yathāpucchitasseva uppajjanassa sambhavaṃ pucchati “kiṃ evaṃ uppajjanaṃ siyā sambhaveyyā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:1209_9: tāya pana pucchāya “idaṃ nāma pucchita”nti na viññāyatīti tassāyeva pucchāya visesanatthaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1209_10: paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti pucchati,
tika-abh03t0:1209_11: evaṃ visesitabbavisesanabhāvena dvepi pucchā ekāyeva pucchāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1210_2: paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ pana sahajātānampi paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena gahaṇaṃ purimapacchimabhāveneva
tika-abh03t0:1210_5: Gamanaṃ vā uppatti evāti gacchantassa paṭigamanaṃ uppajjantassa paṭiuppajjanaṃ samānakiriyā.
tika-abh03t0:1210_7: Tasmā “kusalaṃ dhamma”nti upayoganiddiṭṭhaṃ paccayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ paṭicca tadāyattuppattiyā paṭigantvāti ayamettha attho,
tika-abh03t0:1210_8: tena paṭiccāti sahajātapaccayaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1211_1: Tāsu pāḷiyaṃ dveyeva dassitāti hetārammaṇaduke dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ dassitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1211_2: Ettha ca ekamūlakādibhāvo pucchānaṃ vuttoti veditabbo,
tika-abh03t0:1211_3: paccayānaṃ pana vasena sabbapaṭhamo paccayantarena avomissakattā suddhikanayo,
tika-abh03t0:1211_4: dutiyo ārammaṇādīsu ekekassa hetu eva ekamūlakanti katvā ekamūlakanayo.
tika-abh03t0:1211_5: Evaṃ hetārammaṇadukādīnaṃ adhipatiādīnaṃ mūlabhāvato dukamūlakādayo nayā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1211_6: Tevīsatimūlakanayo ca tato paraṃ mūlassa abhāvato “sabbamūlaka”nti pāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-abh03t0:1211_8: sabbamūlakaṃ paccayagamanaṃ pāḷigamanaṃ vāti viññāyati, eka…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1211_10: idha ca sabbamūlakanti ca tevīsatimūlakasseva vuttattā paccanīye vakkhati “yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t0:1212_1: “Ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayāti ettāvatā ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā hetupaccayapariyosāno ekamūlakanayo dassito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1212_2: evaṃ sati vinaye viya cakkabandhanavasena pāḷigati āpajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1212_4: Heṭṭhimasodhanavasena ca idha abhidhamme pāḷi gatā,
tika-abh03t0:1212_8: ārammaṇe tīṇī”tiādinā heṭṭhimaṃ sodhetvāva pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh03t0:1212_11: So ca visesābhāvato ārammaṇamūlakādīsu na labbhati.
tika-abh03t0:1212_12: Na hi ārammaṇādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ādimhi ṭhapitepi paccayantarena sambandhābhāvena ādimhi vuttasuddhikato visesattho labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:1212_13: teneva vissajjanepi ārammaṇamūlakādīsu suddhikanayo na dassitoti,
tika-abh03t0:1212_15: ārammaṇapaccayā avigatapaccayā”ti ayaṃ heṭṭhimasodhanavasena ekasmiṃ ārammaṇapaccaye hetupaccayādike yojetvā vutto ekamūlakanayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1212_17: avigatapaccayā”ti vā ekamūlakesu anantarapaccayassa mūlakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā ekamūlakādīni saṃkhipitvā
tika-abh03t0:1212_19: Adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā aññamaññapaccayāti idaṃ mūlameva dassetvā ekamūlakādīnaṃ saṃkhipanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1213_1: Tato nissayādīni mūlānipi saṃkhipitvā avigatamūlakanayaṃ dassetuṃ “avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1213_2: Etasmiñca suddhikassa adassanena ārammaṇamūlakādīsu visuṃ visuṃ suddhikanayo na labbhatīti ñāpito hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1213_3: Na hi ādi katthaci saṃkhepantaragato hoti.
tika-abh03t0:1213_5: ādito pabhuti katici vatvā gatidassanaṃ vāti.
tika-abh03t0:1213_8: Tatiyacatukkato pabhuti vā pañcakamūlāni saṃkhipitvā sabbamūlakassa avasānena niṭṭhapeti.
tika-abh03t0:1214_0: Ettha ca dukamūlakādīsu yathā hetuārammaṇadukena saddhiṃ avasesā paccayā yojitā,
tika-abh03t0:1214_2: evaṃ hetuadhipatidukādīhi hetuadhipatianantaratikādīhi ca avasesāvasesā yojetabbā siyuṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1214_3: Yadi ca sabbesaṃ paccayānaṃ mūlabhāvena yojitattā hetumūlake hetuadhipatiādidukānaṃ adhipatimūlakādīsu adhipatihetuādidukehi viseso natthi.
tika-abh03t0:1214_4: Te eva hi paccayā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:1214_6: hetumūlake ca hetuadhipatianantaratikādīnaṃ avasesāvasesehi yojane atthi visesoti.
tika-abh03t0:1214_7: Yasmā pana evaṃ yojiyamānesupi sukhaggahaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1214_8: na ca yathāvuttāya yojanāya sabbā sā yojanā paññavatā na sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1214_9: tasmā tathā ayojetvā anupubbeneva yojanā katāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t0:1215_0: “Dvāvīsatiyā tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukānaṃ satena satena saddhiṃ yojetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1215_1: taṃ dukatikapaṭṭhāne kesañci potthakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1215_2: Kesuci pana ekeko duko dvāvīsatiyā dvāvīsatiyā tikehi yojito,
tika-abh03t0:1215_4: Na hi tattha tikassa yojanā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1215_5: atha kho tikānaṃ ekekena padena dukassāti.
tika-abh03t0:1215_6: Tattha chasaṭṭhiyā tikapadesu ekekena saṃsanditvā chasaṭṭhi hetudukā,
tika-abh03t0:1215_7: tathā sahetukadukādayo cāti dukānaṃ chasatādhikāni chasahassāni honti.
tika-abh03t0:1215_8: Tesu ekekasmiṃ paṭiccavārādayo satta vārā nayā pucchā ca sabbā dukapaṭṭhāne hetudukena samānā.
tika-abh03t0:1216_0: “Dukasate ekekaṃ dukaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ yojetvā”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1216_1: tampi tikadukapaṭṭhāne kesañci potthakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1216_2: Vuttanayena pana yuttagamanesu ekeko tiko dukasatena yojito.
tika-abh03t0:1216_3: Tattha hetupadaṃ pakkhipitvā vutto eko kusalattiko,
tika-abh03t0:1216_6: tathā vedanāttikādīnampīti sabbesaṃ catusatādhikāni cattāri sahassāni honti.
tika-abh03t0:1216_7: Tesu ekekasmiṃ vāranayapucchā tikapaṭṭhāne kusalattikena samānā.
tika-abh03t0:1217_0: “Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato panāti etena idaṃ dasseti –
tika-abh03t0:1217_1: “anulomamhī”ti “tikādayo chanayā”ti ca avisesena vuttattā paṭiccavārādivasena sattavidhampi anulomaṃ saha gahetvā “cha anulomamhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1217_2: anulomādivasena catubbidhaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ saha gahetvā “tikañca paṭṭhānavara”nti,
tika-abh03t0:1217_3: tathā catubbidhāni dukapaṭṭhānādīni saha gahetvā “dukuttama”ntiādiṃ vatvā “cha nayā sugambhīrā”ti vuttanti
tika-abh03t0:1217_4: imamatthaṃ gahetvā imasmiṃ paccayānulome sattappabhede chapi ete paṭṭhānā paṭṭhānanayā catuppabhedā pucchāvasena
tika-abh03t0:1217_6: Evañhi sabbasmiṃ paṭṭhāne sabbo paccayānulomo dassito hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:1217_8: Ettha ca dukatikapaṭṭhānādīsu visesitabbehi tikehi paṭṭhānaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1217_11: dukatikānaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ dukatikapaṭṭhānanti iminā nayena vacanattho veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1217_13: Dukapaṭṭhānameva hi tikapadasaṃsandanavasena dukapadasaṃsandanavasena ca pavattaṃ dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ dukadukapaṭṭhānañca,
tika-abh03t0:1217_14: tathā tikapaṭṭhānameva dukapadasaṃsandanavasena tikapadasaṃsandanavasena ca pavattaṃ tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ tikatikapaṭṭhānañcāti.
tika-abh03t0:1220_1: Tevīsatimūlakanti idañcettha dumūlakaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti idaṃ dukamūlake pucchānaṃ mūlabhūtā tevīsati
tika-abh03t0:1220_2: dukā sambhavantīti tassa “tevīsatimūlaka”nti nāmaṃ katvā yāva yattako pabhedo atthi,
tika-abh03t0:1220_4: Evaṃ paccanīyepi vitthāretabbanti dukamūlakena tikamūlakādīsu nayaṃ dassetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh03t0:1220_5: Yadi pana yāva tevīsatimaṃ mūlaṃ yathā vitthāritanti ayamattho adhippeto,
tika-abh03t0:1220_7: Na hi “tevīsatimūlaka”nti etassa byañjanassa tevīsatimaṃ mūlakanti ayamattho sambhavati.
tika-abh03t0:1220_8: Yathā anulome “ekekapadassā”tiādinā pana ekamūlādisabbamūlakapariyosānaṃ tattha nayadassanavasena dassitaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1220_9: ekekassa padassa vitthāraṃ dassetīti sabbamūlakameva cettha “tevīsatimūlaka”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1220_10: Tañhi tevīsatiyā paccayānaṃ avasesassa paccayassa mūlabhāvato “tevīsatimūlaka”nti ca tato paraṃ mūlassa aññassa abhāvato “sabbamūlaka”nti ca vuccati.
tika-abh03t0:1223_1: Anulome vuttesu sabbesu ekamūlakādīsu ekekaṃ padaṃ parihāpetvāti tattha ekamūlake catuvīsati paccayapadāni idha ekamūlake tevīsati,
tika-abh03t0:1223_2: eko pana paccayo mūlabhāvena ṭhito apubbatābhāvato agaṇanūpago.
tika-abh03t0:1223_4: idha dumūlake dvāvīsatīti evaṃ parihāpetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:1224_0: Anulomato ṭhitassa paccanīyato alabbhamānānaṃ suddhikapaccayānañca alabbhamānataṃ sandhāya “labbhamānapadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1224_1: Na hi aññathā pucchāvasena koci paccayo alabbhamāno nāma atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1224_2: Vissajjanāvaseneva vā pavattaṃ anulomapaccanīyadesanaṃ sandhāya “labbhamānapadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1231_2: na tāyeva vedanāttikādīsūti tikapadanānattamattena vinā mūlāvasānavasena sadisataṃ sandhāya “na tāyevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1231_5: na tāyeva paccayavārādīsūti sabbapucchāsamāharaṇaṃ idha kattabbameva.
tika-abh03t0:1231_6: Dhammānulomapaccanīye ca tikapaṭṭhāne vitakkattikapītittikānaṃ vissajjane sabbāpetā vissajjanaṃ labhantīti ettha pītittikaggahaṇaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1231_7: Na hi tattha ekūnapaññāsa pucchā vissajjanaṃ labhantīti.
tika-abh03t0:1232_0: Tena saddhinti tena sahajātapaccayabhūtena saddhinti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:1232_1: “Yāva nirodhagamanā uddhaṃ pajjatī”ti ca “uppādādayo vā pāpuṇātī”ti ca vacanehi khaṇattayasamaṅgī uppajjatīti vuccatīti anuññātaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh03t0:1233_0: Yasmā pana eko khandho ekassātiādi idha kusalavacanena gahite khandhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1233_1: Vedanāttikādīsu pana ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1233_3: hetudukādīsu ca saṅkhārakkhandhekadesaṃ paṭicca saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassapi uppatti vuttāti saha uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1233_4: sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayo honto ekekassapi dukatikādibhedānañca paccayo nāma hotiyeva,
tika-abh03t0:1234_0: “Rūpena saddhiṃ anuppattito āruppavipākañca na gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1234_1: taṃ pana na sabbasmiṃ etasmiṃ vacane gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1234_4: atha kho lokuttaravipākakiriyābyākatampi āruppe uppajjamānaṃ ettha na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1234_5: “Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti ettha pana na kiñci rūpena vinā
tika-abh03t0:1234_6: saha vā uppajjamānaṃ sahetukaṃ vipākakiriyābyākataṃ aggahitaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-abh03t0:1234_7: Tattha pana yaṃ rūpena saha uppajjati,
tika-abh03t0:1235_0: “Vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti ettake vattabbe paccayabhūtassa vatthussa “kaṭattā ca rūpa”nti etasmiṃ sāmaññavacane
tika-abh03t0:1235_1: paccayuppannabhāvena aggahitatāpattiṃ nivāretuṃ “khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1235_3: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti vā vatthukhandhānaṃ aññamaññapaccayabhūtānaṃ paccayabhāvavisesadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1235_4: aññamaññāpekkhaṃ vacanadvayaṃ vuttaṃ sāmaññena gahitampi visuṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1236_0: Mahābhūtepi paṭicca uppattidassanattanti yaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ kaṭattārūpañca upādārūpaṃ upādārūpaggahaṇena
tika-abh03t0:1236_3: Etasmiṃ pana dassane khandhapaccayasahitāsahitañca sabbaṃ upādārūpaṃ ito paresu sahajātapaccayādīsu saṅgahitanti
tika-abh03t0:1237_0: Mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpanti vuttanayenāti “mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti
tika-abh03t0:1237_1: ettha atthato ayaṃ nayo vuttoti sandhāyāha.
tika-abh03t0:1238_1: Rūpamissakā pahāyāti yāsu pucchāsu rūpena vinā paccayuppannaṃ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:1239_1: “Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti vacanatoti gabbhaseyyakapaṭisandhiyā pañcakkhandhasabbhāvena
tika-abh03t0:1239_2: tāya samānalakkhaṇā sabbāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhi okkantināmakāti sādheti.
tika-abh03t0:1240_1: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti ettāvatā pañcavokāre sabbaṃ cittakammasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1240_4: puna āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānanti etehi sabbaṃ indriyabaddhaṃ āhārautusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1240_5: Tattha “utusamuṭṭhānaṃ eka”ntiādinā asaññasattānampi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1240_6: Na hi tattha tassa vajjane kāraṇaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1240_7: Ādimhi pana “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭiccā”tiādi avisesavacanaṃ sahajātaṃ arūpampi paccayaṃ hetādike ca paccaye
tika-abh03t0:1240_8: bahutare labhantaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānakaṭattārūpadvayaṃ saha saṅgaṇhitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1240_9: evañca katvā tassa pariyosāne “mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1240_10: tasmā tattha kaṭattārūpaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānasambandhaṃ taṃsamānagatikaṃ pañcavokāre vattamānameva gahitanti
tika-abh03t0:1240_11: aggahitaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ dassetuṃ “asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1240_12: tasmā upādārūpaṃ idhapi kammapaccayavibhaṅge viya “mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti kaṭattārūpabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1240_14: Na hi vuttassa utusamuṭṭhānassa punavacane payojanaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:1241_0: Kasmā pana yathā bāhirādīsu “mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpa”nti avisesetvā upādārūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1241_1: evaṃ avatvā cittakammajaupādārūpāni “cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti hetupaccayādīsu
tika-abh03t0:1241_3: kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti adhipatipaccayādīsu visuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpabhāvakaṭattārūpabhāvehi visesetvāva vuttānīti?
tika-abh03t0:1241_4: Tattha bāhiraggahaṇādīhi viya ettha mahābhūtānaṃ kenaci avisesitattā.
tika-abh03t0:1241_5: Apica iddhicittanibbattānaṃ kammapaccayānañca iṭṭhāniṭṭhānaṃ bāhirarūpāyatanādīnaṃ cittaṃ kammañca hetādīsu na koci paccayo,
tika-abh03t0:1241_9: tasmā satipi cittena kammena ca vinā abhāve hetādipaccayabhūtehi arūpehi uppajjamānāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpakaṭattārūpabhūtāneva upādārūpāni honti,
tika-abh03t0:1241_10: na aññānīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ cittakammajesveva upādārūpesu visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t0:1241_11: Aññāni vā samānajātikena rūpena samuṭṭhānāni pākaṭavisesanānevāti na visesanaṃ arahanti,
tika-abh03t0:1241_12: etāni pana asamānajātikehi arūpehi samuṭṭhitāni visesanaṃ arahantīti visesitānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh03t0:1241_13: Yathā vā cittakammāni cittakammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ savisesena paccayabhāvena paccayā honti sahajātādipaccayabhāvato mūlakaraṇabhāvato ca,
tika-abh03t0:1241_14: na evaṃ utuāhārā taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti cittakammajāneva visuṃ visesanaṃ arahanti.
tika-abh03t0:1241_17: Na hi aññataravisesanaṃ ubhayavisesanaṃ na hotīti.
tika-abh03t0:1242_2: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti khandhavatthūnaṃ aññamaññapaccayatādassanena pubbe visuṃ paccayabhāvena dassitānaṃ
tika-abh03t0:1242_3: khandhānaṃ ekato paccayabhāvo dassito hotīti iminā adhippāyenāha “catunnampi khandhānaṃ ekato vatthunā
tika-abh03t0:1242_5: “Khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti idaṃ pana catunnampi khandhānaṃ ekato paṭiccatthapharaṇatādassanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t0:1242_9: Tattha sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ visuṃ paṭiccatthapharaṇataṃ dassetvā puna “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti vatthussapi
